About Avialogs.com: 

Avialogs.com is a online aviation library and communauty offering access to more than 4000 aviation related documents from the beginning of the Aviation to the late 90's. My goal is to offer a unique source of aviation information for all people interested by Aviation history and aircraft, to support aircraft restoration project, historian research, scale modeler or flight simulator hobbyist. 

Since one year, the new version of Avialogs.com is online. This version is more ambitious than the one launched in 2010 but, working alone on the site, I do not have the time to bring it to the level I wish.
column5:
>What must be done:

- Fix all documents titles and meta information. 
- Add new documents : More than 600 aviation manuals and book are already in PDF and waiting to be published.
- Add Aviation databases to the site with the possibility for registered user to add photos and comments for each aircraft.
Databases are ready, with info about more than 200 000 aircraft (Serial/Construction Number/Registration)
column6:
>For this, I need your help. I have set the subscription price the lowest possible in order to cover hosting fees. There is no budget right now to hire someone to do this work. 

I can hire a developer/webmaster for around 1500$/month (with a good knowledge about Joomla, the CMS used and Aviation). But I need to secure a 3 months budget before giving him the contract. 

How you can help:
column7: >- Do a donation, if all Avialogs members would give 5$, we would be able to hire someone full time for one year ...
column8: >- Share the word about Avialogs and let other knows about this project
column9:
>All donors will have their Avialogs subscription extended or created.

Thanks for your help ! 

Benoit de Mulder - Avialogs.com

column2: >If you own a Smartphone, MP3 player, tablet computer or eReader then you could use a Dinky everyday. It's only 4 inches long and replaces several feet of tangled cord.  When it's not recharging the battery or swapping data with your computer it transforms into a very handy little tripod and display stand.

>The camera in your Smartphone is so good you probably aren't using your compact camera much any more.  However, the one thing you probably miss is the tripod mounting socket. If you haven't used one lately try it some time, tripods make you a better photographer.
>Most Smartphones have camera self-timers built-in and there are numerous application programs with self-timers and other features to enhance Smartphone photography.
>Even new MP3 music players like the Apple iPod Touch have built-in cameras.  Yes, we have a Dinky for those too.
>The tripod feature also doubles as a display stand for using FaceTime and Skype video calling programs as well as watching movies and videos on Netflix and YouTube.
>The Dinky phone holder has a rubbery grip that opens large enough to go around the thickest phone case yet it can go small enough to hold a piece of paper.
>This makes the Dinky even more versatile around your desk holding pages, small books, make-up mirrors or any other little thing you need to hold upright.

>Some eReaders have a Text-to-Speech feature that audibly reads the book to you while it is displayed.  Mount it on the Dinky and it becomes a hands-free learning tool and when you're finished use it to recharge the battery.

>There are about 700,000 programs or ‘apps’ for Android and Apple phones and nearly 120,000 for Windows OS Phones.  It’s amazing what you can do with a Smartphone.  As you know, the more you use your Smartphone the more you need to keep a charger/data cord nearby.
>Rubberized clamping head holds firmly in any position

We are offering Dinky's at substantial savings starting at only $18 with free US shipping. (That's only $14 for a Dinky because shipping cost about $4).
For only $4 more you can get a Dinky Deluxe that includes both photo tripod and camera adapters and attractive packaging (pretty box). That's $22 with free US shipping.
The more you buy the cheaper they get.  Buy some for your friends or order together with your friends.
It's ok to mix and match connectors and colors - any combination in an order is fine.
When we are ready to ship, you will get an email reqesting your color selection and connector for each Dinky you order.
Thinking about a new phone?  You can change your order any time before we ship them.
You will get regular updates and progress reports.  We will build our company around excellent customer service.

Dan is president and founder of DES Design, LLC in Loveland Colorado and has many years experience manufacturing products of his own design. His inventions range from automotive service machines to active-matrix night-time glare reduction eyeglasses.  His team members are close friends and click well together.  It's fun to sit in on a brainstorming session with smart people. Rocky Mountain National Park is 40 minutes away and a great place to hang together and not discuss business, save that for the office.

Dinky has been in the works for over a year now. CAD software helped optimize the design before we built working models.  After settling on a design we all liked, we consulted with a wiring harness maker and our old friends at a rubber molding company and now have our numbers together.

We are really excited about the product Dinky has become but we can't get them into production by ourselves.  Thanks to you and Indiegogo we'll get the funding we need to build them and a company around it.

column1: If you own a Smartphone, MP3 player, tablet computer or eReader then you could use a Dinky everyday. It's only 4 inches long and replaces several feet of tangled cord.  When it's not recharging the battery or swapping data with your computer it transforms into a very handy little tripod and display stand.

The camera in your Smartphone is so good you probably aren't using your compact camera much any more.  However, the one thing you probably miss is the tripod mounting socket. If you haven't used one lately try it some time, tripods make you a better photographer.
Most Smartphones have camera self-timers built-in and there are numerous application programs with self-timers and other features to enhance Smartphone photography.
Even new MP3 music players like the Apple iPod Touch have built-in cameras.  Yes, we have a Dinky for those too.
The tripod feature also doubles as a display stand for using FaceTime and Skype video calling programs as well as watching movies and videos on Netflix and YouTube.
The Dinky phone holder has a rubbery grip that opens large enough to go around the thickest phone case yet it can go small enough to hold a piece of paper.
This makes the Dinky even more versatile around your desk holding pages, small books, make-up mirrors or any other little thing you need to hold upright.

Some eReaders have a Text-to-Speech feature that audibly reads the book to you while it is displayed.  Mount it on the Dinky and it becomes a hands-free learning tool and when you're finished use it to recharge the battery.

There are about 700,000 programs or ‘apps’ for Android and Apple phones and nearly 120,000 for Windows OS Phones.  It’s amazing what you can do with a Smartphone.  As you know, the more you use your Smartphone the more you need to keep a charger/data cord nearby.
Rubberized clamping head holds firmly in any position

Be expecting to receive an email by the end of the business day on Friday, August 3rd asking you to specify your color and/or shirt size. If you are in a restricted area, we will give you the choice of diverting shipping to an unrestricted area or gaining a full refund. You can expect to receive your Yellow Jacket in mid to late October! We are very grateful for the overwhelming positive support and are very happy at how well received Yellow Jacket has been, and once again send a sincere THANK YOU to our funders who made our dream of protecting you possible!

column1: Our campaign will end July 31 at Midnight (Eastern Standard Time). After our campaign ends, we will send an email to all funders thanking them for their contribution and asking them to specify their color/shirt size. If you would like to purchase a Yellow Jacket post campaign before they are available in stores, you will be able to do so via our direct website:

We have reached our minimum goal and are pleased to announce production WILL BEGIN upon the completion of our campaign! We will send an email post campaign to our funders thanking you guys for your help and asking you to specify your color, so do not worry about selecting it when you order.

We will also refund anyone who has ordered a product to a region that is restricted. (Although we originally listed Canada, we are unable to ship Yellow Jacket to Canada currently due to legal restrictions. We apologize and hope we can soon protect Canadians as well). Yellow Jacket can be taken to airports, but it must be checked in your luggage and not carried in a carry on. We have spoken with Homeland Security and they verify that this device can be checked in baggage but not carried through screening.

Finally as a thank you and to demonstrate Yellow Jacket in action, we leave you with this jewel - co-founder Sean Simone shocking co-founder Seth Froom during their pitch presentation: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pizRlEXvbdc
For press inquiries, please contact media@yellowjacketcase.com. Follow Yellow Jacket on Twitter @Yellow_Jacket and on Facebook.

column2: Owner of Personal Security Products, Inc. - ""The personal safety industry hasn't seen a product like this in years. The way that the stun gun is concealed while also packing such a strong punch is amazing""

column1: WAFB Channel 9 (Baton Rouge CBS affiliate) - ""There are lots and lots of iPhone cases out there, but this one is pretty unique""
With Yellow Jacket, you'll never be unprotected again.

Yellow Jacket has been designed as the world's first smartphone defense case. We intend to protect both the user and the smartphone from harm. The case contains a 650K volt stun gun capable of taking down an attacker. Yellow Jacket also has it's own external battery, capable of giving the smartphone up to 20 ADDITIONAL HOURS of standby BATTERY LIFE.

While creating this product, we realized that this would be a device people would place next to their face. Because of this, CREATING A SAFE PRODUCT WAS THE NUMBER ONE FOCUS OF OUR DESIGN TEAM. Yellow Jacket features a safety switch and a rotating electrode cap, both intended to prevent accidental discharge. In less than a second, a user can disable these safety mechanisms by moving the switch forward, rotating the cap downward and then be ready to press the activation button to fire the electrodes and be prepared to confront an assailant. The smartphone is securely snapped into Yellow Jacket's inside housing assembly, and the rubber sleeve then wraps around the device, giving Yellow Jacket a smoother look, feel and added protection to your smartphone.
Yellow Jacket is charged through the same charging cord as the matching smartphone model. The first Yellow Jacket model is for the iPhone 4 &
column2: 4S, so in this case, an iPhone phone charger could be plugged into Yellow Jacket. As previously stated, Yellow Jacket is capable of extending your smartphone's battery life by up to 20 additional hours. A switch on the bottom is capable of alternating Yellow Jacket's battery from standby power of the stun gun to actively powering the smartphone. Also by switching this device to powering the iPhone and plugging the device in, the iPhone can be charged without requiring removal from the device.

column1: The size and weight of Yellow Jacket was of second most concern behind the safety features of the product. Yellow Jacket is very comparable in size to an Otter Box Defender or Mophie Juice Pack. Coming in around 1"" in thickness, it adds another 3/8"" in heighth and nothing in the form of width. The device weighs approximately 4 ounces, and when coupled with an iPhone comes in at 8 ounces, keeping the device impressively light. Overall, Yellow Jacket in no way hinders a user from one handed operation or extended periods of time holding the device.

When the time comes, Yellow Jacket must work and must be effective. We have designed Yellow Jacket to work in an intense, life threatening situation. The shock Yellow Jacket delivers is incapacitating and capable of inflicting pain and injury, but the effects are temporary and a victim will recover in a matter of minutes. We have also designed Yellow Jacket to be out of sight and out of mind unless that situation. Simply put, Yellow Jacket is there when you need it, and safely stored when you don't.

Your Yellow Jacket defense case is scheduled to arrive in early September. We appreciate your patience during this pre-order phase of our business. If there is a way to produce and ship them to you sooner than September then we will find a way to do it.

We will be sending an email to you as the campaign comes to a close in order to determine the color of your Yellow Jacket and/or your T-shirt size. If we do not get a response from you in a reasonable amount of time we will send you a black Yellow Jacket and a medium sized T-shirt.

Here at Yellow Jacket, there's one thing we place above all else: your safety. We have designed a product to help increase your safety, but we need your help. Through Indiegogo, we can raise the capital required for our initial inventory and begin operations nationally. We are very appreciative to any and all help you can give during this campaign. Whether it be a sticker or shirt to promote the brand, a Yellow Jacket for yourself or a family member or several Yellow Jackets in a distribution pack, we thank you from the bottom of our hearts.
Please share Yellow Jacket with family and friends who you are interested in protecting!
*Apple and iPhone are trademarks of Apple Inc., no endorsement is implied.
**Must be 18 years of age or older to purchase. Due to varying legal restrictions, we will not ship to the following states, cities and/or countries: Illinois
column28: United Kingdom. Customer agrees not to allow or encourage anyone to use Yellow Jacket in any manner inconsistent with state, local or federal law.

column1: 1)      Will there be future Yellow Jacket models that come out for other iPhone or Android smartphones? Yes, we are excited to announce that following the launch of the iPhone 4 model we will develop, produce and sell Yellow Jackets for the iPhone 5, HTC Evo and Samsung Galaxy. Other models will surely follow.

2)      Are stun guns legal? For most of the United States and World, Yes! With that said there are certain states/countries that prohibit the sale and use of stun guns. Please review the list we have displayed before shipping your Yellow Jacket to a prohibited area.

3)      Are their certain venues that don’t allow stun guns to be carried on premises? Even in states that allow stun guns, please be mindful of airports, courthouses and other venues that are prohibit electroshock weapons. While travelling through a public airport, you will be required to check your Yellow Jacket into your checked bag and retrieve it at your destination.

4)      Will this device actually protect my phone? Yes! We have designed this product to serve two purposes for its owner: 1) protect the owner and their assets 2) protect the phone from damage. Don’t go getting any crazy ideas like going swimming with your iPhone 4. The Yellow Jacket’s primary purpose is not water resistance but impact resistance combined with a self-protection device.

5)      Are there safety features on this device that will prevent small children from accidentally discharging the device and injuring themselves? Yes, there are two distinct safety features on the Yellow Jacket that are designed to stop a child from tampering with the.  First is the safety switch on the side of the device that must be turned off before the device becomes active. Second is the Yellow Jacket safety cover that slides up and over the electrodes when you are not in a situation in which you feel threatened and may need to use the Yellow Jacket. We encourage all of our customers to educate all of their family members about their “new iPhone case” and the pain it can cause if tampered with.

6)      Can I stun my ear while I am on a phone call? If used properly, the Yellow Jacket should not come in contact with any part of your body while on a phone call. Because stun guns have to essentially make contact with the skin in order to shock a human we designed the device to face up and away not down and in. The safety cover should also prevent unintentional shocks from occurring. There are always exceptions that we cannot account for. Please be mindful that this is not a traditional iPhone case!

7)      If I engage the Yellow Jacket’s stun gun feature during a phone call will I lose the call? We have tested our prototype for this type of interference over the last few months and to our knowledge the answer is NO. There are always exceptions when it comes to technology, but the electricity produced by the Yellow Jacket does not seem to interfere with cellular or wi-fi signals. We will continue testing the product as each new model is released.

Be expecting to receive an email by the end of the business day on Friday, August 3rd asking you to specify your color and/or shirt size. We are very grateful for the overwhelming positive support and are very happy at how well received Yellow Jacket has been, and once again send a sincere THANK YOU to our funders who made our dream of protecting you possible!
If you want a Yellow Jacket and didn't get one during our campaign, you can go to our website and sign up for our mailing list and we will let you know when and where you can get yours.

By reaching our goal, not only will we be able to fulfill our pre-orders, but we will also be able to begin R&D on the iPhone 5 and Android Yellow Jacket models as well as bring all development in-house! Please share Yellow Jacket with your network and tell everyone you know who wants one to purchase now and help us protect you!

After our campaign ends, we will send an email to all funders thanking them for their contribution and asking them to specify their color/shirt size. If you would like to purchase a Yellow Jacket post campaign before they are available in stores, you will be able to do so via our direct website:

We have reached our minimum goal and are pleased to announce production WILL BEGIN upon the completion of our campaign! We will send an email post campaign to our funders thanking you guys for your help and asking you to specify your color, so do not worry about selecting it when you order.

We will also refund anyone who has ordered a product to a region that is restricted. (Although we originally listed Canada, we are unable to ship Yellow Jacket to Canada currently due to legal restrictions. We apologize and hope we can soon protect Canadians as well). Yellow Jacket can be taken to airports, but it must be checked in your luggage and not carried in a carry on. We have spoken with Homeland Security and they verify that this device can be checked in baggage but not carried through screening.

Finally as a thank you and to demonstrate Yellow Jacket in action, we leave you with this jewel - co-founder Sean Simone shocking co-founder Seth Froom during their pitch presentation: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pizRlEXvbdc

3)      Are their certain venues that don’t allow stun guns to be carried on premises? Even in states that allow stun guns, please be mindful of airports, courthouses and other venues that are prohibit electroshock weapons. While travelling through a public airport, you will be required to check your Yellow Jacket into your checked bag and retrieve it at your destination.

4)      Will this device actually protect my phone? Yes! We have designed this product to serve two purposes for its owner: 1) protect the owner and their assets 2) protect the phone from damage. Don’t go getting any crazy ideas like going swimming with your iPhone 4. The Yellow Jacket’s primary purpose is not water resistance but impact resistance combined with a self-protection device.

5)      Are there safety features on this device that will prevent small children from accidentally discharging the device and injuring themselves? Yes, there are two distinct safety features on the Yellow Jacket that are designed to stop a child from tampering with the.  First is the safety switch on the side of the device that must be turned off before the device becomes active. Second is the Yellow Jacket safety cover that slides up and over the electrodes when you are not in a situation in which you feel threatened and may need to use the Yellow Jacket. We encourage all of our customers to educate all of their family members about their “new iPhone case” and the pain it can cause if tampered with.

6)      Can I stun my ear while I am on a phone call? If used properly, the Yellow Jacket should not come in contact with any part of your body while on a phone call. Because stun guns have to essentially make contact with the skin in order to shock a human we designed the device to face up and away not down and in. The safety cover should also prevent unintentional shocks from occurring. There are always exceptions that we cannot account for. Please be mindful that this is not a traditional iPhone case!

7)      If I engage the Yellow Jacket’s stun gun feature during a phone call will I lose the call? We have tested our prototype for this type of interference over the last few months and to our knowledge the answer is NO. There are always exceptions when it comes to technology, but the electricity produced by the Yellow Jacket does not seem to interfere with cellular or wi-fi signals. We will continue testing the product as each new model is released.",11.0,0,"1 Campaign

Giving Back:  Banana Phone <
column3:
Gearing Up for Gorillas 

Giving back is important at Banana Phone, which is why we're routing 1% of all sales to Gearing Up for Gorillas.

G4G focuses 100% on the conservation of the rare mountain gorilla in Virunga National Park, located in eastern DR Congo, by providing funding and equipment to the rangers who protect them.

Join us in helping provide what the rangers need and make a real difference to the future of the mountain gorilla. G4G has proven that practical assistance can be directed to where it really matters - to the rangers at the sharp end.

To learn more, checkout the award winning documentary Virunga on Netflix or visit the Gearing Up for Gorillas website at www.G4G.co.uk

(C) Jan Ramer

The Team: 

Max, Charlie, and Brian have been best friends for 15 years.  For over a decade they were campers and guides together at Camp Pathfinder, a wilderness canoe tripping camp in Algonquin Provincial Park in Ontario, CAN.  Now it's time to start the Fruit Tech revolution. 

 

Brian Brunsing: Founder + President (San Francisco) is a Sr. Account Manager for Visa Inc specializing in  global e-commerce payment consulting for Fortune 500 and Ecom top 100 organizations. He's also a major Banana enthusiast.  

Charlie Katrycz: Founder + CTO (Toronto) is an AutoDesk AIR (Artist In Residency) Alumni, founder of Loonskin Labs and a prop designer/ fabricator for Walter Klassen FX.  Incredibly big fan of Bananas. 

Max Brown:  Founder + CEO (Buffalo) is the Director of Sales for Garrett Leather Corporation, the world's largest privately owned Italian leather distributor.  Awesome husband, father of 2, gigantic supporter of all things Bananas. 

Final Thoughts

Our Vision is simple

column1: • In today's world, we're constantly distracted by texts, emails, and push notifications.
• Pick up a Banana Phone and call your friends and family. Have real conversations!

column2: >Life is serious and it's easy to lose sight of what's important.
>Live a little! Banana Phones put smiles on faces and start great conversation.
>Not only is Banana Phone hilarious, it supports a great cause as well.
>Order a Banana Phone and help gorilla conservation in Virunga!

Many Thanks, 

Team Banana Phone

www.bananaphone.io

 

P.S. 

Massive thanks to Kim Ford (G4G), Jamie Schiel, Blake Netzeband, Wilder Heuga, and Willem Holzer who went above and beyond in helping us to bring this project to life!

Thank you for your comments and suggestions! We've taken them to heart and have set up a new campaign.
Click Here to see the new campaign!
What if you already backed this campaign?

We've got great news for you. If you've already backed this campaign, you'll be upgraded to a much better version of Geek Wave (we call it the Geek Wave X 128, which has an MSRP of $699 and an Indiegogo price of $529). You just need to confirm that you want the upgrade. Please visit the new campaign, and look for the ""One Dollar Confirmation"" perk.
Compared to the original Geek Wave, Geek Wave X 128 gives you:
• A new expandable SDXC storage slot (up to 2TB).
Geek Wave X 128 still has the same capabilities of the original Geek Wave, including streaming music through it as a standalone DAC.

We'll be rebooting Geek Wave Model S, too. It'll just take us a couple more weeks. You'll get everything that you've already contributed toward, but there will be some free upgrades for you, too. More info will be coming soon. In the meantime, you can help us decide what upgrades to include by joining our Geek Force.

iPhone/Android connector backers

There is no change. You will get what you bought.

Which Radmo should I choose? (click here for full image)

Our idea was to create a new concept of Mobile phone mounts for your vehicle.

The challenge was to create a mobile phone mount using a base to support the electronic device from below.

We eliminated parts that wear out quickly like vacuum caps, magnets or sticky pads.  Instead, we chose heavy duty elastic nylon polymer with a built-in elastic arch to support and fit your electronic device perfectly.

Next we wanted to make sure the CD player is still usable in all mobile device heights, positions and models. A quick install-and-release system  which remains stable even on rough, shaky roads was designed. The design allows for easy access to the charger, USB and audio plugs.

A Digital Keyboard that You Can Customize

The idea behind the COOL-K is to make the change that had to be done a while ago - to change the way we use computers today and take them one step forward.

My name is Roi and from an early age I have been interested in our progress in technology. We are using it as a connection to our friends and family, writing our work and spending our spare time playing games or watching movies.

Technology has evolved over the past 50 years in huge proportions. Back then, no one would have thought that in the year 2014 you wouldn't be able to find a home without a computer. But somehow, there is one tool that has stayed pretty much the same. It's what connects us to our computers - The keyboards. 

The goal here is to create a keyboard that each and every one of us would be able to adjust to his best way of using their computers. And let our creativity be part of it. It will help us complete the tasks that we currently do with our computers in the most comfortable and efficent way possible.

What We Need To Make It Happend

To be able to make it all happen we need to raise $100,000 so we will be able to put it on the market. 

We post this campaign with a goal of $500 so we can spread the messege to a larger audience. We need all the help we can get.

 If we will pass this goal we would be able to put more features to it, such as let you choose its back color (black, white or silver) instead of making it all in only one color - solid black.

If it goes as we hope we’ll be able to make an improved model with a small pad so you'll be able to draw on it with the touch screen stylus pen. 

We are adding some cool and unique perks for all of you who are hopefully going to make it all happen. Get your own ""COOL - K"" a week before it even goes to stores and for a lower price. Meet us in person and add your signature for being one of our most break through funders.


For Another Cool Examples..

*You can create your keys on your gaming keyboard to be animated and change for example the ""w,s,a,d"" keys into running warriors, animated swords, dragons and bring what you like to life.

*When water, juice or any liquid is spilled on the keyboard, you can just wipe it off and there will be no damage to the keyboard.

*You would be able to write much faster on your computer using apps like swift key and hopefully we will make it possible for you to draw on your computer using the stylus pen. 


The Impact

The ""COOL-K"" is going to be affortable for each and every home. 

Estimate price in stores $149.99

We will be able to write our work much faster (just like we have swift key and other writing apps on our smartphones) or even put different icons on your keyboard that you have created so just by tapping them you will easily access the application you wanted.

Gamers will be able to reach a much better performance by improving their coordination, resizing keys, adding or removing them within the keyboard as needed. So the keyboard that you created will fit perfectly to your hand proportion and movement.

Everyone would have his own cool and unique keyboard. They will be able to add animation to them, download different themes or even create a keyboard with only symbols on it. This is where your creativity and imagination take place.

The COOL-K battery is going to last up to 30 hours when fully charged. you can charge it throght your computer, so you wouldn't have to stop using your compter when the COOL-K battery is low. 

You Can Also Help By...

* You are welcome to ask us questions or give us your support.

*Every donation counts! Even the smallest one with your comment is a big help to the campaign.

* You can also help us by bringing your friends and family to support us as well.

column5:
>Somalia's poor literacy rate was long beset by the civil war taking its toll on the Somali citizens for over 2 decades. Now that there is a stable and functioning Federal Government, we need to tackle the literacy rate by providing young children, adolescents and even adults with the skill to read and write.

My colleague and I want to do this by establishing a public library in Mogadishu, the Somali capital city. The library will provide the populace with access to different types of books, DVD's, and other educational material. There will be morning and afternoon classes for library members to be taught how to read and write in both Somali and English. Members will also be allowed to free access to computers and internet use (fiber optic broadband service).

Therefore, we're requesting the help of our brothers and sisters of the Somali diaspora and international community. Founding a library is not easy, but it will truly have a miraculous and positive impact on the community.

Who?

My name is Abdikarim Hussein Abdi. I live in Mogadishu, Somalia. I'm not your average teenager 'cos I spent the first 16 years of my life living in 3 continents - Europe, Asia and Africa. When I came to Somalia last July, I was anxious to start a project that will be beneficial to communities in Mogadishu's Benadir region. And I'm turning to my friends and family abroad to help make that happen.

What We Need 

Here's a breakdown:

column1: • We're trying to raise up to $9,500 USD to kick-start the initiative (I put down 10,000 because of the cut Indiegogo will take). Roughly $1,500 will be used to pay the rental fee for the first 3-4 months. A further $2,000 will be used for construction purposes - lights, tiles, toilets, shelves, cupboards. $4,000 will be used to purchase equipment and furniture such as chairs, tables, sofas, computers, speakers, printers, photocopier, scanner, etc. $2,000 will be used to buy books (Languages: Somali, English, Arabic and Italian) .
• Unfortunately, if we're not able to raise the funds within 60 days, we're going to withdraw the money and approach the Somali Federal Government to donate the remainder of the goal.

The Impact

Some of the services ""The Mogadishu Public Library"" will offer to the community include:
• Access to virtual services (Dictionaries, encyclopedia, genealogy, health, heritage, newspapers)
• Morning and afternoon language classes (English and Somali)

""The Mogadishu Public Library"" will also be a place where citizens in the Benadir region can drop of their complaints or advice for the regional administration, and the library management will surely pass the messages on to the Mayor's administration.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can’t contribute, it doesn’t mean that you can’t help. We would very much appreciate if you donate books, magazines, newspapers, furniture or equipment too!
• Another thing we're requesting is sharing the campaign! Please share the project on social media, for instance Facebook and Twitter. Give them the link to campaign website!
• If you don't have a credit card, it doesn't mean you can't help. You can use international transfer to my bank account:

Account Name: ABDIKARIM HUSSEIN ABDI

Account Number: 104101973

Bank Name: DAHABSHIL BANK INTERNATIONAL

Bank HQ Address: PLACE DU 27 JUIN, DJIBOUTI.P.O.BOX 2022 DJIBOUTI

.TEL +253 311919/311900.

SWIFT Code: DBISDJJ2


If you would like to donate in the form of remittances/money transfer service:

Name: ABDIKARIM HUSSEIN ABDI

Number: +252616969111

Location: MOGADISHU, SOMALIA

Please tell me which money transfer service you used to send the donation, thank you.
column3:
>And that’s all there is to it. Oh, and any inquires, please email me at: abdikarim98@gmail.com

","What:Somalia's poor literacy rate was long beset by the civil war taking its toll on the Somali citizens for over 2 decades. Now that there is a stable and functioning Federal Government, we need to tackle the literacy rate by providing young children, adolescents and even adults with the skill to read and write.My colleague and I want to do this by establishing a public library in Mogadishu, the Somali capital city. The library will provide the populace with access to different types of books, DVD's, and other educational material. There will be morning and afternoon classes for library members to be taught how to read and write in both Somali and English. Members will also be allowed to free access to computers and internet use (fiber optic broadband service).Therefore, we're requesting the help of our brothers and sisters of the Somali diaspora and international community. Short Summary

My name is Phlatt Mclean. I am an Entrepreneur with the intent to save not relish. I say this because I am a soon to be young father of twin children
column2:
and recently there has been many stories of children dying in hot or heated vehicles. Due to the lack of technology in this field I have come up with the idea 'How to Save-A-Life' using technology. I am a Computer Engineer and have recently Graduated from Brigham Young University-Idaho. It has always been a hope of mine to create something that people would use and not only use but help. This device would truly Save-A-Life.

I am anticipating that in order to fund this project I will need $2,000. This will help fund the initial part of my campaign. Once this goal is

column1: met I will be ready to start the major campaign to help mass produce

this device. In my next campaign, once this goal is met, I will have a working prototype that I will be able to deminstrate for you its functionality.

I am confident that you will gain the vision of this device once you get to know it. I am here to campaign because I am a working young father seeking to support his up and coming family. Which means funds are very scarce if not dry. I am hoping that through this campaign you will be able to support not only this campaign but help Save-A-Life. I will be forever grateful for your contributions of any kind.
My hope is to get the BACSA to market soon,
because it is a life saving device. Each year many babies and children die due
to accidental abandonment in a car
column2: and in most cases, the baby or child was

column1: secured in a car seat. The BACSA can help prevent such a tragedy from

What You Get

I am anticipating that in order to fund this project I will need $2,000, this will help fund the initial part of my campaign. Once this goal is met I will be ready to start the major campaign to help mass produce this device.

column1: I say this because I have calculated filing fees will be around $1,000 themselves

I will need to get the materials to fund the Prototype, which includes Software about $300, Protoboard with circuits and components around $100, and I need a car seat and stroller produced which will take me to $200. I anticipate unexpected fees with the remainder. I truly hope that I will be able to raise these funds and possibly more to fund a second prototype. I will be creating and building a working prototype myself. So I will share with you the final project once completed. Thank you
HERE IS AN EXPLANATION OF HOW THE DEVICE WORKS.
The Baby Alert Car Seat Alarm – Smart Car Seat (BACSA) is
the solution to the problem. The BACSA is an electronic device, and/or a Smart
Car Seat that converts from a car seat to a stroller/baby carrier, designed to
sense the presence of a baby or child placed or secured in a car seat
alerts the driver of the vehicle once the vehicle is stopped, the engine turned
off, and the key is removed from the ignition, that a baby or child is secured
in a car seat in the vehicle.
This is accomplished by a sensor of some sort (pressure,
infrared, photo cell, or any other sensing device) place in or installed on the
car seat and/or vehicle. Once the baby or child is placed and secured in the
car seat, the sensor senses the pressure of the baby or child, sends a signal
to the control circuit that activates the device once the ignition is turned on
If the ignition is not turned on with three minutes (or a predetermined set
time), the control circuit will automatically activate the BACSA-Smart Car
Seat. If the ignition is not turned on within ten minutes (or a predetermined
set time), or if the ignition is turned on and the driver has travelled to
his/her destination and turns off the ignition, the BACSA-Smart Car Seat will
activate an internal flashing light and sound and internal alarm (buzzer,
beeper, siren, voice speech, or any other sounding/alerting device) to alert
the driver that a baby or child Is secured in a car seat within the vehicle.
Then, after five minutes (or a predetermined set time), and external alarm will
sound. This is accomplished by the control circuit sending a signal to a siren
(mounted to produce a sound outside of the vehicle, i.e. under the hood), or a
signal from the control circuit can be sent to the vehicles horn relay to

column2: and/or the control circuit will transmit a signal to

column1: a remote device such as a key receiver, pendant receiver, bracelet receiver, or
BACSA – Smart Car Seat can trigger an alarm or alerting
device instantly after the presence of a baby, child or person, secured or
unsecured in the vehicle once the internal temperature of the vehicle reaches a
Finally, if all else is ignored, the BACSA – Smart Car
Seat can be interfaced with an outside monitoring service. This monitoring
service would receive an uplink signal or signal indicating that an endangered
baby, child or person is secured or unsecured in a vehicle, then the monitoring
service can notify the proper authorities.
If at any time during the sensing stages of the BACSA -
Smart Carr Seat, if the baby or child is removed from the car seat, the
alerting/alarming state would be discontinued and the device reset.
Back in or around the year 2006, I found myself extremely
bored with not much to do
column2: therefore, I picked up a magazine to read and pass

column1: the time. After thumbing through a few pages in order to find something of
interest, I found my attention fixed on a woman who seems to be in great pain,
I made this assumption because of the facial expression that she exhibited. The
woman was holding her stomach with both of her hands, she was pregnant and due
to deliver the baby soon based on the size of her stomach. At this point, my
interest in reading the article had peaked
column2: therefore I read it. The cause of

column1: the woman’s pain was not due to her current pregnancy, the woman was suffering
from the loss of her first child. She lost her child accidentally abandoning
the child secured in a car seat in a car. The authorities had charged the woman
with the death of the child
column2: however, because it was an accident, the woman was

column1: In the article, the woman expressed her sincere regrets
for the mistake and loss of her child. Also, she was greatly concerned and
worried of she would make the same mistake with her unborn baby, she feared
that such a tragedy could easily happen to her again.
After I finished reading the article, my heart melted.
Although I have not lost a child in this manner, I could somehow feel the
grieving pain of this young mother. I then thought to myself, “How could such a
tragedy be prevented from happening again?” I am an computer engineer by

column2: therefore I immediately began to think of possible electronic

column1: devices that could be beneficial and help prevent this type of tragedy from
happening to others. I finally conceived a device that could provide such a
benefit, I called this device the Baby Alert Car Seat Alarm – Smart Car Seat
(BACSA). In the year 2011, I filed the initial Provisional Patent Application.
Then, in 2014 I filed a second Provisional Application.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know you cannot all fund this project and I do not expect you to give what you do not have. I will hope that you can spread the word that this is a real, already tested device. This device truly will help Save-A-Life. Help spread the word. Many families will be forever grateful.

column5: >IndieDB    Website    Twitter    Youtube    Steam

column1: Farlight Explores has been Greenlighted so It's awesome, Thank you for all your support and votes, I'm really happy with the results and I'm working on release the game on Steam as soon as possible.
When Farlight Explorers arrive on Steam every backer who has a digital copy of the game will receive a Steam key of the game.
Thank you for your support and comments, I've been working in the demo and finally is released.

Demo Pre-Alpha Farlight Explorers Version 0.7 In this Demo you can save and autosave but player can't load the game or continue. The savefiles generated during the demo will be loaded in the no-demo version, avaible for supporters.

Farlight Explores is a 3D space-sandbox game, made for space exploration, science fiction, resource management and action fans. In this game you can build your colony or spaceship, explore the galaxy, fight against other enemy factions, commerce and more...

When you start the game you choose a planet to start from the hundreds out there in the galaxy map. Once on the planet you have to extract resources to begin building a colony that provides you with the items to survive like food and others. If the colony is secure, you can start building your spaceship to go to other planets to extract unique resources that you need to develop new technologies, or you can also use your spaceship to attack pirates, or trade with friendly factions or discover buried secrets.
Some Concept Arts with some ideas of the future Style of the game

The game is playable, the core is done, if you back the campaign you could play the pre-alpha, but I'm only a programmer and I have no idea of Conceptarts or 3d Design (I did the 3d models and well you can notice that it needs to be better),

So the game is in a point that it needs professional help and this people has to be paid in order to do a good job. I contacted with several professionals of the sector in order to get an idea of an overall cost of the game and I estimated that I could need about 15.000 dollars.
I will use the funds to Improve Game Graphics and Increase the Immersion of the player.

Each 3d asset cost around 80 dollars, right now the game has around 60 assets, that is a total amount of 4800 dollars . I didn't include future assets and the character so the cost would be more. Each concept art is around 400 dollars, I think 10 concept arts should be enough in order to get a global idea of the game, so that is 4000 dollars . The sounds/music I estimated over 2500 dollars. The licenses of the engine is about 1000 dollar. And the rest until the 15.000 dollars could be used to unexpected events.

column2: >Farlight Explorer Pre-Alpha Access will be available for all the backers, The Pre-Alpha contains all the existing features ,so you can get some idea of the game and see how can be with better graphics.
>More than 60 pieces to build your colony or spaceship.
>Travel around the Galaxy with your ship. Control your ship in each location.
>Manual searching and extracting resources with your laser drill.
>Food needs of the character. Food Generators.
>Armor and weapons for your character. Shield added.
>Automatic Turrets. Defend your base against invaders.
>Manual Turrets. Put in your spaceship and control it.
>Oxygen needs of the character. Oxygen Generators.
>Water Pump Station with Water Pipes. Get water for the Food Station.
>Conveyor belts. Transport your minerals to your chests or furnaces.

Design a new Block:  You can design the idea of a new block with all the functionalities and how it will looks like..

Welcome to the Perfect Internet!

column2: >Well, it is not perfect yet, but we are working on it
column3: that is why we need your support. It is our goal to create a perfect Internet experience for every Internet user, no matter who you are and no matter where you live.

column1: Imagine, after starting your Internet browser, you find yourself on the perfect home page, personalized by you. Your news topics, your deals, your games, your bookmarks and messages from your friends and family - all on one page. No spyware, no spam, no boring ads. CLICK HERE to learn more about our vision.

MOST IMPORTANT: We are a company but we feel like a family. Our whole management team consists of members and all our projects, developments and improvements are based on the feedback and proposals of our 400,000+ members from more than 175 different countries.

Our community is growing fast and we are already listed as one of the world's Top 4000 websites by traffic, roughly generating the same number of page views as the good old myspace.com (source: alexa.com).

column2: >Since we started our project back in 2006, we analyzed hundreds of successful websites and tried to find out three main things:

column1: • Are there any disadvantages for the users?
As a result of this detailed research we've created a loooooooong (endless?) list of projects that should be done to create a better Internet for all.
What Do We Need The Money For?

We are proud that until today we kept our projects debt-free and that we did not have to partner with one of the big dogs who would tell us what to do and what not to do. With the help of our members we have invested more than 2.5 Million US$ since 2006 to make the Perfect Internet happen.

Like every other company we need money to develop our projects and to promote them. Some of our projects gain revenue (for example our advertising network and our deals pages) but most of our services are free benefits for our users (for example the personalizable home page, the safe web search, the spam-free email service).
When it is your goal to improve communication, shopping, information and entertainment on the Internet, you automatically compete with the big dogs.
A global social community that respects your privacy?
A global system for artists to monetize their music/videos?
The market leaders in these areas earn billions of $$$ and they have budgets far beyond our possibilities. But we know that it is not their Internet
column2: the bottom line is that it is OURS, because we, the users, decide which websites and services we want to use.

column1: The more money we have available, the faster we can develop and improve our services. With a higher budget we are able to protect our assets by filing more patents and registering more global trademarks.
Here is how we will spend the money. We will...
• ...keep our services free for users from all countries
• ...do whatever it takes to serve our members better

We believe in fairness and ""The Power of We"". Only together we are strong and as a family we have many strong arms to support those who need help. Did you know that many Internet companies do not offer their services in countries where the people earn less money?

Right from the start our project was open for all users, no matter where they are from. We are proud to be already one of the Top 200 websites in some of those countries, even if we don't make money there.

Beside the good feeling that you have helped us to reach our goals, we are happy to offer you a wide variety of perks, all of them related to one of our projects. Some of the perks are priceless, some of them give you more value than the amount of your contribution but all the perks have one thing in common - they are a big ""Thank You!"" for your support.

Our global team consists of thousands of pro-active members who do what they can to let our vision of a perfect Internet come true. They translate our pages, they give support to other members, they have great ideas how to improve our services, they contact local businesses for our deals pages and they submit new projects for the perfect Internet.
We have an Advisory Board, elected by the members, and we have a team of 15 Directors, each of them in charge for a specific department.

Our company is not structured like an average silicon valley venture. We do not spend money for representative office space, fancy cars and other gimmicks. We are registered in the U.S. but our team is spread all over the world. Literally, we are the first global project that is living the word ""global"" every single day.

And even though we are structured, you cannot compare us with any other company on this planet. You can meet most of our directors in our community, our CEO is named ""Uncle Suresh"" by the members, our Marketing Director composed our theme song, you can watch our Secretary singing in our talent contest and our Director of Public Relations is doing a weekly show ""GEE on TV"".

As we mentioned earlier, we are more a family than a company. If you would like to be a part of our global family, we would be more than happy to welcome you at www.perfectinter.net. And if you would like to become pro-active and to help us to reach our goals, simply contact us.

When you browse our projects, please have in mind that none of them are ""perfect"" yet. Some of them are still under development and have not even started. The others are still in beta phase and they are improving daily, based on the feedback and the ideas of our members.
But there is one thing that all our projects have in common: maximum privacy!

We do not share any members' data with third party companies, we do not build customer profiles based on your activities on the Internet and we do not participate in any ""secret"" governmental programs to spy on users.

By the way, this is not a full list of the projects/services to be installed. We need to keep some of them a secret because some patent-pending or to be patented technology is involved. We don't want to give our competitors any hints and we try to avoid copycats.

perfectinter.net is the central star in our PI Galaxy. Our members set up PI as their free homepage and they customize their homepage to fit their needs. News, games, deals, bookmarks - it is you who decides what to be displayed on your personal homepage!

________________________________________________________________________________

WAZZUB is the only free community that fully respects your privacy. Your full name is displayed to your friends only and none of your activity is tracked or recorded. Set up blogs and clubs, share your photos and videos, meet old friends and make new friends.
Soon you will be able to chat with your friends at Facebook and Gtalk without leaving our pages.

Dreaming of a spam-free email account? Here it is! At mailaxy, our free email service, we run a special software which is learning from your preferences. When you classify an email containing a ""viagra offer"" as spam, the software will automatically block all other ""viagra offer"" emails, no matter who the sender is. Put your doctor on your preferred senders list and his emails will always get through to you. Within a short time frame, mailaxy will know exactly which emails you want to receive.

Additionally, we are not reading your emails like the common email providers do. CLICK HERE for a news article about privacy with common email services.

________________________________________________________________________________

Imagine you need an expert's advice, NOW, no matter what time it is. Experts Online will be an exclusive community of experts such as Doctors, Lawyers, Consultants and more.

column2:

column1: ""I Wanna Be Famous!"" is the world's first interactive global talent contest on the Internet. Contestants compete in 1,000's of 1-on-1 battles where the audience votes for the winners. If you are a singer, songwriter, musician or have any other special talent, ""I Wanna Be Famous!"" is your place to be! Or simply become a judge and vote on battles.

It is our plan to add a radio station and an MP3 Download Shop to our services to support the artists. 70% of download revenues will be passed to the artists, keeping them independent from major labels. IWBF is free to participate for judges and artists.

column2: at IDS you don't have to pay for bids. When you see a desired item at a convenient price, simply hit the DEAL button and it is yours. But you have to be careful: the prices change by the minute. You will see, our secret patent-pending software makes online shopping FUN and EXCITING!

","Welcome to the Perfect Internet!
Well, it is not perfect yet, but we are working on it
column2: that is why we need your support. It is our goal to create a perfect Internet experience for every Internet user, no matter who you are and no matter where you live.

column1: Imagine, after starting your Internet browser, you find yourself on the perfect home page, personalized by you. Your news topics, your deals, your games, your bookmarks and messages from your friends and family - all on one page. No spyware, no spam, no boring ads. CLICK HERE to learn more about our vision.

MOST IMPORTANT: We are a company but we feel like a family. Our whole management team consists of members and all our projects, developments and improvements are based on the feedback and proposals of our 400,000+ members from more than 175 different countries.

Our community is growing fast and we are already listed as one of the world's Top 4000 websites by traffic, roughly generating the same number of page views as the good old myspace.com (source: alexa.com).
Since we started our project back in 2006, we analyzed hundreds of successful websites and tried to find out three main things:
Are there any disadvantages for the users?
As a result of this detailed research we've created a loooooooong (endless?) list of projects that should be done to create a better Internet for all.
What Do We Need The Money For?

We are proud that until today we kept our projects debt-free and that we did not have to partner with one of the big dogs who would tell us what to do and what not to do. With the help of our members we have invested more than 2.5 Million US$ since 2006 to make the Perfect Internet happen.

Like every other company we need money to develop our projects and to promote them. Some of our projects gain revenue (for example our advertising network and our deals pages) but most of our services are free benefits for our users (for example the personalizable home page, the safe web search, the spam-free email service).
When it is your goal to improve communication, shopping, information and entertainment on the Internet, you automatically compete with the big dogs.
A global social community that respects your privacy?
A global system for artists to monetize their music/videos?
The market leaders in these areas earn billions of $$$ and they have budgets far beyond our possibilities. But we know that it is not their Internet
column2: the bottom line is that it is OURS, because we, the users, decide which websites and services we want to use.

0,"

So Here is the Deal...

My name is Michael Green. I moved out to California from Michigan about 4 months ago, to further immerse myself into the crazy, exciting world of the YouTubes. I currently run a channel called ""The Dangerous Brew"" where I make nerdy action/vfx films. 

www.youtube.com/thedangerousbrew

A couple weeks ago, my Macbook Pro was stolen out of my home, while I was sleeping. Major bummer. I'm still paying on the Macbook...

The worst part of this entire ordeal, was that some of my work was stolen, that wasn't backed up, and I'll never be able to release those videos because of it. That is honestly the worst feeling in in the world. So many people worked so hard on those projects, and can never see the payoff.

I also use my computer for work, as I'm a freelance filmaker/vfx/editor. So while I'm without a proper computer, I've been fortunate enough to use my roommates computer. The downside to this is that they too, use their computers for their work. I'm beginning to overstay my welcome.

So here is what I'm asking...

What I'm Looking to Obtain &
column2:
What You Get

I need a new computer. About 75% of my work, entails sitting in front of a computer, editing video and doing visual effects heavy work. Rendering takes a lot of time and a hefty computer to handle it.

My plan is to replace my 2012 Macbook Pro with something that is just as good, if not better than what I had. To make things cheaper, I plan on buying the parts and building a new computer from scratch. For this I'll need:

column1:
I'm also using parts from an old PC to drive down the costs a bit. Mainly just the case, monitor, keyboard, etc.

Any money that extends past my goal of $2000, goes either into better parts for the computer, or directly back into the channel, which means better props and locations for videos!

Now, Let's talk about what you beautiful, generous people get in return. There are many awesome things you might receive for helping!
• A chance to work with me to adapt an idea you have, into a video for the channel
• Promotion of your work, your business, or yourself
• Bluray or DVD copies of ""The Dangerous Brew"" videos with exclusive BTS
• HD Digital Copies of ""The Dangerous Brew"" videos
• Shout outs in a Special Backer video on the channel
• And last but not least, my eternal love and thanks!

What This Means to Me

Most of my income is produced by what I create on my computer. It's a terrible feeling when you're livelihood is taken away from you.  Backing me will help me regain was taken from me, and let me continue to pursue my hopes, dreams, and goals. I just want to keep making content for everyone. I love creating so much. It makes me indescribably happy, and I hope to keep doing it for a very long time.

I've been pushing to create an audience for the past 5 years. I have had many small successes with videos, and I'm planning on doing bigger any better things, ever chance I get. My videos have been featured on Indy Mogul, Film Riot, Kotaku, and various other gaming blogs.

You may not be able to see how much I appreciate your help, but it's an incredible amount, and I will never be able to thank you enough for it.

Even the smallest donation means the world to me.

No money?

I understand that not everyone can donate. If you can't, then help me out by sharing this campaign with anyone you know that may be interested! I will love you forever, and to me, that is contribution enough.

column8: >We are a couple of regular guys and biz partners from Victoria, BC, Vancouver Island, Canada, and we are excited about offering you our new amazing iBRiD iPhone wallet!

column7: >We are a creative duo that not only want to offer you a unique and high quality product, but we are
column17: >passionate about giving back to our community! :)

column7: >Why?  We want to help people who face mental health challenges, especially youth with support and education offered by the Bipolar Disorder Society of BC - Bipolar Babe Project. We also have close friends and family that have bipolar, so we are very passionate about this cause.
>Check out their website at: www.bipolarbabe.com for the full story and see what this awesome charity is all about! Watch their promo video in the gallery too.

column1: Bipolar Babe is very well known for their mental health presentations to community and especially schools for youth grades 7-12. One young student commented that after seeing the presentation he felt less nervous about meeting his biological father that has bipolar disorder.
You can also contact their Executive Director, Andrea AKA Bipolar Babe via this website if you have questions about the value of your donation.
This iBRiD cell phone wallet is just plain awesome.

What makes the iBRiD wallet so unique? The case is designed to have a front facing display that allows you to access your phone with ease and take pictures without having to open the case! There is nothing on the market that boasts such quality and unique design and it even packages three main card and cash slots behind the phone for your convenience. It creates ease in your life and at the same time is very colorful, stylish and sleek.  It is 100% premium genuine leather so it will will last you for years to come. It is designed for the iPhone 5 and 5S and you can even order for the iPhone 6 and 6+.
You can choose from four vibrant colors - Pink, Purple, Blue, and Black

By contributing to this campaign you will not only receive a an impeccably designed forward facing cell phone case, but we will be donating 20% of all PROFITS to the Bipolar Disorder Society of BC - Bipolar Babe Project.

column2: >You can get your iBRiD iPhone Wallet by ordering on the PERKS links to the right so we know exactly what to send you. Your shipping is also free!

column1: Remember the iBRiD iPhone Wallet is for the iPhone 5 and 5S.
We are also taking orders for the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+.

You will appreciate our unique perks too! For one iBRiD iPhone Wallet, you will receive a soft copy hand written testimonial from a student sharing their personal experience of watching a Bipolar Babe presentation in their classroom! You will be able to experience first hand the Bipolar Babe impact in the schools.

We also have fancy Bipolar Babe Postcards for you that share the nifty super hero logo and they can be yours with the purchase of 2 iBRiD iPhone wallets or more. They are a great stigma-busting conversation starter when posted on your fridge!

For a donation of $1000 or more and by helping us make this happen, you receive your very own Bipolar Babe T-shirt. You get it with a pink or blue logo, your size, and tailored to your style. What a fun way to sport the cause!
Be Assured - You Can Count on Us!

We all know that all online campaigns have challenges, but we want you to know that we are committed to getting your product to you on time, and will provide you with hands-on communication to ensure all of your questions are answered and your needs are met.

You Want to Help the Cause?

Awesome! If you just cannot purchase an iBRiD iPhone Wallet then you have the option to donate $25 to the campaign and still help us make a huge impact in people's lives! 
You can also SHARE this campaign via the Indegogo tools and on Facebook and Twitter.
We have made a target of $10,000 and plan to give a whopping 20% to charity. Remember that is 20% of total profits so that means a lot more than just 20% of the Indiegogo target.
First, it costs a lot of money to run a charity from the day-to-day especially for program delivery:
-Support group rental facilities and utilities- keeping a roof over their head so they can host the groups.
-Insurance for their programs - they have to ensure they are protected and participants too.
-Refreshments for group participants so they can enjoy some coffee and food over the year at group  and feel welcome.

-Promo and print materials for programs are a big deal - pink catchy babe folders with thousands of colored photocopied material to showcase the presentations in packages for schools. Bipolar Babe purchases over 300 pink glossy folders with information to give to Principals, Vice-Principals, and every counselor in the city. They also print off over 2000 feedback forms for kids to relay their experience of watching a mental health presentation.

-New rack Cards with photos and graphic design are needed to explain their programs along with an additional rack card that we share in the classroom and at community events with kids that directs them to help at www.bipolarbabe.com/help After these youth watch a presentation, many realize they need some help and direction, so Bipolar Babe offers guidance online for those after the presentation. They have also had the opportunity to direct students to help in person due to these informational cards.
Without these items Bipolar Babe would not be able to successfully promote and deliver their programs.

iBRiD needs your funds to jump-start our business, we have to pay for stock, shipping, marketing, packaging, and you will be supporting our new innovative business. The profits are all going into the business and we would appreciate this much needed boost.
The Bipolar Disorder Society of British Columbia's registration number is 827676867RR0001 so you know the money is genuinely being donated to this charity.
Thanks for reading, we appreciate your support, and we look forward to hearing from you!
","We are a couple of regular guys and biz partners from Victoria, BC, Vancouver Island, Canada, and we are excited about offering you our new amazing iBRiD iPhone wallet!
We are a creative duo that not only want to offer you a unique and high quality product, but we are very passionate about giving back to our community! :)

Why?  We want to help people who face mental health challenges, especially youth with support and education offered by the Bipolar Disorder Society of BC - Bipolar Babe Project. We also have close friends and family that have bipolar, so we are very passionate about this cause.
Check out their website at: www.bipolarbabe.com for the full story and see what this awesome charity is all about! Watch their promo video in the gallery too.

Bipolar Babe is very well known for their mental health presentations to community and especially schools for youth grades 7-12. One young student commented that after seeing the presentation he felt less nervous about meeting his biological father that has bipolar disorder.
You can also contact their Executive Director, Andrea AKA Bipolar Babe via this website if you have questions about the value of your donation.
This iBRiD cell phone wallet is just plain awesome.

What makes the iBRiD wallet so unique? The case is designed to have a front facing display that allows you to access your phone with ease and take pictures without having to open the case! There is nothing on the market that boasts such quality and unique design and it even packages three main card and cash slots behind the phone for your convenience. It creates ease in your life and at the same time is very colorful, stylish and sleek.  It is 100% premium genuine leather so it will will last you for years to come. It is designed for the iPhone 5 and 5S and you can even order for the iPhone 6 and 6+.
You can choose from four vibrant colors - Pink, Purple, Blue, and Black

By contributing to this campaign you will not only receive a an impeccably designed forward facing cell phone case, but we will be donating 20% of all PROFITS to the Bipolar Disorder Society of BC - Bipolar Babe Project.
You can get your iBRiD iPhone Wallet by ordering on the PERKS links to the right so we know exactly what to send you. Your shipping is also free!
Remember the iBRiD iPhone Wallet is for the iPhone 5 and 5S.
We are also taking orders for the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+.

You will appreciate our unique perks too! For one iBRiD iPhone Wallet, you will receive a soft copy hand written testimonial from a student sharing their personal experience of watching a Bipolar Babe presentation in their classroom! You will be able to experience first hand the Bipolar Babe impact in the schools.

We also have fancy Bipolar Babe Postcards for you that share the nifty super hero logo and they can be yours with the purchase of 2 iBRiD iPhone wallets or more. They are a great stigma-busting conversation starter when posted on your fridge!

For a donation of $1000 or more and by helping us make this happen, you receive your very own Bipolar Babe T-shirt. You get it with a pink or blue logo, your size, and tailored to your style. What a fun way to sport the cause!
Be Assured - You Can Count on Us!

We all know that all online campaigns have challenges, but we want you to know that we are committed to getting your product to you on time, and will provide you with hands-on communication to ensure all of your questions are answered and your needs are met.

You Want to Help the Cause?Awesome! If you just cannot purchase an iBRiD iPhone Wallet then you have the option to donate $25 to the campaign and still help us make a huge impact in people's lives! You can also SHARE this campaign via the Indegogo tools and on Facebook and Twitter.
We have made a target of $10,000 and plan to give a whopping 20% to charity. Remember that is 20% of total profits so that means a lot more than just 20% of the Indiegogo target.
First, it costs a lot of money to run a charity from the day-to-day especially for program delivery:
-Support group rental facilities and utilities- keeping a roof over their head so they can host the groups.
-Insurance for their programs - they have to ensure they are protected and participants too.
-Refreshments for group participants so they can enjoy some coffee and food over the year at group  and feel welcome.

-Promo and print materials for programs are a big deal - pink catchy babe folders with thousands of colored photocopied material to showcase the presentations in packages for schools. Bipolar Babe purchases over 300 pink glossy folders with information to give to Principals, Vice-Principals, and every counselor in the city. They also print off over 2000 feedback forms for kids to relay their experience of watching a mental health presentation.

-New rack Cards with photos and graphic design are needed to explain their programs along with an additional rack card that we share in the classroom and at community events with kids that directs them to help at www.bipolarbabe.com/help After these youth watch a presentation, many realize they need some help and direction, so Bipolar Babe offers guidance online for those after the presentation. They have also had the opportunity to direct students to help in person due to these informational cards.
Without these items Bipolar Babe would not be able to successfully promote and deliver their programs.

column6: >Your not so annoying, back seat driver!

column1:
• What is TrapTap?
TrapTap is a dash-mounted indicator that warns you of any speed trap, red light camera trap, or school zone.
column3:
>
  • How does my TrapTap work?
TrapTap uses Bluetooth Low-energy (BLE) to communicate with your smartphone and the free app and its mapping software on your phone.

  • How big is it?
TrapTap has a diameter of 2.3"" and is about 0.5"" thick
column4:
>
  • Is it legal?
Yes, TrapTap is 100% legal in North America since it does not use any radar detecting technologies. It relies on you and everyone else to help mark any cop or mobile speed trap not already tracked.
column5:
>
  • Are there any laws confirming its legality?
A federal judge in the States passed a law recently allowing apps and similar devices to warn drivers of speed traps: bit.ly/1lvPkHL
column6:
>
  • Does it work in my city?
We have mapped each TrapTap to work in 64 countries. Odds are your location has been mapped.
column7:
>
  • Will it work if no one else in my city has it yet?
Yes! We only crowdsource mobile speed traps and cop radar traps. This requires more users to be more effective, but until then, your TrapTap will work for all other red light cameras, school zones, speed limit reminder, and frequent trap areas since these are pre-mapped and kept up-to-date on your device.
column8:
>
  • How will you keep these red light cameras and school zones up to date?
We have hired a third party team who monitors and scrapes your cities data to keep this constantly updated.
column9:
>
  • How long does the battery last?
We have optimized the battery life to last as long as possible. For most use-cases it will last up to 2 years. But just in case, your TrapTap still has a replaceable battery. Just open the back and replace it with regular coin cell batteries.
column10:
>
  • How can TrapTap have such a long battery life?
TrapTap works passive mode where it will be turned off all the time until it connects to your phone.
column11:
>
  • How many TrapTap's can I have to one device?
Each smartphone will be able to connect to a maximum of 2 TrapTaps.
column12:
>
  • How do I attach my TrapTap to a surface?
TrapTap comes with a double sided adhesive so you can stick it to any surface. If it gets dirty, just wash it with soap and it will be as good as new. We also offer many magnetic mounting accessories.
column13:
>
  • How many functions can I perform with my TrapTap?
You can perform two different functions for TrapTap – Click (silence a trap) and Double Click (set/remove a trap).
column14:
>
  • Will you offer any other mounting types?
Yes, we offer multiple ways to mount your TrapTap. Choose between the magnetic car vent, 360º magnetic swivel, and the flat magnetic mount.
column15:
>
  • How do I mount it to my motorcycle?
We are in the process of creating the perfect mount for all you motorcyclers. 2017 Release.
column16:
>
  • Will there be color options?
There are many different color options to choose from. Please see campaign above to view colors.
column17:
>
  • What phones does it work on?
TrapTap will work on IOS and Android.
column18:
>
  • Do I have to connect my phone every time?
No! Your TrapTap knows your phone and will automatically connect each time you enter your car. Now that's hands-free!
column19:
>
  • Are there apps that already do this?
Yes there are other apps that do this. However, this is hands-free and not distracting (much easier than always having to launch an app). You won't get a ticket if caught using this since it is safer than using a phone.
column20:
>
  • What about radar detectors or GPS units?
TrapTap offers a solution that is both inexpensive and not illegal. Plus camera locations are constantly updated with no need to plug in, download, and update your device.
column21:
>
  • I’m worried about my privacy. How does TrapTap handle my data? Do they see any information about my location?
We don’t store or share any location data on our server. It’s a one-way stream - We compare current location of the user to a series of points of interests that are streamed to the device.
column22:
>
  • Can I still use TrapTap if I have other Bluetooth connected devices?
Yes you can! Your TrapTap will still be able to work alongside your smart watch, car's Bluetooth sync, wireless speakers, etc.

column1: TrapTap is a simple and stylish wireless button that warns you of speed traps, red light cameras, and school zones by flashing different colors. Best yet, it has a 2-year battery life!
It already knows the location of every red light camera and school zone but relies on its community of users to mark the location of mobile and radar traps.

TrapTap is completely legal (not a radar detector) and acts like your personal co-pilot, constantly warning you of danger. To us, he is like our little buddy who always sits shotgun. It simply sits on your dash and is designed to save you cash.
The purchase of 1 TrapTap is far less than the cost of 1 speeding ticket. The average person spends $300 in tickets or more a year. That is a life savings of over $12,000!
Even if you don't get a lot of tickets, TrapTap could save you the possibility of getting that ""surprise"" ticket when you least expect it.
With being dangerous and illegal to use mobile apps while driving, we found a better way to save you from those speeding tickets and add some safety in your life.
TrapTap Has Been Pre-Mapped In The Following Countries:
TrapTap adapts to fit your lifestyle. Have it blink when you come near a trap or only if you're speeding near one.
To set a trap, double tap your TrapTap.
Same goes for clearing traps that are no longer there. Just tap it twice.
Simply ""snooze"" your TrapTap alerts by clicking the top button once.
Your TrapTap is connected to your phone and uses its GPS and the TrapTap app to send the device notifications. Connect the free app once and never have to touch it again.
Your TrapTap comes with a reusable sticky pad. You can stick it almost anywhere in your car.
Easily move it from car to car.
You will be able to customize your TrapTap and select accessories in an email survey that will be sent after you complete your purchase.
Your TrapTap comes with a reusable sticky pad, but these great accessories make it even easier to move and mount your TrapTap anywhere:
Well simply speaking, you and everyone who has a TrapTap is officially apart of the TrapTap Army. Congratulations Private! ""Salute""

We rely on you and the community to help warn drivers of those mobile speed and radar traps. We know the location of each red light camera and school zone, and rely on each other to help find the rest.
They say the average cops issues $300,000 worth of speeding tickets each year... Yikes.
Image Source: CJ Pony Parts www.cjponyparts.com is not affiliated with TrapTap Inc.

Our team has spent months building, testing, and perfecting TrapTap to get to the design we have today. Our journey has been epic (with a few speeding tickets for testing) and below you can see how we progressed through our different prototype stages to finally bring you TrapTap.

In October, we partnered with a design firm that has built products sold in Apple stores with manufacturing facilities in Winnipeg and Texas. We spent numerous hours testing and recalibrating as you can see below.
After finding the right design and sourcing out the correct components and LED's, we finally had a product ready for production.
