Here you find detailed information about general facts, frequencies, size and AMP SPL curve.

We worked for more than three years to redevelop and optimize the newest generation of XOUNTS. We used the time since our first kickstarter campaign to check up the quality of our products again. We optimized the cooperation between us and our suppliers and also worked on the techniques of our products to ensure the quality. Now our partners and we are ready to go and all of the tools and procedures for production are all set.
In order to finally get going we need your support: Our vision of the XOUNTS 2.0 can only be realized by producing a high number of pieces and doing a consequent and hard investment. Backers like you, who believe in our idea, are crucial for our success.
By manufacturing a generation of XOUNTS before, we have lots of experience concerning production and fulfillment. But of course every production process might cause complications and disturb our timetable. To reduce this risk, we only cooperate with selected partners and consultants, and our engineers and product managers constantly keep in touch with them to be always up-to-date.
On our journey to the new era of XOUNTS we definitely expect surprises in one way or another. But we guarantee: Our team is highly motivated and works professionally, thus we will easily solve every challenge. Finally, we all pursue one common target:
We want to produce the best XOUNTS ever – and we want you to receive and enjoy it just in time.

FAQ

What do I get from a XOUNTS?

XOUNTS is a unique combination of wireless sound system, ambient light source and individual design. It delivers a perfect synthesis of lively, crystal-clear and room-filling 360-degree sound, atmospheric light and your very own Style Cover – all in one single elegant pyramid that gives no hint at its true potential. And because the outer wrapper (called Style Cover) can be swapped with another design in a minute, XOUNTS will always adapt to your very own taste, style and interior design. Using patented flat panel speaker technology, XOUNTS emits sound with its entire surface and in all directions, not unlike a grand piano's sounding board, and provides a truly unique listening experience. Wireless sound from your smartphone, MP3Player, TV or radio is also easy to handle with your Xounts – just connect your device through Bluetooth or Apple AirPlay and enjoy!

What is XOUNTS?

The XOUNTS sound system is the perfect combination of stereo sound, atmospheric light and individual design. With its patented flat panel speaker technology XOUNTS emits its sound along its entire surface and in all directions for a 360-degree sound experience. The XOUNTS sound simply is unique.

Why should I definitely buy a XOUNTS?

XOUNTS offers you a music experience for all senses – and it fits your life perfectly: XOUNTS connects wirelessly with your smartphone, MP3 player, TV or radio. Moreover, the design of your XOUNTS is completely defined by you. Either you choose one oft the exchangeable style covers or you can simply design your own individual one. Super-easy. Super XOUNTS.

From which sources can I play music on my XOUNTS and how do I connect them?

Very good questions and our answer is even better: Your XOUNTS plays music from virtually any source device available. Plus you have three different options to connect your XOUNTS: The most classic way is to link it by audio cable. Even better is our wireless option, which you can use via Bluetooth, Smartphone, MP3 player, TV or radio. XOUNTS also makes it possible to integrate your Apple AirPlay or different wireless modules like Sonos directly in its housing. Zero cable tangle. Full sound.

Can I connect my XOUNTS to my hi-fi system?

Yes, for sure. With its 3,5 mm jack plug you can connect your XOUNTS directly with your hi-fi system and use it as wireless streamer. Or you link both via Bluetooth or Apple AirPlay. (This may require optional modules or adapter cables.)

Does XOUNTS also work with Spotify, Amazon Cloud Player, iTunes or similar music providers ?

Lieblingsmusikanbieter via Bluetooth, Wireless oder Audiokabel mit XOUNTS verbinden – und genießen. Your XOUNTS functions with any music service or source. Simply connect your favorite one via Bluetooth, wireless or audio cable with your XOUNTS – and enjoy.

When I stream music wirelessly with my XOUNTS, can I also play it via my existing hi-fi system?

Your XOUNTS has a jack plug, thus you can connect it easily to your hi-fi system or any active loudspeaker and use it as a wireless streamer.

Can I connect my XOUNTS wirelessly to my smartphone?

Yes, you can easily stream music wirelessly to your XOUNTS. This is how: Just order your XOUNTS with our optional modules for whatever device you wish. Your XOUNTS. Your choice!

Can I link my XOUNTS to my TV?

Of course you can connect any TV with an analogue audio output (Stereo RCA) or a headphone output to your XOUNTS. And it‘s worth it: The common flat screen TVs only have small loudspeakers with weak sound. XOUNTS instead turns your home into a cinema with its unique stereo sound. That’s the sound you deserve!

I don‘t have any devices that support a wireless connection. What can I do?

No problem at all: First of all, your XOUNTS has a cable junction for an easy and quick connection. You can also use so-called USB audio dongles for your USB or audio output (2 x RCA or 3,5 mm jack plug). These dongles help to connect your XOUNTS wirelessly with your devices.

I would like to hear music in more than one room at the same time – is this possible with XOUNTS?

Yes, it is. With our optional multiroom modules you can connect up to eight XOUNTS with each other in different rooms.

Can I also use my XOUNTS outdoors?

Your XOUNTS is a lightweight with only six kilogram, thus you can transport it and set it up anywhere – even outdoors. Of course it is important for your XOUNTS to stay in a dry and safe place.

How much power does my XOUNTS have?

Your XOUNTS works with powerful 80 watt of amplification. 40 watt are used by the flat panel speakers and 40 watt by the subwoofer.

How do I control volume and sound on my XOUNTS?

If you use your XOUNTS wirelessly, e.g. via Bluetooth or Apple AirPlay, you can adjust volume and sound with your smartphone respectively with any other device. On the base of your XOUNTS there is also a volume control as well as a bass control to directly adjust low frequencies.

What material is the base of my XOUNTS made of?

The base of your XOUNTS consists of high quality synthetic with a matt finish – available in black or white - to make it stylish and robust at the same time.

What other variations of XOUNTS are available? - for example smaller or bigger shapes?

Right now we put all our passion and knowledge into this new generation of XOUNTS. Therefore we currently do not have any other sizes or shapes of XOUNTS. Of course we keep you updated as soon as we have developed new variations.

What will my XOUNTS cost?

XOUNTS is as individual as you are. It is on you to define your XOUNTS from its features to its design to make it fit into your life. This also means that your wishes determine the price of your XOUNTS. Have a look at the packages above for all possible varieties.

How can I customize my XOUNTS?

You decide how your XOUNTS fits into your life best. For this, we offer numerous options to individualize. For example: Your XOUNTS. Your Sound. To enjoy your music wirelessly, you can equip your XOUNTS with optional modules for Bluetooth, Apple AirPlay, Sonos and many more. Your XOUNTS. Your Light. You can choose between our ecofriendly energy saving lamp or our LED multicolor bulb for a light spectacle of two million colors moving to the rhythm of your music. Furthermore, XOUNTS works with all illuminants controlled by Apps. Your XOUNTS. Your Design. Additionally to our standard design you can also pick some creative style covers. Or you even create your own design and we print it for you.

Do I need a specific app for my smartphone to use my XOUNTS?

Your XOUNTS works smoothly with all music apps on your smartphone, thus you don‘t need any extra apps. Just integrate your XOUNTS into your existing infrastructure or connect your smartphone via Bluetooth with your XOUNTS.

Does my XOUNTS function in every country?

Yes, of course. Your XOUNTS works in every country, because it has a flexible switch-mode power supply which is compatible with all common voltages.

Why do you already have so many pictures of XOUNTS in real life? I thought it hasn’t been produced yet?

Our story of succes already started a few years ago with the first generation of XOUNTS. This previous model already won many fans and convinced in numerous tests. Furthermore we presented XOUNTS within events, cooperation and other activities. Thus we collected a lot of pictures and videos of XOUNTS in action. For the new generation we checked and improved every detail of your XOUNTS and are proud to announce an even better experience of sound and design. Our motto: Proven Concept – Crucial Improvements.

What is the difference between the first and the second generation of XOUNTS?

Proven Concept – Crucial Improvements   The first generation of XOUNTS was already a great product that received many test awards and enthusiastic feedback from happy customers. Now the brand-new second generation of XOUNTS has been improved in virtually every aspect to provide an even better music and design experience.  Acoustics Both the exciters and the material of the sound pyramid have been newly designed according to latest developments in technology and research. As a result the new XOUNTS covers a broader frequency range, is able to provide more volume with less distortion and creates an even more impressive 360-degree sound field. The base unit has also been completely reworked: now it is more sturdy and robust and houses a larger subwoofer (6.5“) as well as a new bass reflex design. Therefore the new generation of XOUNTS delivers deeper, louder and more controlled bass that integrates better with the sound emitted by the sound pyramid.   Mechanics Maybe the most important improvement of the newest generation of XOUNTS is the solid locking mechanism that secures the sound pyramid to the base unit. This not only adds a lot of stability to the XOUNTS to be carried and placed elsewhere easily, but it also helps to improve the sound quality by avoiding unwanted vibrations. Another novelty are the magnets to hold the pyramid’s tip in place.    Electronics The internal electronics have also been completely overhauled for the new generation of XOUNTS. Now it features Digital Signal Processing (DSP) that allows finer tuning of the system's sound. Also new are the AUX output and the USB input for direct playing of music files.   It might be very similar to the first generation of XOUNTS on first sight but XOUNTS 2.0 is a completely new product! It's performance has been vastly improved by a huge engineering effort which took more than two years. All materials and components have been upgraded and the entire structure is much more sturdier now. All this contributes to the dramatic improvement of sound performance. It is simply the best XOUNTS possible right now. Just have a listen and convince yourself!

I don‘t see any loudspeaker on my XOUNTS – where does the music come from?

Your XOUNTS emits the sound with its entire surface and pushes it in every direction for a unique sound experience. Using a patented flat panel speaker technology the XOUNTS principle is not unlike a pianos sounding box. For perfect sound on low frequencies your XOUNTS is equipped with a 6,5” subwoofer.

Does my XOUNTS produce real stereo sound?

Using patented flat panel speaker technology, your XOUNTS emits all components of a stereo signal equally in every direction. This means: Simply enjoy true 360-degree stereo sound in every corner of your room.

Does my XOUNTS have an extra subwoofer?

Yes, for sure! A 6,5 inch powerful subwoofer in the base of your XOUNTS produces an extra intensive bass. Plus: The XOUNTS reflection system supports the low frequencies of your music in perfection.

How do I know that my XOUNTS will sound great?

Perfection is our goal! That is why we developed a new generation of your XOUNTS and thereby improved every little detail. The first generation already scored high in many tests. Now we bring the XOUNTS principle to the next level: You will love the sound of your XOUNTS! YOUR SOUND. YOUR LIGHT. YOUR DESIGN. –

How does my XOUNTS fulfill its promise?

Your XOUNTS works with a patented flat panel speaker technology, which gives us the possibility to use its body for sound and light at the same time. In addition you can change its outer shell quickly, easily and at any time. Sound, light and design of your XOUNTS are made to follow your life, your wishes and your style. That’s what makes the XOUNTS sound system truly unique.

How many XOUNTS do I need for one room?

Your XOUNTS even fills bigger rooms with brilliant sound. If you want more music power you can of course order another XOUNTS anytime customized to your needs. With our optional modules for wireless connection your XOUNTS easily interlink and make your music pleasure perfect.

What size of room is perfect for XOUNTS to fill?

Your XOUNTS fills any normal-sized room with fantastic 360-degree sound by using its patented flat panel speaker technology: XOUNTS emits your music equally in every direction with its whole surface. Only in very large rooms with more than 50 square meter or if you want to play your music extra-loud an additional XOUNTS might be the perfect complement.

Do I need two XOUNTS for stereo sound?

Using patented flat panel speaker technology, your XOUNTS emits every component of a stereo signal and fills your room with 360-degree sound, thus you don‘t need a second XOUNTS, although having another one definitely is a statement.

Can I also connect two XOUNTS as mono loudspeaker?

Already one XOUNTS fills your room with full stereo sound. If you still want to use two XOUNTS as a stereo pair, no problem. You simply need two Y-cables to connect the left and the right channel of your audio signal to your XOUNTS.

Do I need to keep a certain distance to walls when placing my XOUNTS?

Your XOUNTS emits its sound equally in every direction, thus there are no specific requirements for its position. It is completely up to you: Place your XOUNTS where it looks best.

Do I need a wireless remote control app or an extra remote control for my XOUNTS?

Your XOUNTS is as easy as stylish: You can simply control it with your smartphone via Bluetooth/Apple AirPlay and thus don’t need an extra App or remote control.

Is it possible, that my XOUNTS changes the light in the rhythm of the music?

For sure! Within our multicolor option we equip your XOUNTS with a remote-controlled LED multicolor bulb. This special illuminant does not only show about two million colors, but also makes them dance in the rhythm of your music. Have a look at our packages. Some of them offer you the multicolor option inclusively.

Can I also use my XOUNTS only as a lamp?

Of course! XOUNTS fills your room with great atmospheric light – even if you don’t want to listen to music for once. That’s why the switches for music and light are separate.

Which illuminant is right for my XOUNTS?

The standard version of your XOUNTS will be delivered with a warm-white LED bulb. In addition we offer you a spectacular upgrade in terms of light: our LED multicolor bulb. This special illuminant does not only show two million colors, but also makes them dance in the rhythm of your music. Have a look at our Kickstarter packages. Some of them offer you the multicolor option inclusively.

Can I use different colored illuminants for my XOUNTS?

Of course! As standard your XOUNTS is equipped with a warm-white LED bulb to highlight your design perfectly. Moreover we offer you our LED multicolor bulb. This special illuminant does not only show two million colors, but also makes them dance in the rhythm of your music. Have a look at our Kickstarter packages. Some of them offer you the multicolor option inclusively.

Can I integrate my XOUNTS into my existing infrastructure with LIFX or Philips HUE?

No problem at all. Just replace our standard warm-white LED bulb for your LIFX or Philips HUE and get started. Watch our film „no secrets – pure passion“ for demonstration.

Can I also use energy saving lamps for my XOUNTS?

In fact, your XOUNTS is exclusively made for LED bulb or multicolor LED lamps.

Do I need an additional app to control the light of my XOUNTS?

No, you don’t need an extra app. The standard LED bulb is easily switched on and off directly at your XOUNTS and our optional multicolor LED bulb is controlled by a remote control included in the package.

I like to change my style a lot. Why therefore XOUNTS is the perfect product?

XOUNTS follows all of your personal changes, over and over again. You can set it up wherever you want to and it is always ready to use. And, of course, you can change the look of your XOUNTS at any time by choosing a new Style Cover.

What exactly are ""Style Cover“?

Our ”Style Cover"" are the unique shells for your XOUNTS sound pyramid – tailor-made to fit of paper fibers (Basic Style) or high quality fleece (Premium or Individual Style). Each premium style is handmade in Germany. With them you can change the design of your XOUNTS quickly.

How many Style Cover are available?

XOUNTS offers you numerous design varieties. Within our campaign you are free to decide between three options to get to the XOUNTS, that fits your life best: Either you choose our beautiful basic style made of high quality paper. Or you go for the individual design in premium quality. Therefore we send you all the information and design possibilities at the end of our campaign, thus you can create your own unique style or you can choose out of our current XOUNTS collection.

How can I exchange the Style Cover of my XOUNTS?

Changing the style of your XOUNTS is super easy and very quick. Watch our animation for details.

Is it possible to buy more Style Cover later on?

For sure! XOUNTS fits your life – everywhere and any time. If you are ready for some change, choose one of our Style Cover and give your XOUNTS a makeover. You want to create your own style? Great! We produce your individual and unique Style Cover from scratch.

Do you have minimum order quantities for the individual Style Cover?

Truly unbelievable: We produce every Style Cover individually – starting from only one piece.

How do I choose or create and order my individual Style Cover?

Ordering your own style is quick and easy. All you need is one of our Kickstarter Packages including “Your Design”. Got that? Great! Then get started by selecting out of two possible ways to choose or create your worldwide unique Style Cover : Possibility 1 – DESIGN ME: Simply take a picture of your selected theme with your cell phone and send it to us via email design@xounts.com . Please refrain from sending your design Style until you receive an email with further details. Possibility 2 –  GREAT CHOICE: Of course you can also choose your favorite style out of our XOUNTS design collection. Therefore we send you a PDF with Kickstarter Style Cover ideas for your XOUNTS.

I preordered a XOUNTS, but I did not get a confirmation e-mail. How can I check the status?

In this case please contact us at hello@XOUNTS.com (subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION).

There was an error with my contribution. How can I solve it?

n this case please contact us at hello@XOUNTS.com (subject line: CONTRIBUTION ERROR).

Where can I buy my XOUNTS besides this campaign?

Right now is the perfect time to order your XOUNTS for our Indiegogo special price. The selling in our online shop (www.xounts.com) will not start till the first quarter of 2017.

Why do you have different shipping costs for international delivery?

To offer you the best terms of transport, we work together with a professional team for logistics and distribution, thus we can guarantee a safe and quick delivery to the best price.  Of course overseas shipment is more expansive, but we make it possible. This is why we specified two different shipping zones: EU, US + 19 USD* Rest oft he world 88 USD*

*islands on request

When will my XOUNTS be shipped?

The first serial of the brand-new XOUNTS will be shipped in the fourth quarter of 2016. The actual shipping date of your XOUNTS might vary, but we will keep you always up to date. It´s a promise !

Can I come to Hamburg and pick up my XOUNTS personally?

We work with a full service logistics and fulfillment company and it is possible that final assembly and warehousing won't actually be located in Hamburg. For this reason picking up your XOUNTS personally is not possible. Of course we'll keep you updated if there will be a change in that matter. However you are always invited to have a coffee at our office. Just let us now, when you would like to stop by so we have time for you.

Is there a warranty for freight damages?

There is of course an insurance to take care of freight damages.

Could you please declare a lesser value on the customs form for shipping ?

We totally understand your wish to save money and we know that some countries are asking for high taxes. But being true and honest is part of our principle – also when it comes to customs matters.

How about VAT?

If you live in the United States, no import VAT is due. Customers from other countries should inform directly about the respective local import tax duties. It is possible that differences in the percentage saving on the projected retail price may arise during the course of the campaign. The exchange rate may also vary, with the result that the actual savings and/or market value may be established only at the end of the project.

What are the warranties for my XOUNTS?

XOUNTS will come with a three year warranty against defects. In this concern we are very proud to announce, that the complaint quota for the first generation of XOUNTS was less than two percent. The reason is as simple as effective: We live perfection in every detail. Quality is our passion !

Is XOUNTS „Made in Germany“?

The XOUNTS idea, knowledge, design and our team are originally from Hamburg, Germany. Even our individual styles made of high quality fleece are produced in a small manufactory in Germany – piece by piece. The production of the XOUNTS body with all its technical finesse takes place in China. We regularly visit our production partners there and are convinced of their advanced technical understanding. Yeah,

I'm getting the XOUNTS T-shirt as part of my order. When do you collect my size?

Congrats! We will send you an e-mail at the end of the campaign with further information and to request your shirt size. As soon as we have it, your shirt will be on its way to you.

Are you using sustainable or recyclable materials?

Yes, our product is completely recyclable and of course meets the RoHS Directive (Restriction of Hazardous Substances Directive). Even the plastic of our product contains 10 percent recycled resin raw material. 

If I have some questions, how can I contact your team?

Most of the questions are already answered in our FAQ. If you still have a specific question you can contact us this way:

Question to shipment: shipping@xounts.com

Question to order/Placement of collective orders: orders@xounts.com

Press contact: press@xounts.com

Job contact: jobs@xounts.com

Other questions: info@xounts.com

How can I join the team?

We are looking for talented superstars in Hamburg who believe in our cause and want to pour their hearts and souls into XOUNTS. If you are interested please e-mail your resume to jobs@xounts.com We will be delighted to send you a short information about XOUNTS and our future.

Does your film represent real situations and events, or did you make it up?

The film is based on real situations and events, but for productions and representation we engaged actors.

Why do some people already own the new generation of XOUNTS, although it is not yet available?

We already created a Beta-Version to test it. We use the feedback to optimize the new official generation of XOUNTS.

","Here you find detailed information about general facts, frequencies, size and AMP SPL curve.

We worked for more than three years to redevelop and optimize the newest generation of XOUNTS. We used the time since our first kickstarter campaign to check up the quality of our products again. We optimized the cooperation between us and our suppliers and also worked on the techniques of our products to ensure the quality. Now our partners and we are ready to go and all of the tools and procedures for production are all set.In order to finally get going we need your support: Our vision of the XOUNTS 2.0 can only be realized by producing a high number of pieces and doing a consequent and hard investment. Backers like you, who believe in our idea, are crucial for our success.By manufacturing a generation of XOUNTS before, we have lots of experience concerning production and fulfillment. But of course every production process might cause complications and disturb our timetable. To reduce this risk, we only cooperate with selected partners and consultants, and our engineers and product managers constantly keep in touch with them to be always up-to-date.On our journey to the new era of XOUNTS we definitely expect surprises in one way or another. But we guarantee: Our team is highly motivated and works professionally, thus we will easily solve every challenge. Finally, we all pursue one common target:We want to produce the best XOUNTS ever – and we want you to receive and enjoy it just in time.

FAQ What do I get from a XOUNTS? XOUNTS is a unique combination of wireless sound system, ambient light source and individual design. It delivers a perfect synthesis of lively, crystal-clear and room-filling 360-degree sound, atmospheric light and your very own Style Cover – all in one single elegant pyramid that gives no hint at its true potential. And because the outer wrapper (called Style Cover) can be swapped with another design in a minute, XOUNTS will always adapt to your very own taste, style and interior design. Using patented flat panel speaker technology, XOUNTS emits sound with its entire surface and in all directions, not unlike a grand piano's sounding board, and provides a truly unique listening experience. Wireless sound from your smartphone, MP3Player, TV or radio is also easy to handle with your Xounts – just connect your device through Bluetooth or Apple AirPlay and enjoy!What is XOUNTS?The XOUNTS sound system is the perfect combination of stereo sound, atmospheric light and individual design. With its patented flat panel speaker technology XOUNTS emits its sound along its entire surface and in all directions for a 360-degree sound experience. The XOUNTS sound simply is unique.Why should I definitely buy a XOUNTS? XOUNTS offers you a music experience for all senses – and it fits your life perfectly: XOUNTS connects wirelessly with your smartphone, MP3 player, TV or radio. Moreover, the design of your XOUNTS is completely defined by you. Either you choose one oft the exchangeable style covers or you can simply design your own individual one. Super-easy. Super XOUNTS.From which sources can I play music on my XOUNTS and how do I connect them?Very good questions and our answer is even better: Your XOUNTS plays music from virtually any source device available. Plus you have three different options to connect your XOUNTS: The most classic way is to link it by audio cable. Even better is our wireless option, which you can use via Bluetooth, Smartphone, MP3 player, TV or radio. XOUNTS also makes it possible to integrate your Apple AirPlay or different wireless modules like Sonos directly in its housing. Zero cable tangle. Full sound.Can I connect my XOUNTS to my hi-fi system?Yes, for sure. With its 3,5 mm jack plug you can connect your XOUNTS directly with your hi-fi system and use it as wireless streamer. Or you link both via Bluetooth or Apple AirPlay. (This may require optional modules or adapter cables.)Does XOUNTS also work with Spotify, Amazon Cloud Player, iTunes or similar music providers ?Lieblingsmusikanbieter via Bluetooth, Wireless oder Audiokabel mit XOUNTS verbinden – und genießen. Your XOUNTS functions with any music service or source. Simply connect your favorite one via Bluetooth, wireless or audio cable with your XOUNTS – and enjoy.When I stream music wirelessly with my XOUNTS, can I also play it via my existing hi-fi system? Your XOUNTS has a jack plug, thus you can connect it easily to your hi-fi system or any active loudspeaker and use it as a wireless streamer.Can I connect my XOUNTS wirelessly to my smartphone?Yes, you can easily stream music wirelessly to your XOUNTS. This is how: Just order your XOUNTS with our optional modules for whatever device you wish. Your XOUNTS. Your choice!Can I link my XOUNTS to my TV? Of course you can connect any TV with an analogue audio output (Stereo RCA) or a headphone output to your XOUNTS. And it‘s worth it: The common flat screen TVs only have small loudspeakers with weak sound. XOUNTS instead turns your home into a cinema with its unique stereo sound. That’s the sound you deserve!I don‘t have any devices that support a wireless connection. What can I do? No problem at all: First of all, your XOUNTS has a cable junction for an easy and quick connection. You can also use so-called USB audio dongles for your USB or audio output (2 x RCA or 3,5 mm jack plug). These dongles help to connect your XOUNTS wirelessly with your devices.I would like to hear music in more than one room at the same time – is this possible with XOUNTS? Yes, it is. With our optional multiroom modules you can connect up to eight XOUNTS with each other in different rooms.Can I also use my XOUNTS outdoors?Your XOUNTS is a lightweight with only six kilogram, thus you can transport it and set it up anywhere – even outdoors. Of course it is important for your XOUNTS to stay in a dry and safe place.How much power does my XOUNTS have?Your XOUNTS works with powerful 80 watt of amplification. 40 watt are used by the flat panel speakers and 40 watt by the subwoofer.How do I control volume and sound on my XOUNTS?If you use your XOUNTS wirelessly, e.g. via Bluetooth or Apple AirPlay, you can adjust volume and sound with your smartphone respectively with any other device. On the base of your XOUNTS there is also a volume control as well as a bass control to directly adjust low frequencies.What material is the base of my XOUNTS made of?The base of your XOUNTS consists of high quality synthetic with a matt finish – available in black or white - to make it stylish and robust at the same time.What other variations of XOUNTS are available? - for example smaller or bigger shapes? Right now we put all our passion and knowledge into this new generation of XOUNTS. Therefore we currently do not have any other sizes or shapes of XOUNTS. Of course we keep you updated as soon as we have developed new variations.What will my XOUNTS cost?XOUNTS is as individual as you are. It is on you to define your XOUNTS from its features to its design to make it fit into your life. This also means that your wishes determine the price of your XOUNTS. Have a look at the packages above for all possible varieties.How can I customize my XOUNTS?You decide how your XOUNTS fits into your life best. For this, we offer numerous options to individualize. For example: Your XOUNTS. Your Sound. To enjoy your music wirelessly, you can equip your XOUNTS with optional modules for Bluetooth, Apple AirPlay, Sonos and many more. Your XOUNTS. Your Light. You can choose between our ecofriendly energy saving lamp or our LED multicolor bulb for a light spectacle of two million colors moving to the rhythm of your music. Furthermore, XOUNTS works with all illuminants controlled by Apps. Your XOUNTS. Your Design. Additionally to our standard design you can also pick some creative style covers. Or you even create your own design and we print it for you.Do I need a specific app for my smartphone to use my XOUNTS?Your XOUNTS works smoothly with all music apps on your smartphone, thus you don‘t need any extra apps. Just integrate your XOUNTS into your existing infrastructure or connect your smartphone via Bluetooth with your XOUNTS.Does my XOUNTS function in every country?Yes, of course. Your XOUNTS works in every country, because it has a flexible switch-mode power supply which is compatible with all common voltages.Why do you already have so many pictures of XOUNTS in real life? I thought it hasn’t been produced yet?Our story of succes already started a few years ago with the first generation of XOUNTS. This previous model already won many fans and convinced in numerous tests. Furthermore we presented XOUNTS within events, cooperation and other activities. Thus we collected a lot of pictures and videos of XOUNTS in action. For the new generation we checked and improved every detail of your XOUNTS and are proud to announce an even better experience of sound and design. Our motto: Proven Concept – Crucial Improvements.What is the difference between the first and the second generation of XOUNTS? Proven Concept – Crucial Improvements   The first generation of XOUNTS was already a great product that received many test awards and enthusiastic feedback from happy customers. Now the brand-new second generation of XOUNTS has been improved in virtually every aspect to provide an even better music and design experience.  Acoustics Both the exciters and the material of the sound pyramid have been newly designed according to latest developments in technology and research. As a result the new XOUNTS covers a broader frequency range, is able to provide more volume with less distortion and creates an even more impressive 360-degree sound field. The base unit has also been completely reworked: now it is more sturdy and robust and houses a larger subwoofer (6.5“) as well as a new bass reflex design. Therefore the new generation of XOUNTS delivers deeper, louder and more controlled bass that integrates better with the sound emitted by the sound pyramid.   Mechanics Maybe the most important improvement of the newest generation of XOUNTS is the solid locking mechanism that secures the sound pyramid to the base unit. This not only adds a lot of stability to the XOUNTS to be carried and placed elsewhere easily, but it also helps to improve the sound quality by avoiding unwanted vibrations. Another novelty are the magnets to hold the pyramid’s tip in place.    Electronics The internal electronics have also been completely overhauled for the new generation of XOUNTS. Now it features Digital Signal Processing (DSP) that allows finer tuning of the system's sound. Also new are the AUX output and the USB input for direct playing of music files.   It might be very similar to the first generation of XOUNTS on first sight but XOUNTS 2.0 is a completely new product! It's performance has been vastly improved by a huge engineering effort which took more than two years. All materials and components have been upgraded and the entire structure is much more sturdier now. All this contributes to the dramatic improvement of sound performance. However you are always invited to have a coffee at our office. Just let us now, when you would like to stop by so we have time for you.Is there a warranty for freight damages?There is of course an insurance to take care of freight damages.Could you please declare a lesser value on the customs form for shipping ?We totally understand your wish to save money and we know that some countries are asking for high taxes. But being true and honest is part of our principle – also when it comes to customs matters.How about VAT?If you live in the United States, no import VAT is due. Customers from other countries should inform directly about the respective local import tax duties. It is possible that differences in the percentage saving on the projected retail price may arise during the course of the campaign. The exchange rate may also vary, with the result that the actual savings and/or market value may be established only at the end of the project.What are the warranties for my XOUNTS?XOUNTS will come with a three year warranty against defects. In this concern we are very proud to announce, that the complaint quota for the first generation of XOUNTS was less than two percent. The reason is as simple as effective: We live perfection in every detail. Quality is our passion !Is XOUNTS „Made in Germany“? The XOUNTS idea, knowledge, design and our team are originally from Hamburg, Germany. Even our individual styles made of high quality fleece are produced in a small manufactory in Germany – piece by piece. The production of the XOUNTS body with all its technical finesse takes place in China. We regularly visit our production partners there and are convinced of their advanced technical understanding. Yeah,I'm getting the XOUNTS T-shirt as part of my order. When do you collect my size?Congrats! We will send you an e-mail at the end of the campaign with further information and to request your shirt size. As soon as we have it, your shirt will be on its way to you.Are you using sustainable or recyclable materials?Yes, our product is completely recyclable and of course meets the RoHS Directive (Restriction of Hazardous Substances Directive). Even the plastic of our product contains 10 percent recycled resin raw material. If I have some questions, how can I contact your team?Most of the questions are already answered in our FAQ. If you still have a specific question you can contact us this way:Question to shipment: shipping@xounts.comQuestion to order/Placement of collective orders: orders@xounts.comPress contact: press@xounts.comJob contact: jobs@xounts.comOther questions: info@xounts.comHow can I join the team? We are looking for talented superstars in Hamburg who believe in our cause and want to pour their hearts and souls into XOUNTS. If you are interested please e-mail your resume to jobs@xounts.com We will be delighted to send you a short information about XOUNTS and our future.Does your film represent real situations and events, or did you make it up?The film is based on real situations and events, but for productions and representation we engaged actors.Why do some people already own the new generation of XOUNTS, although it is not yet available? We already created a Beta-Version to test it. We use the feedback to optimize the new official generation of XOUNTS.",32.0,3,"1 Campaign

column1: We all have used a USB flash drive at least once in our lives. They are great for transferring large files between computers, require minimal setup and the transfer speed is much faster than the fastest Cloud storage. It doesn't require the Internet to work and your data is never sent through 3rd party servers. The USB flash drive is great but it doesn't work with your favorite Apple iDevices.

Shipping October 2015

Now to get manufacturing done we need your help. We need at least $20.000 to get a minimum order quantity.

Would you like to watch TV from Brazil, India, Russia, China? It has the guts you need! Do your own thing on our awesome CloudAntenna hardware.

But, like you, we don’t want to give up our favorite TV shows and chase Wi-fi hotspot around town, so we have worked hard on the next generation CloudAntenna for your home or business. column1: The CloudAntenna team have been working on the technology for 18 months and with our partner's and technology suppliers support, we have a working prototype of CloudAtenna and that have been testing it here in San Diego, with our development  team in Ukraine and India. The brains of CloudAntenna designed and developed by one of the largest chip makers. In addition, we have lined up a few alternatives for 4G LTE USB Modem. With their support and technical know how we are marching towards mass production.

We want our entire community to know that the product details may change over the course of the manufacturing process. We want to ensure that we deliver the highest quality CloudAntenna possible. We will keep you updated on any and all changes.

We have several contract manufacturers to choose from, and once one selected we will prepare a solid production plan. We have a strong team, however unexpected component delays and shortages can occur. If this happens, you will be the first to know and we will work hard to quickly solve the problem.
We are planning for delivery in June 2016 accounting for as many worst case scenarios as possible. However, it is impossible to account for every scenario due to practicality
For details on how CloudAntenna works visit: http://www.cloudantenna.tv/cloudantenna/feature...

column1: More details available in Technical specs section at

Do you remember Aereo? The US Supreme Court has shut down Aereo in 2014. Aereo was found to provide ""public performance"" of copyrighted content. Aereo did so by providing the antenna on their premises per user.
CloudAntenna is a device that is user operated on user premises, like home, business, etc. The user can purchase or lease the CloudAntenna and then choose FREE or premium service with it.

FreeAir has been providing the first generation CloudAntenna for over a year. This is our next generation device, providing the ability to watch and record live tv channels, and the ability to record anywhere - your hard drive, PC, network drive, or the cloud. Pretty cool!
How do I get the best reception with my antenna?

All of the major TV networks around the world broadcast their programming for free over the air waves. Depending on where you live, the number of free channels varies. 

In United States you get 20-100 channels, like (ABC, NBC, CBS, FOX, THE CW, PBS) 

In Europe, UK has over 80 channels free-to-air, Germany has over 200 satellite and 12 free-to-air
Today, you can get an ClouadAntenna, connect it and watch live programs for free. Stop paying for TV channels that you never watch.
CloudAntenna uses over the air signal. Please learn more about antennas and digital television from FCC site here.
To find what channels you should receive and how best to position your map you can use Reception Maps here.
You can earn money back on your contribution or even get CloudAntenna for FREE!

For each contributor you refer to the campaign (who gets a CloudAntenna), we will refund you $10 toward your CloudAntenna purchase. If you refer 10 people, we’ll give you a full refund on your CloudAntenna! Refer 20 people and you get two CloudAntennas for free! And so on…! Here’s how you can participate:

- Log in to Indiegogo
- Visit the CloudAntenna campaign page
- Copy and share the URL with your friends OR click the social media share buttons to the left of the campaign video (see example below)
Your campaign page URL and social media share buttons contain your unique referral ID for tracking. When you email that link to friends &
column2: coworkers or share it on social media, you will get a $10 credit each time someone uses your unique link to back our campaign and purchase one or more CloudAntennas.

column1: If you share with a ton of people, and you get credit for more CloudAntennas than you can use, you can hand out the extras out to more friends. And YES, when you hand out an antenna to your friends, they will also get 12 month FREE Cloud TV and World TV service!

Today, you can get an ClouadAntenna, connect it and watch live programs for free. Stop paying for TV channels that you never watch.
CloudAntenna uses over the air signal. Please learn more about antennas and digital television from FCC site here.
To find what channels you should receive and how best to position your map you can use Reception Maps here.
You can earn money back on your contribution or even get CloudAntenna for FREE!

For each contributor you refer to the campaign (who gets a CloudAntenna), we will refund you $10 toward your CloudAntenna purchase. If you refer 10 people, we’ll give you a full refund on your CloudAntenna! Refer 20 people and you get two CloudAntennas for free! And so on…! Here’s how you can participate:
- Log in to Indiegogo- Visit the CloudAntenna campaign page- Copy and share the URL with your friends OR click the social media share buttons to the left of the campaign video (see example below)

Your campaign page URL and social media share buttons contain your unique referral ID for tracking. When you email that link to friends & coworkers or share it on social media, you will get a $10 credit each time someone uses your unique link to back our campaign and purchase one or more CloudAntennas.

If you share with a ton of people, and you get credit for more CloudAntennas than you can use, you can hand out the extras out to more friends. And YES, when you hand out an antenna to your friends, they will also get 12 month FREE Cloud TV and World TV service!",16.0,3,"1 Campaign

You have the world's coolest and most sophisticated notebook. But now, you can't plug any of your things into it. You've waited for that hub that never came. We feel you. That's why we created Branch.
BranchBox is a gorgeous companion to your MacBook that gives you:

When we were designing BranchBox, we wanted to make something that would compliment the beautiful aesthetics of the new MacBook. We started with a machined aluminum body and gave it soft rounded edges. We then bead blasted the aluminum shell for a finish identical to that of the Mac. The BranchBox looks phenomenal with your new MacBook whether it is silver, gold, or space gray.

We then added wrap-around LEDs that not only look awesome, but also serve as a charging indicator. Orange for charging, Green for fully charged. Off when the charger isn't plugged in. Familiar. The LEDs are fined tuned to glow evenly around all corners of the dock.

BranchBox gives you simultaneous charging, data, and video. The custom firmware allows you to plug and unplug your charger while transferring data and video without interruption! Up to 4 USB devices can be plugged in while still connected to your external monitor via miniDisplayPort. Video can be 1080p (HDTV) @ 60 HZ or 4k @ 30 Hz.

We found the 4 USB + MiniDisplay arrangement is both ideal and future-proof for countless applications including: Photography, Music Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Engineering, as well as traditional settings such as school or in the office.
BranchBox has an ideal form factor for travel or fixed office applications. At 13mm, BranchBox is only as thick as the new MacBook.

Why are there so few USB-C solutions on the market so far? The answer lies in delays with custom USB-C control chipsets which talk to the Mac and request the correct charging state as well as enable video and data. Branch has solved this problem by implementing custom firmware on an existing and readily available chipset. We assure you, the same problems that others have had with getting access to chips is not an issue for Branch.
Stretch Goal: $60,000- COLORS! Get your pick of Gold, Silver or Space Grey, color matched perfectly to the MacBook, just like the original BranchBox.

Branch has dedicated computer and design engineers on staff with over 15 years of experience working on hardware projects at some of the giant California based technology companies. When we created Branch, we used our industry experience to set realistic goals at a realistic price point with a realistic delivery date. We have minimized risks by verifying the design works before launching the campaign. Every chip in our electronic design is readily available in mass quantities, so we don't expect any chip supply issues or delays.

column3:
>What is Tinylab?

Tinylab is an open source electronic lab which contains lots of things you usually use when prototyping something. There is an Arduino at the heart of board. The board includes components, modules, circuits to ease prototyping. All of them are ready to use with simple Arduino codes. It is a simple and tidy way to get started with programming your idea and hardware prototyping with the Arduino programming language.

>Tinylab is powerful!
 

 

 

 

Combine all this thing and make your own recipe easily. All of the things are onboard excluding wireless features. They are attachable modules. There are sockets for them on board. Is there a need to communicate something, just attach and code it! All the other things the board doesn't include, there is a tiny breadboard. Disable the connection of pins of onboard Arduino you need, connect them with jumper cables to the breadboard and rock'n roll.

column1: Tinylab’s size is 7.95 inch x 4.56 inch (20.2 cm x 11.6 cm).

Tinylab is a totally open-source hardware project, all the schematics and boards layouts are available on the Tinylab Github repository  licensed under a GNU General Public License v2.0. It's totally compatible with Arduino libraries. There are also Use Cases' example codes in repository.

column2: >

column1: We’ve turned to Indiegogo to open our idea to you and the awesome community of Arduino around the world.  We want to share our passion about this project to you. We have got real working prototypes, not CGI in video and use cases. With your support, we will get this product to market much faster and cheaper. Tinylab is almost ready to mass production, but only your help will get us there. We have expertise in designing and manufacturing circuits, and we have partnered with manufacturers that are experienced in the hardware manufacturing and components industries. All together, Tinylab can reach to people are makers, hackers, engineers all around the world.

Bosphorus  Mechatronics has been working on the diy and robotics since 2010. We have produced lots of diy and robotic boards with our group company Robotistan. We have faced various challenges of production of electronics and robotics and we have experienced about these.

For Tinylab, We have  developed  several prototypes. There were some technical mistakes on the first prototype. We eliminated these as developing second prototype named by alpha. We added some new features for iot applications at third prototype named by beta. Beta version has been working properly with all applications. After that, we did some aesthetical enhancements and Tinylab became a smooth product. Quantity of 25 Tinylab have manufactured already. Part of them have been testing individually by our team currently. Rest of them have been testing by volunteer community members. Even if there was a technical problem, we have ability to solve this rapidly.

Because of PayPal restrictions on Turkey, payments via PayPal in Turkey cannot be P2P, thus we will not be able to receive contributions on Indiegogo via PayPal. The Indiegogo let only PayPal payments when it fixed funding. With this reasons, the campaign is flexible. But this is about manufacturing. So it's still all or nothing for us. If we don't reach the goal, we will refund. That's all.
• Can all Arduino shields can be used with the Tinylab? -You can use your shileds with tinylab. But It will be not neccesary. Because tinylab has many of shields.
• Can I use it on Windows/Linux/Mac? -You can use with these platforms.

• Can I program Tinylab with Arduino IDE or Scratch? -Yes.There is an Arduino at the heart of board. The board includes components, modules, circuits to ease prototyping. All of them are ready to use with simple Arduino codes. It is a simple and tidy way to get started with programming your idea and hardware prototyping with the Arduino programming language.
• Can I use with 9V Battery? -Yes.Tinylab works between 7-12 Volts.

Film it, View it, Like it, Tip it!

Vodwall is the new generation of live Internet TV - easy, accessible and very affordable to self- promote your live videos. Vodwall is the only live video hosting platform in the industry. We offer 24/7  live video streaming players featuring webisodes, music, and extreme sporting adventures and more. You can earn money daily from your friends, fans and random viewers.

Vodwall is an innovative group of young techies, producers and designers who creates a new generation of live Internet TV. Vodwall is a great tool to help communities and individuals show their creativity.
Vodwall is free to all users up to 5 minutes of uploaded live video content per day, and your audience appreciation will manifest in tips!

Vodwall is connected to all the major social media sites to help promote your gigs and events. We are connected to Paypal for you to set up your own account for your tip campaign. This helps you make money immediately through your creative outlet.

Vodwall media hosting website launched in September 2012 starting as a video on demand venue. Now, it has expanded to include a live streaming player as Vodwall TV, an event scheduler, user channels, and a chat box for the ultimate user interaction in real time. Events can be scheduled and announced to users’ networks to watch it 'live.‘ Smartphones, GoPro and Replay XD cams can be used to live broadcast events.
Event Scheduler, Live Chat,  Video Channels, and live Event screen

PERKS to all who join Vodwall: Each month, Artists who collect the most tips, their video will be featured on the HOME page of Vodwall website. We are the only live streaming app and website that actually gives you the opportunity to make money on your live projects online. This is a Big Perk!
This is the actual size sticker that everyone who gives to our campaign will receive in the mail. Stick it on your car bumper, notebooks, bikes, guitars or skateboards.
Stay tuned for our followup status video next week, with Booboo and Koko.

Who is NCASE?
We're two Small Form Factor (SFF) PC enthusiasts from the [H]ardForum that connected while discussing our visions for the perfect SFF computer case.

Why design the M1?
We believe the potential of the Mini-ITX form factor has been stunted by the lack of high performance cases currently available for the platform. We also share a dissatisfaction towards the overuse of plastic, mediocre aesthetics, bloated case dimensions and lack of watercooling support common to many Mini-ITX cases. So we did the logical thing...we designed the product
column2: >we wanted to buy - the NCASE M1.

column1:
Why should you care?
By backing this project you can prove to companies that more involvement and coordination with the PC building community can result in innovative products where previously there had been stagnation.

NCASE M1: A Powerful, Refined Mini-ITX Case
The NCASE M1 is a new Mini-ITX case that raises the bar in performance, versatility, and design for SFF PC cases. With support for 12.5” GPUs, water or air cooling, and a variety of drive mounting options, the M1 offers unparalleled power and flexibility for its surprisingly small footprint, all wrapped in an elegant, minimalist aluminum exterior.

We've spent months perfecting the design using feedback from [H]ardForum community and Lian Li's engineers. Our goal is to take this design to production, and we need your help.

The next step before production is to test a prototype of the M1. The funding goal is the minimum we need to produce a prototype plus a small components budget to test fitment, thermals and noise.

The more funding we're able to raise, the more hardware configurations we'll be able to test for, which leads to a better product. If we achieve our funding goal, don't let it stop you from backing us! Every little bit will help make the M1 better.

Once we've tested the prototype and made the necessary revisions, the next step will be a
column2: >limited production run - funded via a second crowdfunding campaign.
column3: >The retail price of the M1 is projected to be between USD160 - 200.

NCASE M1 Technical Specifications
Dimensions: 240mm x 160mm x 328mm (250mm tall w/feet), 12.6L
Motherboard Support: Mini-ITX, Mini-DTX
Expansion Slots: 3
GPU Support: 12.5” (slot 1 &
column2:
2) or 11” (slot 3)
CPU Cooler Support: Up to 105mm tall
column3:
120mm and 240mm radiators also supported
Drive Support: 3 x 3.5” HDD mounts
column5:
1 x slim slot-load optical drive mount
Power Supply Support: SFX or ATX (up to 140mm non-modular, or longer w/short GPU)
Fan Support: 2 x 120mm side &
column8:
rear mounts
Front Ports: 2 x USB 3.0, headphone and microphone

*Specifications are preliminary and may change.

column1: *Images are for illustrative purposes only. PC components shown are not included.
Q: How can I get an NCASE M1?

A: By contributing to the production crowdfunding campaign, which will be launched after the current campaign has ended and the prototype has been tested. The current campaign is only to help us produce and test a prototype.
Q: Do I need to contribute now to be able to get a case during the production campaign?
A: No. Contributing $10 now will put you on the list to receive a case from the first shipment, but is not required to participate in the production campaign.
Q: Does being on the early shipment list guarantee I will receive a case?
A: No. It only puts you on the list for the first shipment. The first shipment will only happen if the production campaign is successfully funded.
Q: When will the first shipment of the M1 be?

A: The tentative timeframe for the first shipment is August. Once the current campaign has ended, there will be a testing period, followed by the second crowdfunding campaign, and then the production run (contingent on full funding of the second campaign).
Q: Why does it say ""delivery: April"" then for the early shipping list?

A: Because Indiegogo requires a delivery date for each perk. All it means is you'll be put on the early shipping list by April. The actual production M1 first shipment won't be until after succesful funding of the second campaign and manufacturing.
Q: When will the production campaign launch?
A: We expect to have it launched towards the end of April. If you've participated in the first campaign, you'll be notified when the production campaign launches.
Q: How much will I have to contribute during the production campaign to get an M1 case?
A: $160-$200, plus shipping and fees to your country.
Q: Will I be able to get the final production M1 shipped to Europe/elsewhere?
Q: Will the M1 be available to buy some other way than through participating in the production campaign?
A: We have no plans at this time to make the M1 available beyond the crowdfunding campaign.
A: No. The only way to get an M1 will be through participation in the second crowdfunding campaign.

Q: Mini-ITX boards only have one expansion slot and video cards usually only use two, so why does the case have three slots?

A: To accomodate the following:
- GPUs with triple-slot coolers
- Slot mounted accessories, e.g. fan controllers
- Mini-DTX motherboards (which allows a second card in addition to a dual slot GPU)
- Drives / fans / cables (not wasted space if third slot is left unused)

Q: Since it has three slots already, why not just add one more and make it microATX?

A: MicroATX boards are not just one more slot, they are also much longer than Mini-ITX (244mm vs. 170mm). The extra space required for an mATX board is occupied by the power supply
column2:
changing the design to accommodate the larger board would necessitate an unacceptable increase in size (and would result in a layout very much like the Silverstone SG09).


Q: Will the Swiftech H220 fit? Will the Corsair H100 fit? Can two closed-loop liquid coolers be installed in the case?

A: The answers to these questions is a tentative yes based on published specs and drawings, however it's impossible to be 100% certain without testing the actual physical parts. With any type of water cooling setup, the tubing will likely be the most challenging part.

column1:
Q: What thickness of radiator will fit?

A: It's best to stay with slim radiators only (i.e., under 35mm thick), though thicker may fit.


Q: Can a radiator be mounted on the bottom?

A: It's possible, but it's DIY territory. It would require GPU watercooling, a slim radiator (30mm), and slim fans.


Q: Will a pump and/or reservoir fit inside the case?

A: Depending on the parts used, it's possible to mount certain pumps and/or reservoirs internally.


Q: Can a modular ATX power supply be used?

A: A longer GPU will hit the modular plugs, so that's the limiting factor.

Q: What is the case made from?

A: Anodized 1.5mm aluminum.

Q: Who will be manufacturing the case?

A: Lian Li.


Q: Will it come with fan filters? Magnetic ones?

A: Yes. No.


Q: Will the logo be on the side, as shown in the pictures?

A: The current plan is to include an adhesive-backed vinyl decal (AKA, a sticker) with the design shown in the renders, which will be shipped with the case but not applied. You'll be able to apply it wherever you want (or not).

A: We have no plans at this time to make the M1 available beyond the crowdfunding campaign.
Q: Can I preorder an M1?
A: No. The only way to get an M1 will be through participation in the second crowdfunding campaign.

Q: Mini-ITX boards only have one expansion slot and video cards usually only use two, so why does the case have three slots?A: To accomodate the following:- GPUs with triple-slot coolers- Slot mounted accessories, e.g. fan controllers- Mini-DTX motherboards (which allows a second card in addition to a dual slot GPU)- Drives / fans / cables (not wasted space if third slot is left unused)

Q: Since it has three slots already, why not just add one more and make it microATX?A: MicroATX boards are not just one more slot, they are also much longer than Mini-ITX (244mm vs. 170mm). The extra space required for an mATX board is occupied by the power supply
column2: changing the design to accommodate the larger board would necessitate an unacceptable increase in size (and would result in a layout very much like the Silverstone SG09).Q: Will the Swiftech H220 fit? Will the Corsair H100 fit? Can two closed-loop liquid coolers be installed in the case?A: The answers to these questions is a tentative yes based on published specs and drawings, however it's impossible to be 100% certain without testing the actual physical parts. With any type of water cooling setup, the tubing will likely be the most challenging part.

column1: Q: What thickness of radiator will fit?A: It's best to stay with slim radiators only (i.e., under 35mm thick), though thicker may fit.Q: Can a radiator be mounted on the bottom?A: It's possible, but it's DIY territory. It would require GPU watercooling, a slim radiator (30mm), and slim fans.Q: Will a pump and/or reservoir fit inside the case?A: Depending on the parts used, it's possible to mount certain pumps and/or reservoirs internally.Q: Can a modular ATX power supply be used?A: A longer GPU will hit the modular plugs, so that's the limiting factor.
Q: What is the case made from?A: Anodized 1.5mm aluminum.

Q: Who will be manufacturing the case?A: Lian Li.Q: Will it come with fan filters? Magnetic ones?A: Yes. No.Q: Will the logo be on the side, as shown in the pictures?A: The current plan is to include an adhesive-backed vinyl decal (AKA, a sticker) with the design shown in the renders, which will be shipped with the case but not applied. You'll be able to apply it wherever you want (or not).",15.0,0,"2 Campaigns
In the last couple of months we have secured reliable suppliers to produce the next generation of Desktop 3D Printer and CNC Router.
The difference with the ALUMINIUM SUMPOD is it has been fully designed to be a quality machine at a reasonable price.
The basic machine comes with everything needed to start 3D Printing and routing.
1. An Aluminium profile frame construction which makes it extremely solid.  This is important for accuracy.
2. Moving parts that have been milled from billets of Aluminium. Most machines at this price point use wood or plastic.
4. High Quality Stepper Motors on all axis.
The machines also come with an additional heated bed and high amp power supply.
This is the entry level SUMPOD machine made of MDF. It is a simpler version of the original SUMPOD with and upgraded Hotend.
It has been designed to be even easier to build and comes with soldered electronics.
The SUMPOD Basic has a build area of 140x140x100 and comes with everything in the kit to make a working 3D Printer.
This is the culmination of many months work to try and produce an affordable 3D Printer Kit.
This kit can not only be looked at as a way of getting an inexpensive 3D printer but also as a great electronics learning tool. This is due to the inclusion of the Arduino Mega development board.
This is a PLA only machine (although a heated bed may be offered later).
This campaign is to hopefully get more SUMPODs out there to expand the community and also to make 3D Printing cheaper.
All perks will be filled regardless of goal although we hope to be able to take the SUMPOD to the next level with the introduction of the SUMPOD BASIC and ALUMINIUM.

Polso: Send and receive voice commands from your smartphone.

We’re all dependent on our smartphones. But there are lots of times when it’s just not practical to pick up and operate your phone. You could be driving, running, at a show, in the shower, playing a sport... or, it’s simply out of reach.
The point is, there’s a 4 – 8% time gap when we’re cut-off and unconnected from our phones. For many people, these periods are downright unbearable.

Un-phone yourself with Polso.
(Note: image is a prototype and subject to variation)

Supporting both iPhone and Android devices, Polso can perform most voice-enabled smartphone tasks right from your wrist, up to 30 feet away from your phone. Use Polso to answer calls, send text messages, search the web – nearly any voice command, even if your phone was asleep. If you have an iPhone you can fully operate Siri with Polso, and popular voice command applications are supported for Android users.
Since the water-resistant Polso enables smartphone use even when your phone is not physically accessible, we’re sure you’ll come up with even more creative uses!

Polso (Ital: wrist) is for anyone who owns a smartphone. It is not a geeky tech gadget (although we do love those), it’s a simple to use bluetooth bracelet that connects you to your phone at all times. With just one multifunction button plus volume control, Polso simply sends and relays voice commands to and from your smartphone while it's out of reach. It's extremely simple to use and will make interacting with your voice enabled phone at anytime a breeze. Want to send or read a text? Polso can do that! Want to make a list or send yourself a note? Polso can do that too!

The prototype in our video is a real, fully-functional Polso. She hasn't been prettied-up yet, but that's in the works. It does connect seamlessly to both iPhone and Android phones, sends and receives information, and does exactly what we want it to do.
We are in the process of upgrading the circuit board so it’s smaller and thinner than the one in our prototype:
We are also working on enhancing the software that runs on Polso to make it more intuitive to use.

Finally, we are planning to develop an open source voice application for Android and iOS that enables third party programmers to intercept voice commands from Polso and use them to drive their own software.
We have partnered a manufacturing and development shop and have the experience and relationships in place to bring Polso to life. Now, we just need your support to make Polso a real product!

Raising our Indiegogo goal will enable us to focus on developing a strong, marketable product. We'll use the investment to improve the prototype and set up full scale production so that Polso can be sold to everyone. We will also use the funds to begin marketing Polso both online and offline. Our goal is to keep the retail price of Polso low, so this funding round enables a larger initial manufacturing batch which will significantly decrease our production cost, savings which we will pass on to our customers.

Thank you for taking the time to learn about Polso. We hope you’ll support Polso at any level.

OmniCase is a travel-friendly docking station with all the ports you possibly need for your USB-C devices. Superior to those typical dongles with a long tail on one end, OmniCase has a magnetic storage case with strictly tailored slots for secure locking of detachable cables, adapters, SIM card, and its eject pin, decluttering your electronic accessories and preventing any unnecessary loss on the go.

column2: >Hard to Store SIM Cards and Eject Pin

column1: OmniCase gives you 7 ports to connect your peripherals while keeping the host device charged, including 2x USB-A 3.0 ports, 1x 100W USB-C PD charging, 1x 4K HDMI OUT, SD/TF card readers, RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet.

To be travel-friendly, the case magnetically attached to the hub is designed with strictly tailored slots for storage of your small-sized SIM card, Type-C cable, card ejector tool, and adapters in case of loss.

Travelers always find nowhere to put their extra SIM card and are always facing the frequent loss of the eject pins. However, with OmniCase, all these small items are close to your hand when you need them.

The USB-C PD port on OmniCase delivers up to 100 watts of power, which means you can quickly charge a new Macbook or other USB-C devices at full speed while having all other ports in use. (The actual power delivered to the laptop while charging depends on the wattage of the device.) Besides the fast power delivery, this USB 3.1 Type-C female port supports up to 10Gbps data transfer as well, allowing you to move any HD movies in seconds.

Simply plug your laptop into OmniCase to seamlessly stream high definition 4KHDMI video (3,840×2,160 @ 30Hz) to the external HDTV display, monitor or projector, you could enjoy a visual feast with your family on a bigger screen.

2 USB 3.0 ports with 5Gbps transfer speed ensure instant file sharing. You can connect multiple USB peripheral devices (hard drive, flash drive, keyboard, mouse, mobile phone, microphone, etc.) with these 2 ports while keeping them charging at 7.5W max.
The transfer speed of its SD/TF card reader is impressively fast, peaking at up to 104MB/s when reading video and images. Also, both SD and TF cards can be read simultaneously.
*SD slot: Support SDHC, SDXC, MMC Micro, RS MMC
*TF slot: Support Micro SD, Micro SD HC, Micro SD XC
The gigabit Ethernet port is compatible with 1000Mbps/10Mbps RJ45 LAN, which ensures a more stable network connection compared with WiFi.

OmniCase is equipped with a smart circuit and advanced internal components to always keep your devices cool and work at top speeds. OmniCase successfully avoids over-current, over-voltage, and overheating. The surface temperature would stay below 65℃（149℉） even when all the ports are simultaneously connected.

It includes 1* USB-C to USB-C Cable, 1* USB-C(female)to USB-A(male) adapter, 1* USB-C(female)to Micro-USB(male) adapter, 1* Eject Pin, 1* SIM Card Slot

 UrbanKit Pro :
It includes 1* USB-C to USB-C Cable, 1* USB-C to Lightning Cable, 1* USB-C(female)to USB-A(male) adapter, 1* USB-C(female)to Micro-USB(male) adapter, 1* Eject Pin, 1* SIM Card Slot

column2: D, design, production, and sales. We have long been deeply engaged in 3C digital products such as charging, transmission, video, and audio. Adhering to the core concept of “Connect More, Power More”, we always insist on using reliable, practical, and innovative products of a complete range of categories, connecting more digital life scenarios, empowering the digital life of consumers around the world.

New Color Available: Statement WKW 2.0 in Reflex®/Silver
column24: >Custom 3.5 MM Audiophile Cable For Smartphone.

column1:
What is Statement WKW?

Statement WKW is a beautifully designed cable for your iPhone, iPod &
column2: iPad. Built with military grade foil and braid double shielded woven cable, military grade MIL-E-5272 PET Expandable Braided Sleeving, aerospace grade AMS-DTL-23053 heat shrink and Apple MFi certification, it's a cable that’s built to last and what Apple should have made in the first place!
column5: >We have been designing and custom building high end audio cable, smartphone cable and charger for over five years. We custom built our first iPhone cable in 2013 and during this process we discovered that the Apple Lightning cable is poorly designed and constructed
column6:
the cable is vulnerable to breakage, fraying, and according to a ZDNet's report, corrosion as well.  With the Statement WKW cable, we have created a cable that's incredibly strong, durable, elegant and functional. It will be the last Lightning iDevice cable you'll ever buy.


Flexible &

column1: • Much stronger, yet more flexible than standard iPhone cables.
• 4 ft length ensures that you have enough to reach from wall plug to desktop.
• The connectors get an additional aerospace grade heat shrink that permanently straightens both the cable and the connector to providing cable-stress relieve.
Statement WKW 2.0 -  Purple.
Statement WKW 2.0 - Red.
Statement WKW is licensed and certified by Apple's MFi program, It works with every Apple iPhone, iPad &
