column4: >test the cable with both iPhone 6 Plus and iPhone 5S before we ship to you.

column1: June 21, 2014 - Our Exhibition in San Francisco, California

Statement WKW : Available in Carbon/Black (Default Color), Reflex®Black, Reflex®Silver, White, Red, Blue, Purple, Brige, Gray and Clear.
Statement Fidelity: Available in ""Reflex®/Black"" and ""Reflex®Silver"", Carbon/Black, White, Red, Blue, Purple, Brige, Gray and Clear.

Our inspiration for the Statement WKW came from ideas and design that are not common for your average iDevice cables and accessories.  Our research covered other luxury products such as jewelry, high-end headphones, watches, audiophile speaker cable and interconnects.

It is important to us that our cable not only look stunning, but also of high quality and craftsmanship that you will recognize once you put them in your own hands. We have decided on a combination of audiophile cable design concepts, high-end audio fiber sleeve and double shielded woven cable to achieve a clean signal path and durability.
Inside the audiophile style fiber sleeve is a
fully rated foil and braid double shielded  woven cable. It is much stronger, yet more flexible

column3:
/>

The Statement WKW 2.0 has the 8 pin connector, circuit board, and woven cable fully enclosed for an incredibly strong and durable termination. The internal wiring are rated for 4+ Amps!  Whether you are using a standard 12V car charger or a high-power 20 Watt 2.1A (2000mA) wall USB charger, the Statement WKW allows for the quickest charging times possible.

column1: Having designed and built smartphone cables for over 4 years, we understand the significance of how original certified parts ensure quality and safety.  While this increases the production time and direct materials cost, using original Apple MFi components make certain that our cable continues to work with future iOS updates while protecting your precious idevices from incorrect and possibly dangerous voltage and current that non-certified accessories provides.
Lightning compatibility: Compatible with every Apple iPhone, iPad &
connector. This includes the iPhone 6 Plus / 6 / 5S / 5C / 5, iPad Air, iPad with Retina display, iPad Mini, iPad mini with Retina display,
iPod Touch 5th generation, iPod Nano 7th generation and all new iOS devices.

""Made for iPod"" , ""Made for iPhone""  and ""Made for iPad"" mean that an electronic accessory has been designed to connect specifically to iPod, or iPhone, respectively, and has been certified by the developer to meet Apple performance standards.
Connector: MFi certified 8-pin and premium gilded USB.
Cable: Military grade foil and braid double shielded cable,
• Color: Default color is Carbon/Black. Statement WKW is also available in Reflex®/Black, Reflex®/Siver, White, Red, Blue, Gray, Purple and Clear.
What set us apart from the competition.

Before we ship your cable, we will:
(1) Cables will be unpack and tested for charge &
column2:
sync.
(2) Visually inspect for damages.
(3) Both 8pin &
column3:
USB converter pre-treated with DeoxIT® ProGold GxL to improves conductivity and provides long-lasting protection.
(4) We will make sure all cables is working and pass our quality inspection before shipping.

column1: We tested and run in all our cables extensively before delivery to our Indiegogo backer in order to ensure that they get a good experience straight out of the box.

column2: USB converter pre-treated with DeoxIT® ProGold GxL to improves conductivity and provides long-lasting protection.

column1:
Our Story

Founded in 2008, WKW Custom Cable is one of the premiere smartphone accessories and custom high-end audio cable company in the San Francisco Sunset District. We were always fond of old world craftsmanship and has been in a continual state of refinement, seeking not only to make our cable better and better with each generation, but also to create entirely new products that serve the needs of our customers.

column2: >(1) We designed our first iPhone cable ( iTrim ) for an oversea client and introduced audiophile concept to the world of charge-and-sync cables.
>(2) We also helped another Client in Singapore to design and manufacture a stylish iPhone cable ( Designer ) for their Groupon and Livingsocial campaign.
>(3) In 2013, we finally designed and built our very own custom iPhone cable (Statement), 300+ working prototypes was built and sold within 2 months.

column1: • Design – We have already completed our design and the first 300 working prototypes.
• Manufacturer –We have established a great working relationship with our Apple licensed manufacturer in Taiwan with pricing and order quantities confirmed.
• Certification - The cable is already tested and approved according to the Apple MFi program.
Production - As of December 2014, production are completed and ready to ship.
Production - As of March 2015, design and production of Statement WKW 2.0 are completed and ready to ship.

Design and Testing – As of September 2015, we are in the final adjusting and testing stage of ""Statement Military "" aka ""Statement 3.0"" working prototypes. The cable will be ready for MIL-STD-810 testing at the beginning of 2016.

(1) Because we use the highest quality materials available, our direct materials cost is very high. Since we will never sacrifice quality for profits while fully aware that we must be sustainable and be able to grow. In order to lower the unit cost, we will need to buy components in bulk and mass-produce the double shielded cable, male USB &
column2:
8 pin connector by an Apple licensed manufacturer.
(2) The cost of Apple MFi Certification.
(3) The cost of the military grade expandable braided sleeving and cable.
(4) New cable development - Additional funds needed for development of Statement.Military ( formerly known as WKW 3.0 ), Statement.Military will be design according to MIL-STD-810 standard for military applications and Apple MFi standard. The prototype will be ready for testing on or after July 2016.

column1: Like other MFi accessory makers, we are dependent on Apple with the production quantities of the actual MFi Lightning 8 pin connector.
Our timeline is therefore partially dictated by Apple. We will do our
best to push for a timely production.
Warranty policy:We warrants all our cable with a 12 months limited warranty. For more info on our warranty policy, please visit our website at ( http://wkwcustom.com/support.html )

Statement WKW User Guide:It's no secret that the Apple lightning cable is one of the most challenging / problematic cables ever made. The help forum on the Apple website has almost 200,000+ discussions dedicated to how problematic the cord and the authenticator chip inside the lightning plug is. With that in mind, we created a user guide, suggestions and recommendations of what to do / not to do on your cable.
Go to http://www.wkwcustom.com/userguide.html for more info.

Attention:

iPhone, iPod, iPod classic®, iPod nano® and iPod touch® are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries, and Apple Lightning is a trademark of Apple Inc.

""Made for iPod"" , ""Made for iPhone""  and ""Made for iPad"" mean that an electronic accessory has been designed to connect specifically to iPod, or iPhone, respectively, and has been certified by the developer to meet Apple performance standards. Apple is not responsible for the operation of this device or its compliance with safety and regulatory standards.
* Please read FAQ before you make a contributions.
(1) Is the cable available in Micro-USB or in 30 pin for the iPhone 4/4S?    No, the cable only available in 8 pin Lightning connector and works with every Apple iPhone, iPad &
column2: iPod with a Lightning connector. This includes the iPhone 6, 5, 5C &amp
column3: 5S, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices.

column1: No, nothing is unbreakable! Statement WKW were designed to be robust, because both 8pin and USB is hot-pluggable, the connectors would be used more frequently, and perhaps with less care, than other connectors. However they are not unbreakable, both connector is design to break off if the pressure is strong enough to prevent equipment ( iPhone, iPod or PC) damage. This design was made so that both connectors on the less expensive cable would bear the most wear instead of the more expensive iPhone, iPod or PC.
(3) How do I choose the color of the cable?   We will sent a survey via email, and you can choose you color of the cable.

(4) Is the Statement WKW Lightning cable be 100% Apple MFi certified?    Yes, absolutely! It's essential for Statement's to be MFi certified to ensure quality, safety and continues to work with future iOS updates.

(5) Is my contributions refundable?   All contributions on Indiegogo are nonrefundable according to the terms of use.

(6) Will your cable work with the new iPhone 6 Plus?   Yes! .... Statement WKW is licensed and certified by Apple's MFi program, Statement WKW works with every Apple iPhone, iPad &
column2: iPod with a Lightning connector. This includes the iPhone 6 Plus, 6, 5, 5C &amp
column3:
5S, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices.

(7) Will your cable fit my iPhone case?      95% Yes / 5% No  .... Because we has the 8 pin connector, circuit board, and woven cable fully enclosed for an incredibly strong and durable termination, our Lightning plug is 11mm x 6mm. We tested the cable over 40 different aftermarket cases and the cable fit over 95% of the cases. Unfortunately we cannot confirm if the 8 pin plug will fit certain cases as there are over 1000's on the market.

It will fit all iPhone cases with a minimum ( 11mm x 6mm ) opening for charging cable.

column1:
(8) You gotta be kidding! I can buy a iPhone cable from Ebay for $3.00 and your MSRP is $39.99. Why so expensive?
The different is between Quality and Quantity. We use the highest quality Apple certified materials to build this cable. You are investing in an Apple approved product, not a cheaply made $3 knock off that might fail to work after several weeks or stop working after iOS update.
(9) Questions regarding incorrect credit card's charge, duplicate contributions, refunds, change perks and checkout procedure.

With the Flexible Funding structure, contributions made through Indiegogo are final ( http://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526876-Refunds                           ),  Exceptions will be made for duplicate contribution,s or incorrect contribution amounts only. If contributors are requesting refunds for other reason or alternate perks, please contact us directly at support@wkwcustom.com with your reason for refund, your contribution amount, your name and the email address you provided during the contribution process.

Reflex® reflective sleeving is a combination of the lightweight PET material (Polyethylene Terephthalate) and 3M Ultra Reflective monofilament, has a continuous operating temperature of -22 °F to 257 °F . The result is a highly reflective braided sleeving that not only provides abrasion and chemical resistance, but also very strong and durable.
(11) When will we receive our cable?

column1: (12) How much AWG is your cable equivalent to? 20/28? 24/28?

Is a 24 AWG shielded cable with a diameter of 0.0201 inches ( without the fiber sleeve ). But please keep that in mind, the AWG rating of a cable is only important when dealing with long cable lengths. a 24/28 AWG cable should be fine for less than 15 feet long. For longer cables, a lower AWG-ranked cable is recommended to prevent a drop in signal quality.

When connecting you iPhone / iPad to a AMPs or transmitting lossless WAV files at 16/20/24-bit, 32kHz to 192kHz from your iPad to a DACs, there is little need to get an 4 ft lightning cable below 24/28 AWG. The added strength of a bigger cables is not detectable on an adv high-end setups or made any noticeable difference.
DeoxIT® ProGold GxL from Caig Laboratories. Inc is a unique conditioning
solution that improves conductivity and provides long-lasting protection
on gold, base metals and other precious metal contacts and connections
(gold, silver, rhodium, copper, bronze, nickel, etc.), and most commonly used in the high-end audio and aerospace industry.

_______________________________________________________________________Statement WKW 2.0: Extreme Charging Cable For iPhone 6 / 6 Plus / 5S / 5C / 5New Color Available: Statement WKW 2.0 in Reflex®/SilverStatement Fidelity : Custom 3.5 MM Audiophile Cable For Smartphone.

What is Statement WKW?Statement WKW is a beautifully designed cable for your iPhone, iPod & iPad. Built with military grade foil and braid double shielded woven cable, military grade MIL-E-5272 PET Expandable Braided Sleeving, aerospace grade AMS-DTL-23053 heat shrink and Apple MFi certification, it's a cable that’s built to last and what Apple should have made in the first place! We have been designing and custom building high end audio cable, smartphone cable and charger for over five years. We custom built our first iPhone cable in 2013 and during this process we discovered that the Apple Lightning cable is poorly designed and constructed
column2: the cable is vulnerable to breakage, fraying, and according to a ZDNet's report, corrosion as well.  With the Statement WKW cable, we have created a cable that's incredibly strong, durable, elegant and functional. It will be the last Lightning iDevice cable you'll ever buy.Flexible & Tangle Free Design

column1: Much stronger, yet more flexible than standard iPhone cables.
4 ft length ensures that you have enough to reach from wall plug to desktop.
The connectors get an additional aerospace grade heat shrink that permanently straightens both the cable and the connector to providing cable-stress relieve.
Statement WKW 2.0 - Red. Statement WKW 2.0 - Reflex®Black.iPhone 6 Compatibility

Statement WKW is licensed and certified by Apple's MFi program, It works with every Apple iPhone, iPad & iPod with a Lightning connector and has been tested extensively for the iPhone 6 and iOS 9 compatibility. We will also test the cable with both iPhone 6 Plus and iPhone 5S before we ship to you.
June 21, 2014 - Our Exhibition in San Francisco, California

Statement WKW : Available in Carbon/Black (Default Color), Reflex®Black, Reflex®Silver, White, Red, Blue, Purple, Brige, Gray and Clear.Statement Fidelity: Available in ""Reflex®/Black"" and ""Reflex®Silver"", Carbon/Black, White, Red, Blue, Purple, Brige, Gray and Clear.

Our inspiration for the Statement WKW came from ideas and design that are not common for your average iDevice cables and accessories.  Our research covered other luxury products such as jewelry, high-end headphones, watches, audiophile speaker cable and interconnects.

It is important to us that our cable not only look stunning, but also of high quality and craftsmanship that you will recognize once you put them in your own hands. We have decided on a combination of audiophile cable design concepts, high-end audio fiber sleeve and double shielded woven cable to achieve a clean signal path and durability.
Inside the audiophile style fiber sleeve is a
fully rated foil and braid double shielded  woven cable. It is much stronger, yet more flexible

The Statement WKW 2.0 has the 8 pin connector, circuit board, and woven cable fully enclosed for an incredibly strong and durable termination. The internal wiring are rated for 4+ Amps!  Whether you are using a standard 12V car charger or a high-power 20 Watt 2.1A (2000mA) wall USB charger, the Statement WKW allows for the quickest charging times possible.

Having designed and built smartphone cables for over 4 years, we understand the significance of how original certified parts ensure quality and safety.  While this increases the production time and direct materials cost, using original Apple MFi components make certain that our cable continues to work with future iOS updates while protecting your precious idevices from incorrect and possibly dangerous voltage and current that non-certified accessories provides.
Lightning compatibility: Compatible with every Apple iPhone, iPad & iPod with a Lightning
connector. This includes the iPhone 6 Plus / 6 / 5S / 5C / 5, iPad Air, iPad with Retina display, iPad Mini, iPad mini with Retina display,
iPod Touch 5th generation, iPod Nano 7th generation and all new iOS devices.

Made for iPod"" , ""Made for iPhone""  and ""Made for iPad"" mean that an electronic accessory has been designed to connect specifically to iPod, or iPhone, respectively, and has been certified by the developer to meet Apple performance standards.
Connector: MFi certified 8-pin and premium gilded USB.
Cable: Military grade foil and braid double shielded cable,
Sleeving: Military grade Expandable Braided Sleeving.
Stress Relieve: Aerospace grade 3:1 heat shrink.
Color: Default color is Carbon/Black. Statement WKW is also available in Reflex®/Black, Reflex®/Siver, White, Red, Blue, Gray, Purple and Clear.
What set us apart from the competition.

Before we ship your cable, we will:(1) Cables will be unpack and tested for charge & sync.(2) Visually inspect for damages.(3) Both 8pin & USB converter pre-treated with DeoxIT® ProGold GxL to improves conductivity and provides long-lasting protection.(4) We will make sure all cables is working and pass our quality inspection before shipping.
We tested and run in all our cables extensively before delivery to our Indiegogo backer in order to ensure that they get a good experience straight out of the box.
Both 8pin & USB converter pre-treated with DeoxIT® ProGold GxL to improves conductivity and provides long-lasting protection.

Our StoryFounded in 2008, WKW Custom Cable is one of the premiere smartphone accessories and custom high-end audio cable company in the San Francisco Sunset District.  We were always fond of old world craftsmanship and has been in a continual state of refinement, seeking not only to make our cable better and better with each generation, but also to create entirely new products that serve the needs of our customers.
(1) We designed our first iPhone cable ( iTrim ) for an oversea client and introduced audiophile concept to the world of charge-and-sync cables.
(2) We also helped another Client in Singapore to design and manufacture a stylish iPhone cable ( Designer ) for their Groupon and Livingsocial campaign.
(3) In 2013, we finally designed and built our very own custom iPhone cable (Statement), 300+ working prototypes was built and sold within 2 months.
Design – We have already completed our design and the first 300 working prototypes.
Manufacturer –We have established a great working relationship with our Apple licensed manufacturer in Taiwan with pricing and order quantities confirmed.
Certification - The cable is already tested and approved according to the Apple MFi program.
Production - As of December 2014, production are completed and ready to ship.
Production - As of March 2015, design and production of Statement WKW 2.0 are completed and ready to ship.

Design and Testing – As of September 2015, we are in the final adjusting and testing stage of ""Statement Military "" aka ""Statement 3.0"" working prototypes. The cable will be ready for MIL-STD-810 testing at the beginning of 2016.

(1) Because we use the highest quality materials available, our direct materials cost is very high. Since we will never sacrifice quality for profits while fully aware that we must be sustainable and be able to grow. In order to lower the unit cost, we will need to buy components in bulk and mass-produce the double shielded cable, male USB & 8 pin connector by an Apple licensed manufacturer. (2) The cost of Apple MFi Certification.(3) The cost of the military grade expandable braided sleeving and cable.(4) New cable development - Additional funds needed for development of Statement.Military ( formerly known as WKW 3.0 ), Statement.Military will be design according to MIL-STD-810 standard for military applications and Apple MFi standard. The prototype will be ready for testing on or after July 2016.
Like other MFi accessory makers, we are dependent on Apple with the production quantities of the actual MFi Lightning 8 pin connector.
Our timeline is therefore partially dictated by Apple. We will do our
best to push for a timely production.
Warranty policy:We warrants all our cable with a 12 months limited warranty. For more info on our warranty policy, please visit our website at ( http://wkwcustom.com/support.html )

Statement WKW User Guide:It's no secret that the Apple lightning cable is one of the most challenging / problematic cables ever made. The help forum on the Apple website has almost 200,000+ discussions dedicated to how problematic the cord and the authenticator chip inside the lightning plug is. With that in mind, we created a user guide, suggestions and recommendations of what to do / not to do on your cable.
Go to http://www.wkwcustom.com/userguide.html for more info.

Attention:iPhone, iPod, iPod classic®, iPod nano® and iPod touch® are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries, and Apple Lightning is a trademark of Apple Inc.""Made for iPod"" , ""Made for iPhone""  and ""Made for iPad"" mean that an electronic accessory has been designed to connect specifically to iPod, or iPhone, respectively, and has been certified by the developer to meet Apple performance standards. Apple is not responsible for the operation of this device or its compliance with safety and regulatory standards.
* Please read FAQ before you make a contributions.

(1) Is the cable available in Micro-USB or in 30 pin for the iPhone 4/4S?    No, the cable only available in 8 pin Lightning connector and works with every Apple iPhone, iPad & iPod with a Lightning connector. This includes the iPhone 6, 5, 5C & 5S, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices.

No, nothing is unbreakable! Statement WKW were designed to be robust, because both 8pin and USB is hot-pluggable, the connectors would be used more frequently, and perhaps with less care, than other connectors. However they are not unbreakable, both connector is design to break off if the pressure is strong enough to prevent equipment ( iPhone, iPod or PC) damage. This design was made so that both connectors on the less expensive cable would bear the most wear instead of the more expensive iPhone, iPod or PC.
(3) How do I choose the color of the cable?   We will sent a survey via email, and you can choose you color of the cable.

(4) Is the Statement WKW Lightning cable be 100% Apple MFi certified?    Yes, absolutely! It's essential for Statement's to be MFi certified to ensure quality, safety and continues to work with future iOS updates. (5) Is my contributions refundable?   All contributions on Indiegogo are nonrefundable according to the terms of use.(6) Will your cable work with the new iPhone 6 Plus?   Yes! .... Statement WKW is licensed and certified by Apple's MFi program, Statement WKW works with every Apple iPhone, iPad & iPod with a Lightning connector. This includes the iPhone 6 Plus, 6, 5, 5C & 5S, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices.(7) Will your cable fit my iPhone case?      95% Yes / 5% No  .... Because we has the 8 pin connector, circuit board, and woven cable fully enclosed for an incredibly strong and durable termination, our Lightning plug is 11mm x 6mm. We tested the cable over 40 different aftermarket cases and the cable fit over 95% of the cases. Unfortunately we cannot confirm if the 8 pin plug will fit certain cases as there are over 1000's on the market.It will fit all iPhone cases with a minimum ( 11mm x 6mm ) opening for charging cable.

(8) You gotta be kidding! I can buy a iPhone cable from Ebay for $3.00 and your MSRP is $39.99. Why so expensive?The different is between Quality and Quantity. We use the highest quality Apple certified materials to build this cable. You are investing in an Apple approved product, not a cheaply made $3 knock off that might fail to work after several weeks or stop working after iOS update.
(9) Questions regarding incorrect credit card's charge, duplicate contributions, refunds, change perks and checkout procedure.

With the Flexible Funding structure, contributions made through Indiegogo are final ( http://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526876-Refunds                           ),  Exceptions will be made for duplicate contribution,s or incorrect contribution amounts only. If contributors are requesting refunds for other reason or alternate perks, please contact us directly at support@wkwcustom.com with your reason for refund, your contribution amount, your name and the email address you provided during the contribution process.

Reflex® reflective sleeving is a combination of the lightweight PET material (Polyethylene Terephthalate) and 3M Ultra Reflective monofilament, has a continuous operating temperature of -22 °F to 257 °F . The result is a highly reflective braided sleeving that not only provides abrasion and chemical resistance, but also very strong and durable.

column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

How it works 

Using Stringerkey is simple. Just keep the the tool on 90 degree angle with arrow facing down. 

1. Pull 40 cm of string through the hole in the Stringerkey.

2. Push Stringerkey between the vertical strings so that the arrow in the tool is below the string.

3. Lift Stringerkey up and move to the next gap.

column3: awesome home computer - it’s a friendly desktop PC that comes with everything you need, and is ready to use from the moment you turn it on.

column2: >imp is smarter and modern than any other home PC. It connects effortlessly with your TV, smartphone, tablet and laptop. No cables needed. imp can play movies on your TV, easily get the pictures from your smartphone, and even play music on your speakers.
>imp is not tied to any corporate agenda. We are committed to make this product elegant, easy to use, independent and open source.

column1: • Set your home cloud - on a local hard drive or your online service
• Stream HD video and music - from any device to TV or speakers
• Manage imp’s Media Center remotely using your smartphone

column2: >Access your content from any laptop, tablet, or smartphone

column1: • Start watching a movie on your tablet, and continue watching it on your TV
Social responsibility is at the top of our core values. As an affordable computer, imp is offering a $249 discounted perk
column2: for every imp you buy, you donate an imp to Dandora HipHop City - a community art center in one of the ghettos of Nairobi, Kenya. This important program, led by the Kenyan musician Juliani, takes in young individuals who hold a keen interest in arts and entertainment, with the purpose to polish these talents’ musical abilities, and a goal to subsequently help them earn a living. The donated imps will be used for “school after school sessions” at Dandora HipHop City.

column4: >In recent years, away from consumer’s eyes, the computer market has been experiencing an earth-rattling revolution: single-board computers have become a prevalent force in the development world. Tens of different of these low cost, tiny computers are used by geeks and tech enthusiasts on a vast variety of amazing projects and purposes.

column1: Sure, you can easily get your own single-board computer mailed directly to your home, but what the hell are you supposed to do with it? As a matter of fact, if you need a new PC for your home, you are basically forced to select between the same variety of products available for the last few decades: desktop or laptop, with a price range of $400-$2000 from the same variety of companies.

Desktops and laptops ruled the home computer market for decades. The introduction of smartphones and tablets had only a minor impact on the home computation solutions available today. Although you own between 5-10 'screens' (desktop, laptop, mobile or tablet) per family at home, your home devices are isolated from each other. The easiest way to share a picture with your family is, absurdly, to send it by email, a message, or by connecting proprietary cables.

Meet imp. imp is a disruptive home computation solution: a handy, easy to use computer, based on open source technology, and cloud software services, running on a powerful single-board CPU: 1.7GHz, quad-core, ARM V9. It connects to any of your home displays. It is your Internet kiosk, your TV media center, and your wireless digital hub.
Easy data transfer from any PC to imp’s cloud storage
Seamless integration of all NAS/Cloud services, powered by ownCloud
Wireless casting to any DLNA compatible device (Music &
Switch the media playback to another screen with a click
An easy to use desktop, based on Cinnamon Desktop Environment
Ready for multi cloud storages and personal cloud
A collection of the best apps and services to get started
imp Mobile App - control media center and access/share content
imp supports most keyboards and mice, and also Chromecast &
column2: Matchstick (or any other DLNA supported device)

column1: We're a passionate group of tech lovers, consumer product experts, engineers, designers and wannabe nerds. We founded imp.computer in 2014, with a mission to bring Open Source computers to everyone. Our team has more than 50 years joint experience in consumer electronics and software design. imp is based in Tel Aviv, the epicenter of Israel’s tech scene. One of us needs to keep his current, paying job and therefore his identity won't be revealed at the moment:

For the past 7 months we’ve been testing and refining our product.
Our manufacturer is ready, and we are all set to go!

Your generous contributions will help us meet the minimum quantities needed in order to offer imp at an affordable price. It will cover tooling costs, the first production run, and most importantly, we'll be able to give you your very own imp.
We will also be using your contributions to expand imp.computers's product range, develop accessories, and work on some awesome takes on the original imp.
column4: >In order to bring imp to life, we kindly ask for your support.

column1: • We're an experienced team with more than 50 years combined, in delivering digital and consumer products. We have vast experience in technology execution, and background from leading companies: Emblaze, Telmap, Checkpoint, HP, Palm, and Motorola. Nevertheless, we do take into account that unexpected challenges are always around the corner.
• We hereby promise to do everything in our power, so that our backers are well looked after, and that rewards are delivered on-time, or even earlier if time permits.
• We've given the project a conservative estimate of milestones &
column2: delivery dates, and are committed to keeping you informed of our progress on a weekly basis, in the months following the campaign.

column1: • Our promise to deliver will be challenged by the known complexities of manufacturing, production scheduling, and fulfillment.

• Therefore, in the event that unexpected issues arise in the development that will affect our schedule, we will do our utmost to minimize impact on our supporters and dedicate ourselves to providing the best, most honest, experience. Additionally, we'll be keeping our backers in the loop and handle every hurdle with full transparency.
• Please feel free contact us for more information.
Some people just can't contribute, Nevertheless you can always assist with:
• Sharing our campaign with your social network using the Indiegogo share tools!
• Since imp is open source you are welcome to contribute code to the project
• Any other feedback is always welcomed. Feel free to write us with your suggestions and we promise to respond in a timely fashion.
imp is, and will always stay committed to Open Source technologies and partners. Help us shape the future of home computing for the public good.
Q: Why did you name the product imp?
column4: >We are huge fans of the TV series ‘Game of Thrones’, and are especially fond of Tyrion Lannister, whose nickname is, well, the imp.
column10: > is also a small and powerful daemon just like our tiny computer.

column1: Q: Can I use/install Windows on imp?
column7: > uses Open Source software and is based on Ubuntu, Linux. So, no, you cannot install Windows. If you insist, you can use Microsoft Office Online.

column1: Q: Is imp using a new OS?
column4: >No. We are using Ubuntu, Linux. It is the most popular Linux distribution, with tens of Millions installations worldwide.

column1: Q: What does it mean that imp is Open Source?
column4: >When you turn to open source software, you free yourself from the vendor lock-in. Customers of such non open source vendors are kept at the mercy of those vendors' vision, requirements, dictates, prices, priorities and timetables. As a result, these customers are paying for products with limited capabilities &amp

column1: Q: Why is the fact that imp is Open Source so important?
column4: >Being open source means that all of the software components of imp are free and open for anyone to change and contribute to.
column7: >And similarly, by switching to open source, you are in control. You have the power to make your own decisions, and to do as you wish with the software. You also have a worldwide community of software developers and other users like you at your disposal to assist with whatever you want to modify.

column1: Q: Is your hardware Open Source?
column4: >We are 100% committed to Open Source, and all of our software components are open and public for anyone to see and contribute. Nevertheless, we do offer proprietary services, which are closed, that you can opt out of. In addition, our hardware is composed of an open source single-board platform, the Odroid U3. Please note that Odroid’s user-land GPU drivers are library binary format, which are non-open.

column1: Q: Why did you choose Odroid U3 as your hardware platform?
column4: >We ourselves use single boards on a daily basis, and have tested a lot of them, while considering multiple factors, in order to ensure a great user experience. The Odroid U3 enables HD streaming to your TV, while using imp’s desktop at the same time, which is impressive to say the least.

column1: Q: Do you support multiple languages?
column7: > is based on Ubuntu, which has more than 28 fully translated languages and a total of 218 supported languages.

column1: Q: How do I pledge for more than one imp?
column4: >Simply pledge for one, and shoot us an email to contact@imp.computer notifying us of your pledge amount and desired quantity.

column1: Q: When will I get my imp?
column4: >If you gave a contribution and snatched an early bird, your imp will be shipped to you by next March.

column1: Q: Are you going to ship imp in different colors?
column4: >At the moment, “you can have any
column10: >, as long it is black”. But, hey, we would love to get your take on the matter.

column1: Q: Do you ship worldwide?
column4: >Yep. We offer flat rate shipping, with the thought of minimizing shipping costs.

column1: Q: How much memory does imp have?
column4: >8GB SD storage (our premium edition comes with 16GB), and 2GB of RAM. If you’re the meticulous type, we kindly ask you to consult HardKernel's website for more technical information.

column1: Q: What if 8GB simply doesn’t cut it for me?
column7: > integrates
column13: > to allow you as much storage as you need - just connect your imp to any HDD or add your preferred cloud storage using our walk-in-the-park easy-to-use wizard. In addition, you can upgrade your SD card, as long as it is a micro SD card, which doesn’t fall below speed class 10 standards.

column1: Q: Is 2GB RAM enough? Is it expandable?
column7: > is optimized for average daily use, which doesn’t require more than 2GB of RAM.

column1: ","imp is a tiny & awesome home computer - it’s a friendly desktop PC that comes with everything you need, and is ready to use from the moment you turn it on.

imp is smarter and modern than any other home PC. It connects effortlessly with your TV, smartphone, tablet and laptop. No cables needed. imp can play movies on your TV, easily get the pictures from your smartphone, and even play music on your speakers.
imp is not tied to any corporate agenda. We are committed to make this product elegant, easy to use, independent and open source.
Set your home cloud - on a local hard drive or your online service
Stream HD video and music - from any device to TV or speakers
Manage imp’s Media Center remotely using your smartphone
Access your content from any laptop, tablet, or smartphone
Start watching a movie on your tablet, and continue watching it on your TV
Social responsibility is at the top of our core values. As an affordable computer, imp is offering a $249 discounted perk
column2: for every imp you buy, you donate an imp to Dandora HipHop City - a community art center in one of the ghettos of Nairobi, Kenya. This important program, led by the Kenyan musician Juliani, takes in young individuals who hold a keen interest in arts and entertainment, with the purpose to polish these talents’ musical abilities, and a goal to subsequently help them earn a living. The donated imps will be used for “school after school sessions” at Dandora HipHop City.

column1: In recent years, away from consumer’s eyes, the computer market has been experiencing an earth-rattling revolution: single-board computers have become a prevalent force in the development world. Tens of different of these low cost, tiny computers are used by geeks and tech enthusiasts on a vast variety of amazing projects and purposes.

Sure, you can easily get your own single-board computer mailed directly to your home, but what the hell are you supposed to do with it? As a matter of fact, if you need a new PC for your home, you are basically forced to select between the same variety of products available for the last few decades: desktop or laptop, with a price range of $400-$2000 from the same variety of companies.

Desktops and laptops ruled the home computer market for decades. The introduction of smartphones and tablets had only a minor impact on the home computation solutions available today. Although you own between 5-10 'screens' (desktop, laptop, mobile or tablet) per family at home, your home devices are isolated from each other. The easiest way to share a picture with your family is, absurdly, to send it by email, a message, or by connecting proprietary cables.

Meet imp. imp is a disruptive home computation solution: a handy, easy to use computer, based on open source technology, and cloud software services, running on a powerful single-board CPU: 1.7GHz, quad-core, ARM V9. It connects to any of your home displays. It is your Internet kiosk, your TV media center, and your wireless digital hub.
Easy data transfer from any PC to imp’s cloud storage
Seamless integration of all NAS/Cloud services, powered by ownCloud
imp Media Center, based on Kodi (XBMC)
Wireless casting to any DLNA compatible device (Music & Video)
Switch the media playback to another screen with a click
An easy to use desktop, based on Cinnamon Desktop Environment
Ready for multi cloud storages and personal cloud
A collection of the best apps and services to get started
imp Mobile App - control media center and access/share content
imp supports most keyboards and mice, and also Chromecast & Matchstick (or any other DLNA supported device)

We're a passionate group of tech lovers, consumer product experts, engineers, designers and wannabe nerds. We founded imp.computer in 2014, with a mission to bring Open Source computers to everyone. Our team has more than 50 years joint experience in consumer electronics and software design. imp is based in Tel Aviv, the epicenter of Israel’s tech scene. One of us needs to keep his current, paying job and therefore his identity won't be revealed at the moment:
For the past 7 months we’ve been testing and refining our product. Our manufacturer is ready, and we are all set to go!

Your generous contributions will help us meet the minimum quantities needed in order to offer imp at an affordable price. It will cover tooling costs, the first production run, and most importantly, we'll be able to give you your very own imp.

We will also be using your contributions to expand imp.computers's product range, develop accessories, and work on some awesome takes on the original imp. In order to bring imp to life, we kindly ask for your support.

We're an experienced team with more than 50 years combined, in delivering digital and consumer products. We have vast experience in technology execution, and background from leading companies: Emblaze, Telmap, Checkpoint, HP, Palm, and Motorola. Nevertheless, we do take into account that unexpected challenges are always around the corner.
We hereby promise to do everything in our power, so that our backers are well looked after, and that rewards are delivered on-time, or even earlier if time permits.
We've given the project a conservative estimate of milestones & delivery dates, and are committed to keeping you informed of our progress on a weekly basis, in the months following the campaign.
Our promise to deliver will be challenged by the known complexities of manufacturing, production scheduling, and fulfillment.

Therefore, in the event that unexpected issues arise in the development that will affect our schedule, we will do our utmost to minimize impact on our supporters and dedicate ourselves to providing the best, most honest, experience. Additionally, we'll be keeping our backers in the loop and handle every hurdle with full transparency.
Please feel free contact us for more information.
Some people just can't contribute, Nevertheless you can always assist with:
Sharing our campaign with your social network using the Indiegogo share tools!
Since imp is open source you are welcome to contribute code to the project
Any other feedback is always welcomed. Feel free to write us with your suggestions and we promise to respond in a timely fashion.
imp is, and will always stay committed to Open Source technologies and partners. Help us shape the future of home computing for the public good.

Q: Why did you name the product imp?We are huge fans of the TV series ‘Game of Thrones’, and are especially fond of Tyrion Lannister, whose nickname is, well, the imp. Imp is also a small and powerful daemon just like our tiny computer.
Q: Can I use/install Windows on imp?imp uses Open Source software and is based on Ubuntu, Linux. So, no, you cannot install Windows. If you insist, you can use Microsoft Office Online.
Q: Is imp using a new OS?No. We are using Ubuntu, Linux. It is the most popular Linux distribution, with tens of Millions installations worldwide.

Q: What does it mean that imp is Open Source?When you turn to open source software, you free yourself from the vendor lock-in. Customers of such non open source vendors are kept at the mercy of those vendors' vision, requirements, dictates, prices, priorities and timetables. As a result, these customers are paying for products with limited capabilities & performance.

Q: Why is the fact that imp is Open Source so important?Being open source means that all of the software components of imp are free and open for anyone to change and contribute to.And similarly, by switching to open source, you are in control. You have the power to make your own decisions, and to do as you wish with the software. You also have a worldwide community of software developers and other users like you at your disposal to assist with whatever you want to modify.

Q: Is your hardware Open Source?We are 100% committed to Open Source, and all of our software components are open and public for anyone to see and contribute. Nevertheless, we do offer proprietary services, which are closed, that you can opt out of. In addition, our hardware is composed of an open source single-board platform, the Odroid U3. Please note that Odroid’s user-land GPU drivers are library binary format, which are non-open.

Q: Why did you choose Odroid U3 as your hardware platform?We ourselves use single boards on a daily basis, and have tested a lot of them, while considering multiple factors, in order to ensure a great user experience. The Odroid U3 enables HD streaming to your TV, while using imp’s desktop at the same time, which is impressive to say the least.
Q: Do you support multiple languages?imp’s OS is based on Ubuntu, which has more than 28 fully translated languages and a total of 218 supported languages.
Q: How do I pledge for more than one imp?Simply pledge for one, and shoot us an email to contact@imp.computer notifying us of your pledge amount and desired quantity.
Q: When will I get my imp?If you gave a contribution and snatched an early bird, your imp will be shipped to you by next March.
Q: Are you going to ship imp in different colors?At the moment, “you can have any color, as long it is black”. But, hey, we would love to get your take on the matter.
Q: Do you ship worldwide?Yep. We offer flat rate shipping, with the thought of minimizing shipping costs.

Q: How much memory does imp have?8GB SD storage (our premium edition comes with 16GB), and 2GB of RAM. If you’re the meticulous type, we kindly ask you to consult HardKernel's website for more technical information.

Q: What if 8GB simply doesn’t cut it for me? imp integrates ownCloud to allow you as much storage as you need - just connect your imp to any HDD or add your preferred cloud storage using our walk-in-the-park easy-to-use wizard. In addition, you can upgrade your SD card, as long as it is a micro SD card, which doesn’t fall below speed class 10 standards.

Q: Is 2GB RAM enough? Is it expandable? imp is optimized for average daily use, which doesn’t require more than 2GB of RAM. Unfortunately, the RAM comes as POP (Package on Package) on top of the SoC, so it’s not removable and therefore not expandable.

Q: Can I upgrade imp's spec other than the RAM?Yes! you are more than welcome to do so. Since imp’s hardware is based on Odroid-U3, you can upgrade your SD card and get more local storage, or upgrade/tweak any other component as you see fit.
Q: What are imp’s full hardware specs?imp’s more detailed hardware specifications, which are a bit overwhelming for the average Joe (consider yourself warned, Joe!), are available here:
Samsung Exynos4412 Prime Cortex-A9 Quad Core 1.7GHz with 1MB L2 cache
Supports 1080p via HDMI cable(H.264+AAC based MP4 container format)
High speed standard A type connector x 3 ports
ADB/Mass storage (Micro USB), Host mode is possible if the PCB Rev is 0.5 or higher.
GPIO, UART, I2C, SPI (Board Revision 0.5 or higher)
Q: Which displays are compatible?There is a micro HDMI output available, which supports up to 1080p resolution with 16:9/16:10 wide display.
HDMI-DVI or HDMI-VGA converter may work if your monitor has wide display.Outdated 4:3 aspect ratio monitors may not provide with the best performance, so we advise against using them with an imp.
Q: Is sound-over-HDMI supported?Yes. You can play music over HDMI, that’s easy. You can also stream music over the air to any DLNA compatible sound system.
Q: Which WiFi are you using? Our Wi-Fi comes as a USB stick, which comes with the imp, and is based on RTL8188-CUS chipset.

Q: I am a blogger/journalist. How do I get an imp for reviewing purposes? We appreciate you reaching out, yet at the moment, unfortunately, we don’t have any sample units to send other than the ones we use for testing and development purposes. Hey, don’t cry, you are more than welcome to stop by our offices, test drive an imp, and meet us in person.",26.0,2,"1 Campaign

column2:
/>

Inspiration

We all love taking panorama picture or time

column1: lapse video with our smartphone.  Whether it's capturing a magnificent
sunrise and sunset or taking group photos of family and friends, our

smartphones are used to capture every aspect of our lives.

How
many of you been have been frustrated taking panoramic pictures or time
lapse video? The truth is, taking panorama pictures or time laps video
can be a difficult and frustrating task.  Most of the time our hands are
just too shaky and slow resulting in unbalanced photos and choppy

videos.

Paul and the team at Radiantmodo studio accepted the challenge of coming
up with a fun, easy solution to getting flawless panoramic photos and
time lapse videos.  After months of research and development they are
proud to introduce the PanoPal: a highly portable, motion control device
for your smartphone.  It's the perfect solution to getting flawless

panorama pictures all with the touch of a remote.

PanoPal Vs. Free hand

Development

PanoPal began development in February 2013. The team of designers and
engineers at RadiantMoto challenged each other with creating a motion
control device that could provide the necessary stability that
smartphone users needed while also being sleek and modern.  After
multiple re-designs and months of development, a design was finalized
eventually leading the way to an initial prototype and now a fully

functional sample. 

In just a short amount of time the designers and engineers at
Radiantmodo were able to turn a concept into a reality and in the
process, provide a fun solution to getting high quality panorama and

time lapse video with your smartphone.

Spec
• -Built in rechargeable Li-on battery with 370mAh capacity
• -continued use for 5 hour per full charge
-4 different rotating speeds ranging from slow to fast
• -2 spinning directions (rotates clockwise or counter clockwise)
• -standard tripod mount works with all tripods
• -Place the PanoPal on any flat surface
• -Simply remove your iPhone, Galaxy S4 or smartphone from its case and insert your phone into the PanoPal to lock it into place.
• -Turn on any panorama or video app on your phone. Press the capture button on your phone to begin shooting.
• -Once your phone is locked in, press the on/off button on the remote control to make PanoPal rotate
• -Choose from 4 preset speeds by pressing the plus or minus buttons on the remote.
• -Use the directional buttons to rotate PanoPal clockwise or counter clockwise at any time.
• -Stop the PanoPal when you've finished shooting

column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

As a follow up to our regular PanoPal we'd also like to introduce

column1: PanoPal Pro w/ Blue Tooth functionality.  The Bluetooth remote has all
the features as the RF remote that comes with the standard Panopal plus a
great deal more.  Now with the blue tooth remote, not only can you make
the PanoPal spin, you can also snap photos and shoot videos directly
with the remote.  Users will also be able to control music settings i.e.
volume, track selection, directly with the Bluetooth remote.
• -take pictures remotely with the shutter button
• -play music remotely on your Smartphone using play/pause buttons

column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

PanoPal Vs. PanoPal Pro

The RF remote works with regular PanoPal only and it remotely control all features and functions of PanoPal

The

column1: Bluetooth remote works with PanoPal Pro only. Beside remote control all
features and functions of PanoPal Pro, it also allows to remotely take

picture on your smartphones and play music without touching the screen.

Aluminum Edition (Indiegogo only)

We are very proud to

introduce to you the Aluminum edition of the PanoPal! only available on Inidiegogo.  Instead of the plastic housing, we want to offer a premium version to hardcore Panorama fans. The Aluminum edtion slightly heavier than our standard version and more resistant to corrosion, making it perfect for outdoor use.  The Aluminum PanoPal is truly a piece of

art.

Both PanoPal and PanoPal Pro are now available in aluminum, making it
more durable and substantial.  The Aluminum version is slightly heavier
than our standard version and more resistant to corrosion, making it
perfect for outdoor use. Both Aluminum edition will come with a digital
camera mount that allows any compact digital camera to work perfectly

with PanoPal for Panorama shot!

Rewards

Meet our team

RadiantModo is a small design studio in
NYC. Our team is made up of industrial designers and engineers with
backgrounds ranging from tech to toys.  Our goal is to create unique
products that will change the way of we use technology.  In the end, we
want to come up with solutions to life's everyday problems through

products that are fun and easy to use.

Radiantmodo was formed by
Paul Ng and Jun C, two classmates who graduated from the Toy Design
program at NYC's Fashion Institute of Technology. Along with Paul and
Jun, are also a graphic designer and a product engineer. After several
years working for different companies as product designers, Paul and Jun
decided to create their own studio to focus heavily on tech gadgets.
Together, under the Radianmodo banner, they now have the freedom to
concept and develop products that they would use themselves. Each member
of Radiantmodo brings with them comprehensive knowledge of the product
development cycle and various manufacturing processes.

Paul Ng


After graduating from the toy design program at
F.I.T, Paul went on to work at Mega Brands Inc, in Montreal, Canada, a
toy company that specializes in building block toys. At Megabloks, he
worked in the advanced design department where he conceptualized and
prototyped different boys toy lines ranging from Marvel comics playsets
to Neo-shifters, a line of transforming robots which competed with
Lego's Bionicles at the time. After Mega Brands, Paul worked for a year
at Battat, Inc. where he designed classic, wooden roleplay toys. In
2007, Paul moved back to NYC and worked for a children's product company
until last year before forming Radiantmodo Studio.

Jun C.

After graduating from the toy design program at
F.I.T, Jun was hired by Motorola's accessory division in NYC to design
and develop custom accessories for all Motorola's mobile devices.
Within a few years working at Motorola, Jun was opened to the world of
product development and manufacturing.  He was in charge of
conceptualizing, designing, and putting together tech packs to send
overseas for sampling. Since 2008, Jun has been working for another
famous accessory brand company where he manages an in-house design team

column2: develop accessories for Apple's portable products.

I have performed many hours of research into future sales options, and have some great opportunities just waiting formy product.

Mitakuuluu:

Mitakuuluu is an app for Sailfish OS. This application is written in pure QT5/QML, the same code language is used in Ubuntu OS.

With this funding, I would want to  send an Ubuntu phone to the developer (coderus) to create this app for Ubuntu.

The development will be started after reaching 120 euros.

Future funding is optional.


What does Mitakuuluu mean?

Mitakuuluu = Mita kuuluu = What's up? = Whatsapp


WhatsApp
Messenger is a proprietary, cross-platform instant messaging
subscription service for smartphones and selected feature phones that
uses the internet for communication. In addition to text messaging,
users can send each other images, video, and audio media messages as

well as their location using integrated mapping features.

WORLD'S FIRST iPHONE CASE THAT DOUBLES AS REFILLABLE BUTANE  LIGHTER!

Our Story:

Over a year ago, co-founder Raúl Góngora was sitting at a patio bar when he was asked by someone to borrow a lighter. When he checked his pockets, the only thing he could find was his iPhone. The idea immediately popped in his head to invent a case for an iPhone that would incorporate a butane lighter as part of the case. After weeks of searching the internet for a similar product and finding NOTHING like it, he began to draw up plans for his invention. Co-founder Rob Haas and roommate at the time, loved the idea and together they decided to make the dream a reality. They applied and received a patent and the last step was to produce it.
Rob Haas (co founder) and Raúl Góngora (inventor and co founder).
Raúl and Rob are both iPhone accessory fanatics. Always interested in anything iPhone related, they were a perfect match to create the next big iPhone accessory.

The idea of the CELLTORCH was a perfect example of how necessity is the mother of invention. Being a smoker and like many other smokers, Raul would always lose his lighter by misplacing it or lending it to someone who would immediately put it in their pocket and not return it. Being that it was much harder to lose an iPhone, a smartphone case that WAS the lighter was the perfect combination.

They spent over a year designing and testing the case with engineers in order to have the perfect form and function. Big enough to hold a sufficient amount of butane so you wouldn't have to constantly refill it but small enough to hold comfortably in your hand and pocket.

The one question that always popped up was ""Will the flame damage the phone?"" This was of course our main concern so we found a high heat resistant polyurethane that would protect the phone from damage. After we found it and the plastic met our needs, we started making 3D printout-outs and mock prototypes and then we finally made a working prototype.

","WORLD'S FIRST iPHONE CASE THAT DOUBLES AS REFILLABLE BUTANE  LIGHTER!Our Story:

Over a year ago, co-founder Raúl Góngora was sitting at a patio bar when he was asked by someone to borrow a lighter. When he checked his pockets, the only thing he could find was his iPhone. The idea immediately popped in his head to invent a case for an iPhone that would incorporate a butane lighter as part of the case. After weeks of searching the internet for a similar product and finding NOTHING like it, he began to draw up plans for his invention. Co-founder Rob Haas and roommate at the time, loved the idea and together they decided to make the dream a reality. They applied and received a patent and the last step was to produce it.
Rob Haas (co founder) and Raúl Góngora (inventor and co founder).
Raúl and Rob are both iPhone accessory fanatics. Always interested in anything iPhone related, they were a perfect match to create the next big iPhone accessory.

The idea of the CELLTORCH was a perfect example of how necessity is the mother of invention. Being a smoker and like many other smokers, Raul would always lose his lighter by misplacing it or lending it to someone who would immediately put it in their pocket and not return it. Being that it was much harder to lose an iPhone, a smartphone case that WAS the lighter was the perfect combination.

They spent over a year designing and testing the case with engineers in order to have the perfect form and function. Big enough to hold a sufficient amount of butane so you wouldn't have to constantly refill it but small enough to hold comfortably in your hand and pocket.

The one question that always popped up was ""Will the flame damage the phone?"" This was of course our main concern so we found a high heat resistant polyurethane that would protect the phone from damage. After we found it and the plastic met our needs, we started making 3D printout-outs and mock prototypes and then we finally made a working prototype.

Our goal of $50,000 is to cover the costs of making the molds for the parts, manufacturing and assembly, quality control testing and shipping. We are in talks with a butane lighter manufacturer who is well versed and experienced in designing and  manufacturing butane lighters of different shapes and sizes and we are confident that our relationship will yield a quality product.
So PLEASE Help us out Indiegogo! Help us start the fire by backing us, and being the first to own a completely new and innovative product!
Please Like and Share us us on Facebook
Check out our Website and watch our ""making of"" videos on Youtube",8.0,0,"1 Campaign
0,"

Introducing world's first ever 3in1 Lightercase - the protective smartphone case with built-in no-flame no-fuel lighter and LED flashlight!   It was conceived, designed and will be immediately manufactured in the heart of Silicon Valley, California, USA.
Please support our campaign, as we are trying to get these out in time for the holidays.
Lightercase was designed to provide users with the convenience of a smartphone case with multiple functionality so that mobile users have access to a lighter while on the go.

Lightercase works safely via a heated, metallic coil, just like a car lighter. When the protective Latch covering the coil is slid back and held for two seconds, the coil produces just under five watts of heat energy - enough to light one cigarette, but not damage the phone - then automatically shuts off within four seconds.
Though it's intended only for adults eighteen years and older, a latch guards the metallic coil and also keeps the lighter from activating while in your pocket or bag.

Lightercase can ignite up to five hundred cigarettes before needing one hour recharge. A built-in USB port provides easy recharge options, including your smartphone's power adapter, or a desktop or laptop computer.

When the case is being charged, there is a red light to indicate the charge, which also flashes when the case is fully charged.

The case also features a rear LED flashlight - handy if the phone's battery is dead, and light is required.

Sleek and durable polycarbonate plastic protects your phone from drops or bumps, and it just flexible enough for easy removal.

Lightercase's heat-insulating properties is being tested by MET Labs in Santa Clara, CA, a Nationally Recognized Testing Laboratory (NRTL) with approved to perform safety testing by the US federal agency Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA).

Lightercase comes in four color combinations:
- Black with black metal accents
- Black with blue metal
- White with white metal
- White with pink metal

Lightercase models are designed for:
- iPhone 5 and 5S
- iPhone 4 and 4S
- Samsung Galaxy S3 and S4
- HTC One

Hello. My name is Jason Buzi and I'm the creator of Lightercase. I've been an entrepreneur for as long as I can remember. When I was a kid, I used to sell cookies door to door. The only problem was I ate most of my profits :) Then, when I got a little older, I got a paper route. Getting up before 6 AM to deliver the papers was a challenge, to say the least. But my natural creativity and curiosity meant I was always coming up with ideas - for stories, businesses, and just new ways of doing things. Some things haven't changed. I've had a successful career in the mortgage and real estate business. One of the great things about it has been the time and freedom it has given me. I've used that to travel the world, and volunteer as well. I volunteered at a school in Gdansk, Poland and helped establish a library in Ghana, West Africa. I have tutored underprivileged children closer to home.
column4:
/>
Last year, I decided it would be a nice idea to make a nice functional case. Just as I was brainstorming trying to come up with a neat idea, I noticed people kept asking me for ""a light"", wherever I went. I also noticed that I often need ""a light"" myself, but as a non-smoker, more of the flashlight kind. So I decided to build a smartphone case with a lighter and flashlight in one.
column7:
/>
Prototyping was a process that took quite a bit of revision to get it right. The first cases were beautiful and worked well, but they had one big problem: They were much too hard to put on the phone and nearly impossible to remove. We had to make the plastic a little more flexible, while keeping the look, feel, and durability. We tinkered quite a bit with the switch to, concerned with making it both safe and easy to operate. We are happy to report that after months of trial and error and tinkering and testing, we have the perfect Lightercase. We even began working on an injection mold to mass produce them.

column1: Now all we need is your support to complete the injection mold process and bring the Lightercase to the general public! With your enthusiastic contribution we may be able to get the Lightercases to you in time for the holidays!
The success of the Lightercase will also allow us to fund libraries in Africa such as the one I volunteered at in Ghana. So, pick a perk and feel good about it!
Lightercase is so simple. Watch a caveman use it:

SirCharge is the smallest sync/charge keyring cable + keyring in the world and features a standard metal USB connector that are fully concealed in a keyring cap. Inter-locking detent inside the key ring cap provides worry-free secure connection of the USB-A connector while the other connector is secured with a strong pull magnet.

It attaches to your keys or use it as a keyring for your keys, making it impossible to forget or leave behind so you always have a charging cable handy. Perfect for home, travel, in the car, office or anywhere on the go.

SirCharge is available in 3 different connectors, Lightning, Micro USB and USB-C and you can be assured of its quality, reliability, durability and compatibility. SirCharge is MFi certified and it works flawlessly with all iOS devices.
SirCharge is the ideal size to carry around, it fits unnoticed in a pocket or handbag with your keys, it is Powerful, Portable, Universal and Affordable.
Inter-locking detent inside the key ring cap provides worry-free secure connection of the USB-A connector while the other connector is secured with a strong pull magnet.

You can attach SirCharge to your bag or keys so it is impossible to forget and it is always there unnoticed until you need it.

Risks and challenges

We’ve worked hard over the last several months to get SirCharge to this point. We have completed critical milestones with the help of many knowledgeable people. We are continuing with our very reputable manufacturer who offers great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and so we're confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

We have done our testing and certification and cannot wait to put SirCharge into your hands and onto your keyring. We anticipate a manufacturing period of 10 weeks from the end of the campaign to start shipping SirCharge to you. This is possible because we’ve already completed our R&
column2:
D, obtained our Apple MFi and created the injection mould and the rest we can complete and have SirCharge shipped to you no later than July, 2017.

Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen!

We're so excited to bring you up to speed with what we have been working on at goze.
Earlier this year we launched goze Antimicrobial SoundCases for
iPhones (5/5s,6/6s, 6 Plus and 6s Plus) and Samsung Galaxy models
We launched 11 models simultaneously, in 5 colors (55 new SKU's!)
On April 19th we received US Patent 9,318,089 B2, for a Sound Amplifying Cases For Electronic Devices. (see cover photo, below.)
Our patented cover, which converts to a stand, also incorporates a vibrational board, within the cover, which produces richer and fuller sound adding both bass and treble.
Our goze covers release multi directional audio and sound more like small stereos, than iPhones
At goze, it's REALLY what's inside that counts... with nothing else needed to boost iPhone sound by 250%!!!
goze requires NO Wires.  NO Batteries.  No SYNCHING.  No BLUETOOTH.  EVER!
With our goze ""BUMP"", we are able to collect, redirect, and release amplified sound out of the side of our SoundCases, our trademark, Side Out Sound Technology (S.O.S)
goze SoundCase testing for Antimicrobial efficacy was performed at Microchem Labs, Texas.  Microchem Labs is a recognized leading U.S test lab for Antimicrobial products.
Microchem Labs performed a 24 hour s.aureas test on randomly selected goze SoundCases and our results significantly exceeded the minimum requirement for antimicrobial with a 99.99997% reduction.
Antimicrobial products fall under EPA Pesticides Regulations.
goze SoundCases uses an EPA Registered Active Antimicrobial Ingredient: Silver EPA Registration Number: 71227-1-72854
What We Need, and What You Get
Our Indiegogo campaign goal is to raise $30,000.00 for the production of new molds for the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus.
With your help we will be able to bring to market the goze Summit SoundCase, featuring
Join our campaign...so we can ALL enjoy the Summit, together!
Don't have an iPhone?  Help spread the word.  Together we can achieve great things!

We are C60. We're thrilled to introduce to you this elegant, smooth spinning stress reliever, disguised as a beautiful metallic signature pen:

In[k]ception 2.0 — The World's Best Minimal Fidget-Spinner Pen that equips with the high quality that brings you an excellent writing experience and also helps relieve stress and anxiety.
column34:
s=18dbc1dbeacf4d191522ec5dd67d8bc2"" src=""""/>


This is where it all starts, put down your computer phones, magic screens, and electronic typewriters. In[k]ception 2.0 is that simple inky mark in your sketchbook where the really big ideas are born.
column42:
s=94f0bedc6a1ebfd6fc8897e0a81b87e5"" src=""""/>


In[k]ception 2.0 is the simplest and most intuitive way that unleash your creativity within, enhance your thought process, and even make you feel at peace and relax.
column50:
s=7e708b670eda3a95ce19d5acded3ef05"" src=""""/>


You can let it be with you to work out a difficult problem
column58:
s=f2942882f7bb9ad71c3390304c7955a9"" src=""""/>


Or help you get through a tense moment.
column66:
s=9c1a9e3c0e798798ff75938850d0860c"" src=""""/>


Even just gain focus whenever you need to.
column74:
s=a4e8e01e6f7f2bf082e2170503d12b6e"" src=""""/>

 

Hands-on Review

Thanks to Chris honest review. Click the button to see why he like Jeffbona:)
column83:
s=c0d0b43e8bea0ac5ec7fc5b58d3668f4"" src=""""/>


We created this Pen originally to relieve the stress of work and school. The more research we did, the more we understood how prevalent fidgeting was in the world. 

We also realized this product would benefit those who have ADD, ADHD, and autism by helping them channel their fidgeting into a useful and discrete device.
column91:
s=9fe4000be69fa636454d9a2938e978f8"" src=""""/>


We wanted to design a pen different from others. Not just for the exquisite workmanship and appearance, but also does more than just a precise writting tool.
column99:
s=44ab84c9aa429eee18a3727db6911c69"" src=""""/>


So we combined a spinning top and a well-writing pen together that allows you to excite inspiration and release stress in your everyday life.
column107:
s=11aa12c30b58b7528f90e85ac4c0edc0"" src=""""/>


""Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works."" - STEVE JOBS

 

Backers Review


After the last successful Kickstarter project, you supported our vision to build what we believe are the world's first fidget-spinner pen. 

The Kickstarter community believed in us before anyone else even knew we existed. We just want to thank for every backer who has donated forces to our previous project. 

Share Some Great Feedbacks We Received From Our Last Campaign :-D

column1: • Fully metallic, made with an aluminum alloy
You can engrave any words you want on the pen. It will be customized as you expected.
column9:
s=41162f25dae4c4eb22b97679024f997c"" src=""""/>


Your chosen text will be engraved on the pen top. 

You can engrave names, company logos, or just a message of love you want to share with someone.
column17:
s=adba9a6ccf118518789c23ffe15951ef"" src=""""/>


ONLY $5 for the Kickstarter backers to put down your words and customized the pen only for you. 

 

Steps to edit your pledge amount:

column1:
*Pen Sleeve

Each pen comes with a specially designed leather sleeve that makes a perfect addition to it.
column17:
s=e8298c8beee33a00582df96d114e0b33"" src=""""/>


We offer the In[k]ception 2.0 in two different colors (maybe we could do one more). All pens are packaged in a fine box, great for giving as a gift as is.
column25:
s=c4fe0a80276fe8ebd32292cf2627f0e0"" src=""""/>


Make Jeffbona becomes a refined gift that can be given to your most beloved.
column33:
s=882a638fbf570b342b241175b6739e35"" src=""""/>


In[k]ception 2.0 is made to be durable. It’s 100% metal, no plastic in sight and machined from high-quality raw materials, resulting in incredible strength and durability
column41:
s=537d16f47f112cca1c7a1cdd1dcc7ffe"" src=""""/>


We have upgraded the spinner from its inside. Now with the newer tech, it can easily spin for more than a minute.
column49:
s=6df7a92276e260f7597945b5e6c03a90"" src=""""/>


We placed two ball bearings inside the rotary wing. Ball bearings are made of silicon nitride, the same material used in aerospace plane bearings. Space grade ball bearings allow each pen to be able to spin smoothly for a lifetime
column57:
s=bf1ae7b048f33b2bf7f9d22ad8188fb8"" src=""""/>

And then we redesigned it to make the spinning top smoother and streamlined with the body of the pen.
column65:
s=f634e962a962bbd3ac0b2bcac199f170"" src=""""/>


Please email us with any questions in mind. Our support email hi@jeffbona.com
column73:
s=d05fbd37315aa0226ad8214ada1bc1b1"" src=""""/>


The pen is 37.6 g in mass. The pen body and shaft are composed of  an anodized grade 6063 aluminum alloy. The bearing is silver nitride, and the counterweight is brass. Now that's a nice pen!

column1:
A Writing Tool that will never let you down 

Not only does the pen look good, but it also writes well. We have tried and tested different types of cartridges and have chosen the best one for you, which uses Schneider Gelion 39 refill in order to provide you with the smoothest writing experience
column9:
s=9eedc1b3bd5e529869e347ecb68f81c1"" src=""""/>

 You will get one free black Schneider refill within each pen you pledged
column17:
s=f04ee3edcad2135f478a61c5117af979"" src=""""/>


To replace the ink cartridge, simply twist the body of the top half out. Proceed to rotate the main shaft of the pen ""lefty lucy"". Take the two components apart and the ink is accessible for an easy exchange. Did we mention you can easily buy a new Schneider Gelion 39 refill online? We love it.
column33:
s=19e0c9b5c7b48d7f8eeba328bd8cd4be"" src=""""/>


Contributing now will have the most impact on our campaign.
column41:
s=7f06c59cee59a8955867767704d46849"" src=""""/>


“A single idea from the human mind can build cities. An idea can transform the world and rewrite all the rules.” – Inception, 2010 

That's why we created the In[k]ception. We were shocked by the gorgeous plots and magical action stunts from “Inception” in 2010. And we were fascinated by their “totems”, which for Leonardo DiCaprio’s character, was a little spinning top. On the basis of this little spinning top, the legitimacy of the previous 3 hours was left to hinge. And this uncertainty left us to ponder: can we, too, have such a powerful little totem? What can we make that will leave an audience in such suspense? Another Spinning top? No, that’s not cool. 

My friends Nick and Apollo, through much inspiration, decided to combine a ballpoint pen with a spinner. And in 2014, we got our first Prototype: Ink R1. We put a rotatory ring at the top and using a bearing to hold it. 

We tested thousands of materials and models and finally found a style that fits Jeffbona. We started production last year and launched on Kickstarter. Fortunately, we have gained a small success and have our own fans. Some backers had been asking if there will be a new generation of products, and then we begin to thinking: Why not?
column57:
s=8cb613c5e95061d31c9712674320f753"" src=""""/>


 “A single idea from the human mind can build cities. An idea can transform the world and rewrite all the rules.” – Inception, 2010 

We hope that In[K]ception 2.0 can rewrite yours.
column68:
