Now with the newer tech, it can easily spin for more than a minute. We placed two ball bearings inside the rotary wing. Ball bearings are made of silicon nitride, the same material used in aerospace plane bearings. Space grade ball bearings allow each pen to be able to spin smoothly for a lifetime And then we redesigned it to make the spinning top smoother and streamlined with the body of the pen.Please email us with any questions in mind. Our support email hi@jeffbona.com The pen is 37.6 g in mass. The pen body and shaft are composed of  an anodized grade 6063 aluminum alloy. The bearing is silver nitride, and the counterweight is brass. Now that's a nice pen!

A Writing Tool that will never let you down Not only does the pen look good, but it also writes well. We have tried and tested different types of cartridges and have chosen the best one for you, which uses Schneider Gelion 39 refill in order to provide you with the smoothest writing experience   You will get one free black Schneider refill within each pen you pledged  To replace the ink cartridge, simply twist the body of the top half out. Proceed to rotate the main shaft of the pen ""lefty lucy"". Take the two components apart and the ink is accessible for an easy exchange. Did we mention you can easily buy a new Schneider Gelion 39 refill online? We love it.  Contributing now will have the most impact on our campaign.   “A single idea from the human mind can build cities. An idea can transform the world and rewrite all the rules.” – Inception, 2010 That's why we created the In[k]ception. We were shocked by the gorgeous plots and magical action stunts from “Inception” in 2010. And we were fascinated by their “totems”, which for Leonardo DiCaprio’s character, was a little spinning top. On the basis of this little spinning top, the legitimacy of the previous 3 hours was left to hinge. And this uncertainty left us to ponder: can we, too, have such a powerful little totem? What can we make that will leave an audience in such suspense? Another Spinning top? No, that’s not cool. My friends Nick and Apollo, through much inspiration, decided to combine a ballpoint pen with a spinner. And in 2014, we got our first Prototype: Ink R1. We put a rotatory ring at the top and using a bearing to hold it. We tested thousands of materials and models and finally found a style that fits Jeffbona. We started production last year and launched on Kickstarter. Fortunately, we have gained a small success and have our own fans. Some backers had been asking if there will be a new generation of products, and then we begin to thinking: Why not?  “A single idea from the human mind can build cities. An idea can transform the world and rewrite all the rules.” – Inception, 2010 We hope that In[K]ception 2.0 can rewrite yours. <Inception> 2010. Christopher Nolan",36.0,1,"1 Campaign
Delivers a high-speed charge while connected to a USB-C PD charger.
Take advantage of the Fast Charge feature on your iPhone X—charging up to 50% in 30 minutes when connected to an 18W or higher USB-C power adapter.
iPhone XS Max Charging test. Charging up to 50% in 30 minutes when paired with an 18W or higher USB-C power adapter.
MFi certified for compatibility and quality you can count on.
We are an Apple MFi certified brand.
New lightning cable uses the C94 chip, which is the same bitcoin encryption level and cannot be cracked. Only the MFi-certified USB-C to Lightning charging cable support PD fast charging.
That means the fake ones will quit the market soon.

MFi Certified is short for ‘made for iPhone/iPad/iPod’ Certified, which is the official certification from Apple. Accessories that owns MFi certification will not damage your Apple devices or cause any danger such as electric leakage.
Those cables designed with fresh ideas below are not able to obtain MFi Certification and can't work well with iPhones. Super Cable has MFi certification and is trustworthy.
We use special technical processes and materials to make the super cable stronger and more conductive.

column8:
s=041ac3060c6c095e314ca24d71ed3342"" src=""""/>

You can pull a car with Super Cable to prove that this cable is strong enough.

column1: This design can better protect your cable.
It took us a few months to complete a design that was very stylish and practical. We are proud of our design.
The cable works reliably after 30,000 multi-directional flexes. Lasts 30× longer than other cables.
Our 4-foot cable is longer than the standard 3-foot cable, so you can connect and charge your iPhone in the car, on the nightstand, and more.
Much thicker than Apple original USB-C to Lightning cable
Feedback from the previous project: USB-C Super Cable. We will follow the same product standards and technical processes to make it ""SUPER"".
Our product vision: simple, durable, worry-free. We seek the strongest and best materials to develop products with ergonomic designs.

Our team is based in San Francisco, Shenzhen and Osaka. Craftsmanship is what we pursue. We have excellent product development engineers, and we have a mature production and manufacturing supply chain to ensure that our products are of high quality from design to output. Our first generation Super Cable have received a great response since they were put into the market. Now we are developing a new generation products, which we believe will bring surprises to our users.
As a hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. Due to supply chain issues and other reasons, the final manufacturing schedule may be delayed.
However, we will be as transparent as possible to keep you informed and work to resolve any issues that may arise. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

Attention: We are building our own Web-site, before our works done, please check product pictures/photo in the ""Gallery"". We are sorry for this inconvinience.

Why we are building this machine? Because FDM 3D printers work slowly, because FDM machines cannot produce a high resolution,
because most of the 3D printers are not ""Good-looking/Cute/ Beautiful"", also, because all DLP 3D printers are expensive, because UV resins are expensive, because...

So ! So we developped our products with affordable prices ! With DLP tech, with high speed, with high resolution, with unbeatable low price of UV resins and high solidity resin! We are give away Nautilus DIY kits for FREE! This is REAL ! Please take a look the following features and join us for a whole new revolution !

You can put up the DIY Kit and use DLP or LED projectors to shine a 1024 x 768 pixel image onto a layer of photo-initiated polymer resin.  The result is a quick solid cure of the entire layer in one operation.  The layer thickness is typically 100 microns but your model can be sliced even thinner if you need even higher resolution.  Note that 100 microns is .1 mm or about 0.004""

column2: Weight: 20cm*30cm*55cm , DIY kit is about 6 pounds (2.7 kg)

column1: Accuracy: Resolutions in the z (vertical) build axis from 100 to less than 10 microns are possible.
Speed:  Using higher resolutions in the z-axis may result in slower build rates. When you choose different resolutions, speed various from 12 to 24 mm per hour.
Build Volume: the build area is 102.4 mm (4.03″) x 76.8 mm (3.02″) x 1200 mm (4.72″) at the 100 micron.
At the 50 micron x/y pixels setting, the build area is 51.2 mm (2.02″) x 38.4 mm (1.52″) x 1200 mm (4.72″).

UV Resins: High solidity resin can hold dozens of kilos on a square inch. It can be painted with any color. It contains several high quality chemical materials: Photo Initiator, Monomer, Strength holder and Photo Inhibitor. The normal resin does not contain the strength holder, but it is more clear and at Very Good Price (We will upload our test results soon!)
Our normal resin costs about 4 cents per gram, making the material costs to print a 3"" cube less than $1!
All we need now is your support and a large initial order to keep the costs reasonable.
DIY kit without projector: FREE (after purchasing 3kg High Resin)

For the first nine backers, you will get a free DIY kit and 3kg high solidity resin for only 363 dollars with free shipping ! You can assemble the kit by yourself and use your own DLP or LED projectors or purchase any brand product with brightness higher than 2700 lumens.
For the second thirty nine backers, you will get the same kit as the first packgage with a normal price 387 dollars（equals to price of 3kg resin）with free shipping !
For other backers, please see our Perks, we have more attractive packages for you !
Every backer will receive our packgages in time and full product life technical support.
Who we are and Who am I , Why we need you help ??

We are a 3D printer technology team in Beijing, China. We have nine members working on this program. We are trying to break 
the price-iceberg in the current 3D printers market, furthermore, we have plans to develop low cost 3D printers with industrial 
high resolution for makers, for designers, for everyone!

My name is Lei. I was a technician in an IT company in Xian, I am also a maker, I like to make small cute things. I saw 3D printer technology four years ago, then I decided to join this revolution, but I did not have enough funds to purchase machines at that time. Then I met some friends, we built this tech company to lower the price for makers same as me. I would like all of you join this 3rd industrial revolution, we can design beautiful things without concerning costs or low qualities ! You can discuss this topic with me via email: nautiluswang@gmail.com

3000 dollars will help us to build our confidence and start this program. We can start to rent a place for establishing our chemical lab and test more resins for you.   But we believe the goal will 
be achieved every quickly, if funding goes to 50 000 dollars, we can make our production more cost-effective, we can develop more genres of UV resins and send samples to all the backers for free. Machines will have more functions and backers will receive extra gifts.
Please feel free to ask questions and discuss the 3D printing revolution with us !

For example, why we can build these low cost machines?
Because we get low production cost in our country, and International Water shipping fees are not expensive.
Do you have any quesions ? Any goals to develop more genres of resins with us ?

Contact our leader: nautiluswang@gmail.com

Roughly 200 million credit and identification cards now have RFID technology embedded into them. All U.S. Passports issued since October 2006 also have RFID chips, which contain all the data from the document’s first page including your photo. A growing number of states (New York, Michigan, Washington, Vermont) are now issuing special driver’s licenses “enhanced” with long range RFID chips.
This technology leaves consumers vulnerable to electronic pickpocketing, which can happen in the blink of an eye without the victim even knowing.
ID Guardian protects your identification and financial information with stylish and convenient phone cases equipped with state-of-the-art technology that blocks unauthorized RFID readers.
What is RFID and how does it work?

RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) is the technology that lets you simply wave your credit or identification card, passport or license in front of a nearby scanner instead of having to slide the magnetic stripe through it. It’s a fairly simple concept. The electronic scanner sends a signal that is received by an antenna connected to the card’s RFID chip, thus activating it.

Unfortunately, criminals with minimal technical skills can construct their own clandestine RFID readers with a few simple supplies. These devices can steal your private financial information quickly and silently. All the perpetrator needs to do is come near your wallet with the hidden card reader.
Does my card have an RFID chip?

If your card is equipped with PayWave, PayPass or blink, as indicated by a logo on the card, then it has an RFID chip embedded in it. The absence of a logo, however, does not mean that your card does not have an RFID chip. To confirm, call the customer service number on the back of your card. Even if you cannot get a definite answer, it is always safest to protect your cards and ensure that you do not fall victim to identity theft.
How Can I Guard Against Identity Theft and Electronic Pickpocketing?

To prevent identity theft, you must vigilantly guard your personal information. Thoroughly shred all bank statements before recycling them, and cut up your old credit cards before discarding. Exercise caution when shopping at online retailers, and make sure that you do not submit your credit card information over any unsecured servers.

Most importantly, make sure you guard your credit and identification cards against unauthorized RFID readers from ID Guardian. Many credit cards contain RFID chips that record your personal information, so if you do not use a secure wallet, identity thieves can obtain your personal and financial data using hidden RFID readers.

The founders of ID Guardian recognized the dire need for privacy protection for RFID chipped items such as credit and identification cards, and created the first mobile phone travel case with RFID shielding protection.

RFID chips are frequently embedded in credit cards, debit cards, passports, drivers’ licenses, healthcare cards, ID cards, and transportation cards including most subway fare cards. While convenient, this technology leaves consumers vulnerable to electronic pickpocketing.

The concept of electronic pickpocketing is relatively unknown to the public due to the fact that the press and major credit card companies have been slow to recognize the privacy dangers associated with RFID chips previously used in commercial and private sectors.

ID Guardian’s products protect individuals from electronic pickpocketing and identity theft with their unique shielding protection.  Launched with a line of mobile phone cases for iPhones, Samsung and other Android phones, ID Guardian’s manufacturing capabilities also extend to identity protection for passport cases, wallets, handbags, purses, iPad cases and much more.

An entrepreneur and executive leader for more than 15 years, Matt has experienced great success in business development, sales management and market development. With a keen understanding of how to build brand recognition and market share, Matt has successfully led past business endeavors as a visionary sales leader, coach, manager and senior executive.  His razor-sharp strategic focus and thorough command of details have enabled him to build industry-leading companies and establish himself as an innovative business leader.

Matt also had more than 10 years of experience in contract manufacturing and overseas development in Asia and various countries throughout the world. His strong business ties in the Far East have helped shape the foundations of his companies and partnerships, and enable his businesses to offer products with excellent, high-quality manufacturing.

Shubham Agnihotri is an astute and results oriented professional with 12 years of experience in contract manufacturing management, corporate account management, operations, project management, sales and marketing with demonstrated profit accountability.
Shubham is a keen strategist with deep expertise in managing entire operations. He maintains a sharp focus on top line and bottom line profitability by ensuring optimal utilization of resources.

Based in Taipei, Taiwan, with additional offices in China and India, Shubham has extensive experience managing offshore manufacturing contracts that are on par with international quality standards.  He has facilitated the successful ramp up of business assignments, while working in close coordination with clients and ensuring efficient service deliverables.

At ID Guardian, Shubham is an effective communicator and team leader with strong analytical, problem solving and organizational skills. His track record of forging business partnerships has proven invaluable to the company.

Roughly 200 million credit and identification cards now have RFID technology embedded into them. No matter how
much you plan for your trip, problems happen, like a lost passport, broken
laptop, diarrhea, and so on, and you’d want to have someone to turn to
especially when you’re in unfamiliar territory, and with no internet access.
We at POPManila want to help. We’re a startup
from the Philippines, and we want you to visit our country as well as other
Southeast Asian nations. We recognize that not all countries have a reliable emergency number
like 9-1-1 in the U.S. We want your trip to be as hassle-free as possible, so we
built an app that has all the important local numbers a traveler might need and
can be accessed even while offline.

How will you search for important numbers when data roaming or WIFI is not
accessible? helloZIG can be accessed even without internet connection so that
you know who to call at the moment of need. You can download and update
helloZIG before getting to your destination for your peace of mind.

Israeli civilians have anywhere from 15 to 90 seconds to seek shelter when an alarm sounds, signaling an incoming rocket from the Gaza Strip.  With time being of the essence, Rocket Angel allows these innocent civilians to get their immediate proximity and direction to Gaza using an interactive compass, informing them the likely trajectory and direction of the incoming rocket.

Our team consists of a few Israeli developers, as well as four American and French interns.  Although we come from very different backgrounds, we are all currently under the constant threat of a rocket attack, and find ourselves struggling to seek shelter during a rocket alarm as many as five or six times a day.  If away from home or out of the office, it is often extremely difficult to find a public bomb shelter, therefore making it a reality to seek shelter behind a building or in an alleyway.  The ultimate aim of this App is to help improve the safety of Israeli citizens during the stressful seconds of a rocket attack by providing them with an App to help them reach safety during times of unrest.

What We Need
column2: >We're asking for $5,000 over the next thirty days to further develop our App to increase response time, improve reliability and add more data and features. Specifically, we are currently developing a feature that will enable users to add the location of bomb shelters, so that panicked users will be able to find the nearest shelter during a rocket attack.  Furthermore, people willing to offer their home or other safe places during a rocket attack will be able to post their location so people without a shelter will not be forced to endure the attack without shelter. Additionally, we aim to add a vibrating feature, so that people who cannot leave the sounds on their phone on during the day will never miss any important alerts or hazards.  Lastly, any leftover funding will be donated to the building of more bomb shelters throughout Israel.  This project was created solely to improve the safety of innocent civilians during dangerous rocket attacks, and we are not looking to profit in any way.

column1: Rocket Angel will provide an essential tool to Israeli civilians in need of immediate assistance in seeking shelter during rocket attacks from the Gaza strip.  Your support will go directly to the further development of our app, which will in turn increase the means of safety for people searching for the optimal shelter during an impeding rocket attack.  Ultimately, we cannot solve the conflict in the Middle East, but it is our goal to help keep innocent civilians safe from the fighting by providing our free app to anybody in need.

Our true hope is that our app will be irrelevant by tomorrow, the Middle East Conflict will end, and no more rockets will ever be launched into Israel from the Gaza Strip.  However, this is not reality.  Rocket Angel aims to make the best of a bad situation, by ultimately helping to minimize the danger and risk faced by innocent Israeli civilians on a daily basis.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you're unable to donate to our cause, you can still help! Share our story with your friends on Indiegogo, Facebook, Twitter and any other form of social media you can think of.  Every penny counts, and who knows, it could even save somebody's life!

It’s a fact that smart phones’ connectivity, functionality and video performance have been improved remarkably in recent years. However, audio performance is still overly inadequate without external speakers or headset.

The LoudBy sound case was created to improve smartphones’ audio quality and bring the listening experience to a whole new level. Naturally it also acts as a protective cover, although it does that with style.

LoudBy was established in March 2013 in Oulu, Finland. The founders are ex-Nokians with a passion for audio and mobile devices. Our team is dedicated to boost sound quality by designing solutions, which add value to customers. The customer experience, giving you something new and better, is the most important thing for us. The quest for better sound experience drives the team towards new fabulous inventions and products.


We now need your contribution, support and enthusiasm to make LoudBy also for iPhone 5 and iPhone 5S!


Join Us in Developing LoudBy Sound Case for iPhone 5 and iPhone 5S

We have developed LoudBy

column1: Sound Case for Samsung Galaxy S4. The next step is to finalize the development

of LoudBy for iPhone 5/5S. The audio channel has been simulated and designed. First prototypes show that audio improvement is at least as good as in the Samsung Galaxy S4 version. The industrial design concept has been chosen and final design will be ready in April.

LoudBy Sound Case for Samsung Galaxy S4 is ready and shipping. Would you like to be part of developing a new LoudBy Sound Case for iPhone 5/5S?

Extra funding is needed for mould design and manufacturing. According to schedule production will start in the end of June.

If you want to be part of creating something awesome to the mobile ecosystem, help us secure successful completion of LoudBy for iPhone 5/5S!
Functionality of LoudBy Sound Case is based on Sonic
Force’s patented (pending) acoustic innovation. Original speaker outlet located
at the back or side of the device is least efficient where it matters, towards the user.
LoudBy sound case directs audio towards the listener and at the same time sound
radiation to the backside attenuates. For example, think of children playing a
video game in the backseat during your holiday car trip. With LoudBy sound
directivity the booms and the bangs stay in the back while the frontseat
passangers can listen to their favorite music.
LoudBy sound case is made of durable and fully
recyclable plastics to protect your device from scratches. Speaker component is
better shielded against dust and debris that might otherwise block the sound
The novel patent pending implementation of sound
outlet duct improves maximum sound pressure level up to 12 dB. Low frequencies
become stronger and give you much more bass. You can clearly hear that the
highest frequencies are crispier. Your friends will not believe a sound this
mesmerizing really comes from your smartphone!
LoudBy Sound Case Adds Value to You

column6: >Listen to music wherever you are.
column13:
>Navigate or watch live ice hockey in the car.

Update:

Please donate anything you can. We need the funding to continue to develop our app and run it for the first year.

$800 has funded our launch in Berkeley. Thank you to everyone that has donated!

In the next week, we need:

- $600 to pay designers to finesse the code.

- $400 to upgrade our servers

- $1000 to start the build for Sospo Pro

If potato salad can raise $50,000+, help us get ahead!

Crowdfund to see Sospo become a reality and spread across the world! We need your help.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our Story: “Football diplomacy""

Sospo is a movement, a social sports movement to bridge gaps and bring people together to speak the common language of sports. It is a humble and gradual solution to bringing people together. 

People from different countries have been able to play sports during the worst conflicts. Pakistan and India have had a history of conflict, but Pakistanis and Indians have always played sport together. You can say “I don’t agree with his ideology, but he is a great bowler”. This is what can make people overcome their differences.

Sports can provide people with the opportunity to understand each other’s differences so that they can co-exist and learn from one another.  We believe that we can contribute to the world in giving everyone a chance to meet on mutual terms and on a mutual interest using our app as the starting point. 

In developed countries, where there is stability, it is about giving people a chance to improve their health. In developing countries, it is a platform to bring about that very stability. 

 Existing social apps have focused on connecting people and “adding friends”. The future is establishing emotional connections and expressions. Sport has always been tied to emotion and we hope to bring them together. We need $20,000 to continue to spread the app globally for one year. 

Ever defined Sospo? It means loyal, respectful, and a gentlemen at the same time. 

Who we are?

We are two Berkeley students who met studying for our Masters whilst staying at International House in Berkeley. 

 Leo: “I studied at the London School of Economics before coming to Berkeley. I am trained as a Solicitor in the UK, but traveled to the USA to benefit from a different perspective of law. I spoke with Mohammad before coming to Berkeley and we agreed that we would share a room together. Little did I know when booking with Air BnB that all other students had the same idea. 

 The only room I could find was in a Buddhist centre in downtown Berkeley. On our penultimate night, I was jet-lagged and spent the evening Googling what I envisioned was a “tinder-ish app for tennis”. 

When we were woken up by yellow notes being put under our door preaching Buddhist sayings for the day, Mohammad turned to me and said “What about starting a business: we should connect people through sport.” 

Mohammad: “I studied in the University of London’s external program in Karachi and have spent the last 7 years working for different companies in Pakistan before joining Berkeley Law. Leo and I always throw business ideas at each other whilst we were living together, knowing that we would jump on something that was right. When he told me he had exactly the same idea with “tinder for tennis”, we discussed it and thought it was brilliant. 

 I am and have always been a strong believer in good principles and we were certain it had to be something that had a higher purpose than just an another app. We understand that this will start with a small impact, but we hope it will in the future have a large positive impact globally.

The Impact

Sospo in the short term is about helping everyone get fit and meet people. This is what we do: Be Fit. Be Social. In the long term, Sospo will promote mutual relations and get people to understand cultural differences and bond over a common ground.

Contribute and help us spread Sospo from Berkeley to the world!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Post our video on Facebook and Twitter. Help spread the word and get others involved!

    The 'FlashWalk'

    This Sunday 13th July, we will be hosting a flashwalk across the Berkeley campus. This will involve a party of 200+ people wearing blue Sospo T-shirts (handed it out by us) touring across campus, ending with a game of Bubble Soccer and other Giant Sports Games.

    Please come join us by meeting at Henry's (Durant Avenue, Berkeley) for the World Cup Final. We look forward to seeing you there!


      Thank you!

      Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo page.

      For more information, watch our video or get in touch with us directly on our Twitter page: https://twitter.com/Sospoapp

      We would love to hear from you. 

      Leo and Mohammad.

      ","Update:Please donate anything you can. We need the funding to continue to develop our app and run it for the first year. $800 has funded our launch in Berkeley. Thank you to everyone that has donated!In the next week, we need:- $600 to pay designers to finesse the code.- $400 to upgrade our servers- $1000 to start the build for Sospo ProIf potato salad can raise $50,000+, help us get ahead!Crowdfund to see Sospo become a reality and spread across the world! We need your help.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Our Story: “Football diplomacy""Sospo is a movement, a social sports movement to bridge gaps and bring people together to speak the common language of sports. It is a humble and gradual solution to bringing people together. People from different countries have been able to play sports during the worst conflicts. Pakistan and India have had a history of conflict, but Pakistanis and Indians have always played sport together. You can say “I don’t agree with his ideology, but he is a great bowler”. This is what can make people overcome their differences.Sports can provide people with the opportunity to understand each other’s differences so that they can co-exist and learn from one another.  We believe that we can contribute to the world in giving everyone a chance to meet on mutual terms and on a mutual interest using our app as the starting point. In developed countries, where there is stability, it is about giving people a chance to improve their health. In developing countries, it is a platform to bring about that very stability.  Existing social apps have focused on connecting people and “adding friends”. The future is establishing emotional connections and expressions. Sport has always been tied to emotion and we hope to bring them together. We need $20,000 to continue to spread the app globally for one year. Ever defined Sospo? It means loyal, respectful, and a gentlemen at the same time.    Who we are?We are two Berkeley students who met studying for our Masters whilst staying at International House in Berkeley.  Leo: “I studied at the London School of Economics before coming to Berkeley. What is Gecko?

Gecko is a magnetic wireless-style charger adapter for iPhone, Android and other Micro-USB powered devices.

Gecko is a simple three-piece kit:

  • Gecko Connector, a tiny plug for your Lightning or Micro-USB port
• Gecko Adapter, a magnetic adapter for your existing sync/charge cable
• Gecko Dongle, a small dongle that transforms all your power-banks or USB port in a convenient wireless-style charging station.
Both Connectors and Dongles auto align themselves and start charging instantly

Gecko is small and thin enough to be applied to any smartphone with a Micro-USB port or a Lightning port. its adhesive surface will lock the connector directly to the mobile or on the bumper in a breeze.  Thanks to our specialized micro-connector, Gecko is so
small it will fit into any custom phone case so you don’t have to ditch

Q: Where do I choose if I want a Lightning or Micro USB?
A: We'll send you a survey at the end of the campaign.

Q: It didn't ask me for my address. How can I let you know my address?
A: That will be in the end of campaign questionnaire.

Q: If I have a phone case, the connector is thin enough to sit between the phone and the case, right?
A: No, the connector will clip into your phone and remain outside of the phone case so that it can connect quickly and easily to the adapter or the dongle.

Q: Can you add a USB type C version since it’s becoming the new standard?
A: We're thinking of setting up a stretch goal for that!

Q: If I pre-order a double pack or a family pack, can I choose a mix of lightning and micro-usb Gecko connectors?
A: Yes! You can choose what you want from the survey we'll send out at the end of the campaign!

              MEET THE FINO TAB

The FINO, Introducing World's first Shatterproof And Lightest Tablet at an unbelievable price of $99 only.



The Fino's story begins with understanding the difference between high price gadgets and low price gadgets. The Fino team made research and work with a single aim to provide high potential gadgets to each hand at affordable prices.

WHY FINO?

Fino is an innovative product combining the power of technology, durability, accessibility and affordability.


The Fino introducing World's first tablet to feature a shatter-shield display.  Having a shattered screen on a tablet a surprisingly occurrence, and people generally don't replace those broken displays because of their repairing costs.   Hence, some are using their devices even if they've cut their fingers on the screen. That's certainly sad :( .

column7:
>World's Lightest tablet, with a weight of only 263 gms.

Excited! to know the reason behind its weight.

We are using very small register and microchips with our own production, this is the main reason behind this. That’s why its way to cheaper than branded tablets. As we have the lowest price, we haven’t compromised on the quality. Aluminum internal cashing and very compact Circuit Board (CB) makes this tablet unique. We made some changes in Snapdragon chipset to make it half of size with same clocking speed, in this we are perfect.

As of this moment, Fino is looking like the best Android tablet you'll want to buy. Waiting for what? Book your tablet now.




Camera:

To provide best pictures to their users, Fino comes with 8 Mega Pixel Rear Camera with Autofocus feature. Users can take amazing pictures even in low light conditions.  Fino's camera boasts 6 physical lenses and provides more precise and detailed photos without suffering from distortion often caused by lower apertures.

Don't compromise with Quality, just because of Budget Constraints. Book Your Fino Now. Don't miss this amazing opportunity.
column10:
>Great Features with Amazing style makes Fino special. Order Now.

Fino solves a real money problem that most of us face today due to inflation and  offers numbers of latest technology features.

column1: With the urge to provide a high value branded gadget at an affordable price led to the establishment of Fino, in the late 2013. Loaded with an array of very experienced professionals in the technology sphere, Fino is enthusiastic about developing a high-class tablet technology for all and sundry no matter the network subscribed to or the user’s location.

The Fino, is a company which is developing mobile devices and independent OS. The Story begins from understanding the Difference between High value branded gadgets and low price gadgets. That’s where Fino is born.

Fino have gone through many prototypes and keep going towards the better direction. Now when we are done, our Aim is to provide high potential gadgets to each hand with the taste of new technology.

FAQs:

With all your support Fino is about to start mass production. That is the reason we are here on Indiegogo. We want to cut the middle man and with Fino we can compete the tablets which are overpriced and can bring technology in every hand with this unbeatable price. It’s a seed to upcoming future of Fino.

You can book your Fino during the 30days of Indiegogo campaign at very lower price. When campaign is over, production will start. After that, the first batch of Fino will be in your hand as soon as possible.

No, Fino will not work with Verizon or Sprint.

The reason behind the Fino is to provide cheap and innovative technology around the world.

I contributed using two Indiegogo accounts/email addresses - what should I do?
If you have made several contributions using different accounts, please make sure to tell us about this by submitting a support request here.In the request, please indicate all the email addresses you used.

9. I am not happy with the Tablet, can I return it?
You may return the tablet delivered to you within 14 days of receiving it. Please note that return shipping, including any customs or other charges - as applicable - will be borne by the sender. Keep in mind that we only accept returns from ship-to countries supported by the FINO tablet campaign.

To request a return please submit a ticket here. Please indicate clearly in the subject and body of the request “RETURN”, provide your 1) contribution email address(es), 2) specifics on which perk(s) you contributed towards, and 3) the payment method utilized. Once we receive your request, we will then provide you with further instructions.
Fino will accept the returns in following condition:-
If delivery is delayed for a significant period.

column1: Every year, more than 100 children are killed by electrocution caused by unprotected outlets and over 2,400 suffer from severe injury due to electrocution in the home. PINCH Safe Outlet Cover, designed in Canada, has been created to prevent childhood electrocution and burns. In under 30 seconds, your current outlet cover can be replaced with the Safe Outlet Cover, resolving all of the safety and design gaps found in North American electrical outlets.

Once the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover is in place, you must use one hand to pinch the patent pending tabs to open the sliding doors and insert your plug. Children don’t have the strength or dexterity to perform this maneuver, and therefore are unable to access the outlet. PINCH Safe Outlet Cover delivers peace of mind that your electrical outlets are 100% childproof.

We haven’t sacrificed design for safety, either. The PINCH Safe Outlet Cover has been created with a modern, sophisticated look. You’ll feel at ease knowing your child is safe and the look of your outlets isn’t being compromised.

column2: >

column1: PINCH's first prototype was recently featured at the Canadian National Exhibition (CNE) Innovation Garage August 19-21, 2016. There, Founder Sameem spoke to families, parents, caregivers and more about this amazing product, gaining invaluable insights and confirming that this is a product parents have been waiting for.

When my three-year-old son came to me holding the flimsy plastic plug cover we thought would prevent him from accessing an electrical outlet, I felt a surge of emotions and the fear of what could happen kept me awake all night. If these easily removable outlet covers are the best we can do to protect our precious children from the potential of an electrical shock or burn, then we have failed. Fast forward about 15 months: our PINCH Safe Outlet Cover prototype was created... and it worked!

It’s one thing to design a beautiful product. It’s another to create something where beauty is just one of its great features. That’s why we created PINCH Safe Outlet Cover with the following in mind:

column2: >

column1: As with any new product, we've encountered some challenges during our early stages. These include tooling requirements for manufacturing and a functional adjustment from the first prototype.
The manufacturing costs for PINCH were originally extremely high due to the requirement of creating both Duplex and Decora covers
column2: essentially, two types of products are more expensive to make than one. This is because different tools are needed to create the different versions. Since we want to offer the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover to families for the most affordable price possible, we came up with a solution with our manufacturer where one tooling system can be used to create both types of covers.

column1: During our early product testing, one customer pointed out that when one of the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover's tabs is pushed in, that side of the socket is unlocked, allowing a child to access the single opening. This is a valid concern for any parent or guardian, so we went back to the drawing board with our designers at MAKO Invent and created a new mechanism that does not allow any of the slides to open unless both tabs are pinched simultaneously.

After incredible early commitment from the community, we know that the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover is something families need and want in their homes. It's now up to our supporters to help us make that happen.
$11,400 of the money we raise through this campaign will go directly to our manufacturer, covering tooling costs, and the remaining $6,600 will ensure we meet our minimum order requirements.
By supporting our campaign, you're letting us know that the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover will become an important feature of your home
column2: and we want to make sure it gets there!

column1: With your commitment of $8 or more, you'll get the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover shipped right to your front door! All multi-packs are priced at an increasing discount and allow for a mix-and-match option*
column3: one at top and bottom) and Duplex (one screw in middle) covers you need. How exciting will it be to be one of the first households to child-proof with the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover? Very!

column1: Any commitment under $8 will not go unnoticed! We will personally thank each one of you who is able to contribute $2 to our campaign, and will feature any $5 contributors on our website and social media channels.
*Know how many of each style you need? Awesome! Let us know in the comments section at campaign checkout. Not sure? No problem! We will follow up with you via survey after the campaign closes.​
If you're unable to contribute today, but still like the idea of the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover, we'd like to thank you anyway! Show us some love on our social media by liking, sharing and commenting.

column2: >

column1:
What makes the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover so different from other outlet covers with sliding doors?
Other outlet covers with sliding doors require the user to manually slide the door across the outlet. These are easily manipulated by children. The PINCH Safe Outlet Cover's pinching mechanism is impossible for a small child to manoeuvre because they lack the dexterity and strength required to pinch with one hand and plug in with the other.

Is it dangerous to swap my current outlet with the PINCH Outlet Cover?
Absolutely not! Because PINCH is only a cover, there’s no need to replace the actual outlet. No wires need to be accessed, meaning the installation process is both simple and completely safe!

Will the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover look bulky on my wall?
No way! The PINCH Safe Outlet Cover is approximately the same size as standard outlet covers. Its exact dimensions are 3.13cm wide by 4.87cm tall by 0.33cm thick. It has been designed with aesthetics in mind with a modern, sleek appearance.

Are children able to access the socket when they push in one tab?
No
column2: both sliding doors remain locked until both tabs are pinched in at the same time.

column1:
What if my PINCH Safe Outlet Cover breaks?
We're so confident your PINCH Safe Outlet Cover won't break that we're offering it with a 5-year warranty.

I don't have kids. Is it weird to get the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover anyway?
We designed the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover with you in mind! Its sleek, elegant look appeals to any type of customer, even if it's just to modernize your home décor.

How long until my package is sent in the mail?
All PINCH Safe Outlet Cover packages should be shipped by approximately December 2016.

How do I choose how many Duplex and Decora covers I want?
You can let us know in the comments box at campaign checkout. If you aren’t sure how many of each you need, we'll send you a quick survey where you can fill out the number of each style of the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover you require after the campaign closes.

Will you ever make PINCH Outlet Cover in different colours?
Yes, that’s in our long-term plan! We hope to create the outlet covers in different colours and finishes, as well as a pure white version without the colour-coded tabs.

What happens if you don't reach your $18,000 goal?
If we don't meet our full target, the only way to get the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover into the homes of as many families as possible will be to fund the initial manufacturing run ourselves. This will be a challenging task, which is why we need your early support!

Once the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover is in place, you must use one hand to pinch the patent pending tabs to open the sliding doors and insert your plug. Children don’t have the strength or dexterity to perform this maneuver, and therefore are unable to access the outlet. PINCH Safe Outlet Cover delivers peace of mind that your electrical outlets are 100% childproof.We haven’t sacrificed design for safety, either. The PINCH Safe Outlet Cover has been created with a modern, sophisticated look. You’ll feel at ease knowing your child is safe and the look of your outlets isn’t being compromised.

PINCH's first prototype was recently featured at the Canadian National Exhibition (CNE) Innovation Garage August 19-21, 2016. There, Founder Sameem spoke to families, parents, caregivers and more about this amazing product, gaining invaluable insights and confirming that this is a product parents have been waiting for.

When my three-year-old son came to me holding the flimsy plastic plug cover we thought would prevent him from accessing an electrical outlet, I felt a surge of emotions and the fear of what could happen kept me awake all night. If these easily removable outlet covers are the best we can do to protect our precious children from the potential of an electrical shock or burn, then we have failed. Fast forward about 15 months: our PINCH Safe Outlet Cover prototype was created... and it worked!

It’s one thing to design a beautiful product. It’s another to create something where beauty is just one of its great features. That’s why we created PINCH Safe Outlet Cover with the following in mind:
As with any new product, we've encountered some challenges during our early stages. These include tooling requirements for manufacturing and a functional adjustment from the first prototype.
The manufacturing costs for PINCH were originally extremely high due to the requirement of creating both Duplex and Decora covers
column2: essentially, two types of products are more expensive to make than one. This is because different tools are needed to create the different versions. Since we want to offer the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover to families for the most affordable price possible, we came up with a solution with our manufacturer where one tooling system can be used to create both types of covers.

column1: During our early product testing, one customer pointed out that when one of the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover's tabs is pushed in, that side of the socket is unlocked, allowing a child to access the single opening. This is a valid concern for any parent or guardian, so we went back to the drawing board with our designers at MAKO Invent and created a new mechanism that does not allow any of the slides to open unless both tabs are pinched simultaneously.

After incredible early commitment from the community, we know that the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover is something families need and want in their homes. It's now up to our supporters to help us make that happen.
$11,400 of the money we raise through this campaign will go directly to our manufacturer, covering tooling costs, and the remaining $6,600 will ensure we meet our minimum order requirements.
By supporting our campaign, you're letting us know that the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover will become an important feature of your home
column2: and we want to make sure it gets there!

column1: With your commitment of $8 or more, you'll get the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover shipped right to your front door! All multi-packs are priced at an increasing discount and allow for a mix-and-match option*
column3: one at top and bottom) and Duplex (one screw in middle) covers you need. How exciting will it be to be one of the first households to child-proof with the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover? Very!

column1: Any commitment under $8 will not go unnoticed! We will personally thank each one of you who is able to contribute $2 to our campaign, and will feature any $5 contributors on our website and social media channels.
*Know how many of each style you need? Awesome! Let us know in the comments section at campaign checkout. Not sure? No problem! We will follow up with you via survey after the campaign closes.​
If you're unable to contribute today, but still like the idea of the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover, we'd like to thank you anyway! Show us some love on our social media by liking, sharing and commenting.

What makes the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover so different from other outlet covers with sliding doors?Other outlet covers with sliding doors require the user to manually slide the door across the outlet. These are easily manipulated by children. The PINCH Safe Outlet Cover's pinching mechanism is impossible for a small child to manoeuvre because they lack the dexterity and strength required to pinch with one hand and plug in with the other.

Is it dangerous to swap my current outlet with the PINCH Outlet Cover?Absolutely not! Because PINCH is only a cover, there’s no need to replace the actual outlet. No wires need to be accessed, meaning the installation process is both simple and completely safe!

Will the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover look bulky on my wall?No way! The PINCH Safe Outlet Cover is approximately the same size as standard outlet covers. Its exact dimensions are 3.13cm wide by 4.87cm tall by 0.33cm thick. It has been designed with aesthetics in mind with a modern, sleek appearance.
Are children able to access the socket when they push in one tab?No
column2: both sliding doors remain locked until both tabs are pinched in at the same time.

column1: What if my PINCH Safe Outlet Cover breaks?We're so confident your PINCH Safe Outlet Cover won't break that we're offering it with a 5-year warranty.

I don't have kids. Is it weird to get the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover anyway?We designed the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover with you in mind! Its sleek, elegant look appeals to any type of customer, even if it's just to modernize your home décor.
How long until my package is sent in the mail?All PINCH Safe Outlet Cover packages should be shipped by approximately December 2016.

How do I choose how many Duplex and Decora covers I want?You can let us know in the comments box at campaign checkout. If you aren’t sure how many of each you need, we'll send you a quick survey where you can fill out the number of each style of the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover you require after the campaign closes.

Will you ever make PINCH Outlet Cover in different colours?Yes, that’s in our long-term plan! We hope to create the outlet covers in different colours and finishes, as well as a pure white version without the colour-coded tabs.

What happens if you don't reach your $18,000 goal?If we don't meet our full target, the only way to get the PINCH Safe Outlet Cover into the homes of as many families as possible will be to fund the initial manufacturing run ourselves. This will be a challenging task, which is why we need your early support!",38.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

Our crowdfunding ended in 2014, but you can buy Pockethernet now in our webshop. Thanks to our backers Pockethernet is available and on the market right now. (€199,- inc. VAT)

For the latest information around this project, please head over to our website, social media or sign up to our
column2:
id=5bf8eadd86"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">newsletter to find out everything about it. (the indiegogo page will not be updated regularly anymore)

- Head over to our webshop here if your interested in buying Pockethernet.
- Need help, or the latest firmware? Head over to our support forum.
column3: >Have a look at our website:
column4:
>pockethernet.com

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
column5:
/>

 

So what’s happening next?
We have already started working on the first production run. Suppliers and contract manufacturers are being evaluated so that we can spin a final round of hardware and get those through legal certification and our strict manufacturing tests. A high-quality rapid injection mould will be produced for the enclosure of Pockethernet. The final version of the Android and the new iOS app will also be taken care of.

When can I buy another Pockethernet?
We first want to completely focus on producing the first batch and deliver those in June. After that we’ll start selling the device in our webshop. In case you want to be the first to know when the device is on sale again, you can sign up to the newsletter on our website. www.pockethernet.com

In case you have any more feedback, tips or questions just drop us a message at info@pockethernet.com.

column1:
""The Swiss army knife for Network administrators""

 

Update of 2014/04/11: Newletter archive

Now shipping to Canada, Australia and New Zealand.
Canada backers, please add $10 for shipping.
AU/NZ backers, please add $20 for shipping.

 

 

*iOS support will be through Bluetooth v4 (BLE/Smart)
Compatible devices: iPhone 4s, 5, 5s, 5c
column2:
iPad 3, 4, Mini, Air

All current features that are listed below will be supported on iOS.
Future upgrades which involve higher data rates may not be supported.
column3:
>Pockethernet is the first smartphone connected Ethernet cable and network tester that is affordable and fits into your pocket.


If you are familiar with setting up computer networks you will know that Ethernet cables are still crucial in providing homes, offices and data centers with internet. Pockethernet will make it dead easy to install, troubleshoot and maintain Ethernet networks. We have created a fully featured Ethernet cable and network tester at 1/10 the price of it's competition.

Are you

column1: • Installing and troubleshooting Ethernet cables and devices?
• Setting up routers, switches, computers, IP phones and cameras?
• Working as a network administrator or installation technician?
• Building Ethernet networks at home and at friends?

Then you'll be interested in what Pockethernet can do!

 

 

 

 

 

Measure the length of cables to see where they are going.
Or how much is left on the reel.

 

Find faults like split pairs and short circuits.
Pockethernet tells you exactly where they are located.

 

 

Locate cables in the wall or in batches with the toning feature.
If the cable is connected, use the port LED blinking function.

 

 

Check Ethernet and Internet connectivity.
From duplex mismatches to routing errors, find out what's wrong.

 

 

When you're done, send a pdf report to your client or for your own record.
Have an up to date database and prove your work.

 

 

The Pockethernet hardware works together with the device you are probably having in your pocket right now: your smartphone.
Bluetooth enables Pockethernet to communicate with your smartphone. The app is tailored to both the needs of professionals and semi-professionals. You’ll be able to run tests in simple and advanced modes and easily read out the results from your phone.

 

 

             Simple                                  Advanced
column6:
/>

 

The app is currently only available for Android.
iOS will be supported if we reach the stretch goal.

 

Measurement functions:

column1:
Wiremap including shield
Test if you punched the pins in the correct order on the RJ45 jacks. Pockethernet also tests the shield for continuity.

TDR-based, single ended length measurement and fault locating
Advanced cable diagnosis with just one end connected to Pockethernet. See how long the cable is and if there are any short circuits, split pairs or bad terminations. Pockethernet also detects if the cable is connected to a switched off computer or switch.

Voltage detection
Find out if there's a phone line or passive PoE on one of the pairs, to detect services and to protect your network equipment.
PoE supply detectionMeasure the presence and voltage of Power over Ethernet, to ensure proper power supply of your PoE devices.

Legacy PoE device detection
Find out if there is a non-standard PoE device (e.g. old IP phones) at the other end of the cable that need an upgrade.

Cable toner with customizable tones
Locate where cables are running in the wall and identify single cables in batches or at patch panels. You can choose from a wide variety of tones that go beyond the usual ringing.

Bit error rate test (10/100/1000)
Real-world cable quality measurement at gigabit speeds. Stop finger-pointing with measurement data.

Port blinker
Let Pockethernet toggle the Link LED on switches and routers, so you know which cable you are looking for.

Link speed and duplex identification (10/100/1000)
Find out the Ethernet capabilities of that unused port you're wondering about and rule out duplex conflicts.

Link establishment test (10/100/1000)
Check if a link can be established at different speeds. Make sure the wiring is up to date for gigabit.

DHCP, DNS, Ping, Traceroute tests (10/100)
Test the network connection to see if you can get an IP address on a port and reach internal servers or the Internet.

Netscan, traffic detection (10/100)
See what other devices are reachable on that port, what kind and how much traffic is directed there.

PDF report generation
Have a detailed log about your work: Just add location and port ID and you'll always have an up-to-date database and a proof of your work.

Send report via email
With the press of a button, email the report for your own records, to an issue tracking system or to your clients. No more lost reports, tedious downloads from the device or manual editing.

Preliminary general specs:

90x65x25 mm | 200 g | Micro-USB charge | 8 hours operating time on battery
Voltage measurement up to 110V | Input protection | TDR range up to 400m

 

 

 

Pockethernet bridges the gap between the cheap wiring testers and the too expensive high-end tools. It includes all features that make out a professional Ethernet tool, but is affordable for everyone.

The retail version will cost $199, so grab yours now with a 50/75/100 dollar discount!

 

And there's even more: Pockethernet can be upgraded in the future with new testing features and support for additional protocols, by just downloading a new app.
•  SNMP and web based configuration tools
•  A cloud service that keeps your network layout, floor maps, and measurement results easily accessible

For all those interested in the device, check out the huge discounts!

Those who would like to support us without buying the device, should check out this nice tote bag:

Where are we now?

In the last 12 months, we have been developing the hardware, the embedded firmware and the smartphone application to test the product.
There is already a production-quality prototype device, with all the functions tested and verified. The hardware was manufactured on an SMT line and the enclosure is the 3D-printed version of the final mould model. All is looking great so far!

What do we need the funds for?

Bringing a hardware product to the market involves a huge initial investment. We have been financing the development ourselves until now, but we need support for:
• Making the injection mould tooling for the enclosure
• Getting the hardware certified for EMC and safety standards
• Finishing the embedded and phone application software development
• Setting up manufacturing and ordering the first large batch of hardware components

Ordering and testing plastic injection mould
HW pre-compliance test
Embedded and smartphone SW development
Ordering components for production

Plastics manufacturing
HW compliance test
Ordering of final PCBs
Production setup and test run

First and foremost, all help is appreciated. All support, small or big, is welcome. 

If you can, help spread the word!
Make your IT guys happy by telling them about the campaign. Show that you don't only think of them when there's trouble! :)

Give us feedback!
We are happy about any kind of feedback you may have. There's still time to get your ideas into the product.

Use the comments form on here or drop us an email at: indiegogo@pockethernet.com
Pockethernet is compatible with all Android devices having Bluetooth.
Which version of Android do I need?
The app should be compatible with all versions
Yes, if we reach a certain funding goal that makes it possible to upgrade Pockethernet to Bluetooth v4 and to develop an iOS application.
Can I use pockethernet without a phone/tablet?

Pockethernet has a basic user interface made up by RGB LEDs. They show basic information about the cable (pass/fail/failure type) and the network (link/DHCP status). So you can have a quick look even without using your phone.

Pockethernet comes with a built-in wiremap port, so you can connect both ends of the cable to the tester for wiremap measurement.
We plan to offer our own wiremap adapters with IDs after the campaign, and will also try to make Pockethernet compatible with existing wiremap adapters you may already have.
Why is the shipping restricted to US/EU?

As a hardware product, Pockethernet needs to comply with regulatory requirements. We need to assess these country-by-country which takes time and money. If you are interested in buying Pockethernet outside of these countries, sign up for a notification on our website: www.pockethernet.com
Can I order for a company? Will I get an invoice?

Sure, each shipment will include a commercial invoice.
If you are ordering for a company, please start the shipping name with the string 'COMPANY'. If you are ordering for a european company, also look at the question below.
Why do EU customers need to add VAT?

Pockethernet is made by a company registered in the EU and is required by law to charge VAT on its sales.
However, if you are ordering on behalf of a european company with a valid VAT ID, you don't need to add VAT to your perk.
I forgot to add shipping costs or VAT. What do I do?

Simply back us with the required additional amount. Make sure to use the same name and address. After the campaign ends, we'll check through the addresses and perks and get back to anyone who needs to match up the perk.
How do I supply my VAT ID and company name?
Don't worry, after the campaign ends, we'll send a survey to fill in the missing bits.
Can I buy pockethernet after the Indiegogo campaign?

Yes, we plan to continue manufacturing and selling Pockethernet.
Sign up for post-campaign notifications on our website: www.pockethernet.com
Do I have to pay for the app?

The application will be provided for free with all the current features listed on the campaign page.
Additional features may need a paid app or an in app purchase.
I have some questions / feedback for you!
Great! Feel free to drop us an email at Indiegogo@pockethernet.com
Pockethernet comes with a standard limited 1 year warranty

Hardware projects need careful planning for getting the supply chain and manufacturing process right. In fact, that's almost as much work as developing the actual features of a device.

To avoid surprises, Pockethernet has been designed with mass production in mind from the very beginning. Parts have been selected with looking at stock estimates and we also keep in touch with our component distributors.
However, even the shortage of a single component can adversely affect our delivery dates.

To make sure that the product doesn't fail on regulatory issues, we use pre-certified components and industry best practices for EMC.

A successful mass production run has been planned from early on. All the parts are designed for line manufacturing, and we work together with manufacturers we already know. Even the prototypes have been manufactured on an automated SMT line.
However, there are also significant risks in finishing the development and preparing for production. For example, failing on a regulatory test or the purchasing delay of a single component can add weeks to the delivery date. With pre-ordering, you agree that these risks can delay the shipment date of your perk or cause a limitation of features.

To ensure the quality of shipped Pockethernet devices, each of them undergo extensive physical and electrical tests and get their own calibration.

For quality, timing and environmental reasons, Pockethernet is manufactured in Europe.
Can I ask for a Pockethernet in other ways during the campaign?

Sure! You can state your interest in any available perk with the same conditions by just emailing us. You also have the option of paying at delivery, via bank transfer later on, or net after receiving the invoice in eligible cases.

Legal notice: This is not a sales contract. By selecting a perk, you merely show your interest in ordering a device. The sales contract will only be established once the device is delivered or we make a separate agreement. You allow the fulfillment by and transfer of the agreement to a party designated by the project owner. Contact us, if you wish a refund.

column4: >WISE TIVI – an innovative device that instantly turns your regular TV into a super powerful Smart TV and Games Console.

column3: >Smart, Compact and Powerful – it′s simply WISE!

column4: >Welcome to the WISE TIVI – an innovative device that instantly turns your TV into a truly smart television with gaming capabilities, full Internet browsers and access to the entire Google Play Store.
>The WISE TIVI isn′t just smart, it′s also sleek! We wanted to create a device that you can carry around and that looks as good as it performs.
>It′s a very compact device, a little larger than a USB stick, which plugs directly into your TV so it′ll be out of the way when it′s in use.
>Use your WISE TIVI at home on your TV or even a projector, take it to the office for business meetings or enjoy all your favorite video content in your hotel when you are on holiday!

column2: >WISE TIVI will change the entertainment on TV. Forever.

column1: • Stream Film and TV shows immediately from services such as Netflix, HULU and LoveFilm, with their extensive range of content
• Access Video and Music content via apps such as YouTube and Vimeo
• Watch thousands of International TV stations using various apps
• Browse personal photographs and videos instantly from your home network, laptop, PC and even your smartphone or tablet, with our onboard DLNA support

• Surf the web with your chosen browser as Chrome, Opera or Mozilla and access social media, Google documents, flash content and even online shopping can be engaged in their favorite pastime just from the screen. – The list is endless!

column4: >A full HD-quality is guaranteed any time, supporting high resolution and video streaming with the latest Adobe Flash Player and HTML5 protocol.
>WISE TIVI is the perfect Android console for both beginners and advanced gamers.
>We′re obsessed with gaming, so we′ve worked extensively to ensure you get the maximum enjoyment playing games on your TV with your friends and family up to 4 players at one time.
>We′ve also introduced Bluetooth 4.0 into the device, allowing you to use Android game pad, Dual Shock PS3 controllers and even Wii remotes!
>WISE TIVI is an excellent way to stay online.
>From the comfort of your own sofa you can access social media sites such as Facebook, Twitter and any other. WISE TIVI is also perfect for full email control with the WISE remote and its keyboard.

>By connecting a webcam, you can enjoy a revolutionary new way to video call using Skype or Google Hangout. We′ve made it simple to chat with family and friends from your living room and the whole family can join in as it′s on your TV!
>As they get older, they want more powerful consoles. WISE TIVI is a unique and affordable alternative to a PC or laptop and supports everything from simple games to the latest 3D games.
>We′ve also embedded a useful functionality for parents to control the content on the device, restricting access to child-friendly content only.
>We′ve designed WISE TIVI to bring user-friendly functionality for business turning your home or remote office into a high-tech environment for collaboration and meetings.

>With WISE TIVI, you have full access to your desktop applications, mobile content or cloud storage resources. You are granted the capability to watch, edit and demonstrate any content all at the same time.

>From now on handling a meeting is not a problem if you have a TV nearby – you can easily pull up any slide from presentation without searching and/or bringing an LCD projector with you, just plug your WISE TIVI straight into the TV′s HDMI socket!

>To complete the overall experience, we′ve created the WISE Remote: an universal remote control with full QWERTY keyboard and Air Mouse combination, allowing you to touch, tap, scroll and drag. The universal feature also makes it easy to control all your home entertainment devices with just one remote.
>We admire the great Android TV future. We′d like to be a big part of it. Thus, we′re taking the first step to support the growth of Developers on the Android TV scene with our open platform.

column1: Make your TV WISE and your life Smarter!
","WISE TIVI – an innovative device that instantly turns your regular TV into a super powerful Smart TV and Games Console.
Smart, Compact and Powerful – it′s simply WISE!
Welcome to the WISE TIVI – an innovative device that instantly turns your TV into a truly smart television with gaming capabilities, full Internet browsers and access to the entire Google Play Store.
The WISE TIVI isn′t just smart, it′s also sleek! We wanted to create a device that you can carry around and that looks as good as it performs.
It′s a very compact device, a little larger than a USB stick, which plugs directly into your TV so it′ll be out of the way when it′s in use.
Use your WISE TIVI at home on your TV or even a projector, take it to the office for business meetings or enjoy all your favorite video content in your hotel when you are on holiday!
WISE TIVI will change the entertainment on TV. Forever.
Just plug in and go to:
Stream Film and TV shows immediately from services such as Netflix, HULU and LoveFilm, with their extensive range of content
Access Video and Music content via apps such as YouTube and Vimeo
Watch thousands of International TV stations using various apps
Browse personal photographs and videos instantly from your home network, laptop, PC and even your smartphone or tablet, with our onboard DLNA support

Surf the web with your chosen browser as Chrome, Opera or Mozilla and access social media, Google documents, flash content and even online shopping can be engaged in their favorite pastime just from the screen. – The list is endless!
A full HD-quality is guaranteed any time, supporting high resolution and video streaming with the latest Adobe Flash Player and HTML5 protocol.
WISE TIVI is the perfect Android console for both beginners and advanced gamers.
We′re obsessed with gaming, so we′ve worked extensively to ensure you get the maximum enjoyment playing games on your TV with your friends and family up to 4 players at one time.
We′ve also introduced Bluetooth 4.0 into the device, allowing you to use Android game pad, Dual Shock PS3 controllers and even Wii remotes!
WISE TIVI is an excellent way to stay online.
From the comfort of your own sofa you can access social media sites such as Facebook, Twitter and any other. WISE TIVI is also perfect for full email control with the WISE remote and its keyboard.

By connecting a webcam, you can enjoy a revolutionary new way to video call using Skype or Google Hangout. We′ve made it simple to chat with family and friends from your living room and the whole family can join in as it′s on your TV!
As they get older, they want more powerful consoles. WISE TIVI is a unique and affordable alternative to a PC or laptop and supports everything from simple games to the latest 3D games.
We′ve also embedded a useful functionality for parents to control the content on the device, restricting access to child-friendly content only.
We′ve designed WISE TIVI to bring user-friendly functionality for business turning your home or remote office into a high-tech environment for collaboration and meetings.

With WISE TIVI, you have full access to your desktop applications, mobile content or cloud storage resources. You are granted the capability to watch, edit and demonstrate any content all at the same time.

From now on handling a meeting is not a problem if you have a TV nearby – you can easily pull up any slide from presentation without searching and/or bringing an LCD projector with you, just plug your WISE TIVI straight into the TV′s HDMI socket!

To complete the overall experience, we′ve created the WISE Remote: an universal remote control with full QWERTY keyboard and Air Mouse combination, allowing you to touch, tap, scroll and drag. The universal feature also makes it easy to control all your home entertainment devices with just one remote.
We admire the great Android TV future. We′d like to be a big part of it. Thus, we′re taking the first step to support the growth of Developers on the Android TV scene with our open platform.
Our competition: “Game On” gives app and game developers the chance to win one of three amazing developer bundles!

Exclusive to Indiegogo, we′re also offering you the chance to purchase a pre-rooted device (see our pledges), so you can begin developing your own content on a super-powerful Android TV device and offer it to our users!

Building a new kind of super small and super smart device is a complex and time-consuming task. We′re close to our goal of shipping out the first batch of WISE TIVI units, but we really need your help!

We′re a driven and experienced technology team and we understand the possibility of bottlenecks in commercialization and mass production processes like adherence to specifications, deadline and quality issues as well as many others. We′re ready for these challenges if they occur and we′re ready to do everything to minimize  these risks and overcome any problems.
With help from the Indiegogo community we can bring it to the world much faster!
With our manufacturer on standby to begin production, it′s now a case of getting our initial orders through the door and generating our first customers!
Television is international, so we′re eager to see your help from any corner of our World. Let`s make the world smarter and add some pleasure into our life!
As a massive THANK YOU, we′ll also place your name on our website, for life. Choose your colour: White or Black.
$25 Wi-Fi detector T-shirt that shows the Wi-Fi signal in your vicinity
You′ll also get your name on our site for life as a massive THANK YOU!
$99 WISE TIVI Limited Edition Indiegogo Version
Show your support and receive a Limited Edition Indiegogo Portable device!
$119 Get the full WISE TIVI experience: 1 x WISE TIVI Portable and 1 x WISE Air Mouse/Keyboard (Blue or Brown)
1 x WISE TIVI Indiegogo Limited Edition and 1 x WISE Air Mouse/Keyboard

DEVELOPERS SPECIAL: Get your app/game pre-installed on the first 1500 WISE TIVI devices! (Including all test units sent to reviewers and journalists). You′ll also receive a Rooted version of the WISE TIVI Portable + Air Mouse/Keyboard

EXTRA DEVELOPERS SPECIAL: Get your app/game pre-installed on the first 5000 WISE TIVI devices! (Including all test units sent to reviewers and journalists). You′ll also receive a Rooted version of the WISE TIVI Portable + Air Mouse/Keyboard
Make your TV WISE and your life Smarter!",19.0,1,"1 Campaign

","The most powerful (now 2,500 mAh) wallet fitting (6.5 mm) battery charger for BOTH Android AND iPhones.
In a Sept. 16th CNET review of iphone 6, 6 Plus, ”if I want better battery life this year, I guess I'll just carry an extra battery pack.”
Must-have for extended use and enjoyment of all smartphones and tablets.
No more messy wires and heavy external battery pack to slow me down between classes
column2: or looking for AC outlets to plug in ""

column1: Powerful: the rechargeable Dense Lithium battery has 2 to 4 X the power of other ""Slim"", ""Skinny"", ""Hyper"" chargers, and can charge phones at 1 A, up to 1% per minute, to nearly 100% (depending on the battery capacity).  While we could have made it 2 A, tests showed that it made the phone too hot to be worth the small difference in speed.
Smart: automatically starts charging when plugged in-no switches to break

The Best Solution: iPhones, and most smartphones do not have removable batteries.  Cases with batteries add weight and bulk, and change the design aesthetics.  External battery packs have long cables and are bulky.  Other card chargers have as little as 25% power.
Other card chargers have fancy names and colorful cases.  We are sure that you only care that has the most power and is the most durable and affordable.
Also $32 Perk for 2 Pack-with $4 going to NBCF.
Click to see our fundraiser for Breast Cancer Awareness.

The Tech Mills' PC Build Guide 2014

This project is intended to fund the filming of the most comprehensive DIY PC build guide on the internet. There are many build guides on the internet, but many of them are incomplete, or assume the viewer is already tech savvy. We want to create a build guide that a complete novice can watch and follow along to and build an enthusiast grade PC with no experience.
column2: >We want to cover what other build guides miss or assume you already know including:
column3: >-What each component does and what to look for when shopping for them.
column4: >-Cable management and airflow within your case to ensure your components run safely and efficiently.
column5: >-Installing your operating system, software and drivers so you can start using your new PC right away.
column6: >-And preventative maintenance to make sure novice builders have the tools they need to keep their new PC running for years to come.
column7:
>What we need the money for and what you'll get if you contribute

The money we're attempting to raise for this project will be used to buy the components for the computer we will be building for this build guide as well as some additional studio lighting to ensure the guide is of professional quality.

We have several rewards planned for those who contribute including: Tech Mill T-shirts, gift cards from top tech retailers and of course entries into the raffle to win the PC we will be building.

Where the money goes if we don't reach our goal

If we fail to reach our goal we will make sure that anyone who backs this project gets what they were promised. We will still be sending your t-shirts and gift cards. The remainder of the money will go towards our next funding effort. If this campaign fails to reach it's goal we will start another one and another one and another one until we make this project happen.
