A Heart behind this project.

""It hurts to watch kids begging their parents to buy them a Tablet so that they could just like their friends have a hobby which has the power to open them to a new world, and seeing this parent having to say no because over the overpriced sticker"" said Edwin S (CRD CEO)

The Nester 4G was created in order to bring a relief in the Tablet market. It was created so that everyone could afford a Tablet and save on money which can be saved to pay other bills or even save for the future like college. We're living in an economy where every penny matters but at the same time where companies are looking to remove the few pennies left in your wallet over items that could have been priced much lower.

Cheap price doesn't mean cheap quality with us.

The Nester 4G is the world most powerful innovative and Affordable (under $150) 10 Inch entry level Android Tablet and we actually remastered the system to make it worthy of its users. You get more power with the Nester than on any other Tablet competitor of it's class but also you get a unique Android System tailored to your need and wishes.
It take boldness to do great things.
We wanted to bring something that has never been seen or
done before in the Marketplace. We wanted every user to not only have a power
house in their hands (2 GB Ram + 2 GHZ+ 64 GB Internal) but a powerful and mind
We wanted to bring something that is going to shake everyone’s
imagination and bring a new conception in the meaning of REVOLUTIONARY.
</u>People are tired of using the same system UI on every Android devices but also of the lags bugs and other issues of the system inefficient task management.
This is why we not only made a unique system design but
added Self-Healing - Crash prevention and many other features.
You know this frustration of buying a new Device and boom
after 5mn of use it freezes for the first time and it’s not close to stop in
fact It will never stops. Because other companies simply take Android as
released by Google and apply some few theme and system tweaking then put them
on the market not carrying how much struggles their poor system optimization is
going to bring to their customers.
We didn’t wanted any of these. We wanted our Tablet to be
usable by anyone from our grandparents to modern geeks. Most Tablets out there
feel like they were made for experts or people who can drive miles to the tech
repair shop. We declared a war against UI complexity and brought to you Marvelousness
The First Tablet to come with 72 GB of storage (8 +64)
standard. More storage than you know what to do with. It’s not yet over, there’s
a 2 GHZ QuadCore CPU inside with 2 GB of Ram as sidekick. Yes power to tackle
the most demanding games or Tasks. A High Definition Display water and dust
resistance. Wait what could you ask more. In fact we’re giving more than the
usual customer demand. Our logic is giving your More for Less.
Yes we did. Take out any Sim card and pull it in because the
Nester 4G comes with GSM capabilities which not only allows you to use mobile
data and get more accurate GPS location but also allows you to place phone
calls send sms use Whatsapp and so on. Yes we’re the deal breaker. We’re
Revolutionary and we’re not scared of going over the limit.
column2: >

column1: They come with premium beautiful and colorful accessories.Premium quality color coded accessories included with each tablet. The accessories includes: a screen protector, micro HDMI cable, flat micro USB cable, and a lightweight wall charger.
It is the only existing Tablet capable of playing any video file format as well as any picture and music formats. It can play 4K videos. It has a 1080P HDMI port and support wireless display.
What’s keeping us from releasing the Nester 4G?
The Nester 4G is a completed project. However we still need
a huge amount of funds in order to produce units so that we can make them
available to the world. Also the New System still needs a lot of work to make
sure that it is ready for the public and for this we need to hire developers
and more. The Goal listed above would be just enough to order the minimum
There’s so much more that can be said about the Nester 4G
but it’s time to take it from the stage of a dream to reality. And for this we truly
need your help. Each and every contribution will be greatly appreciated. We
will fulfill all pledge as soon as the campaign close and will make sure to
make a Thank You video in order to personally thank you all.
We’re not one of these companies trying to rip you off your
money with bid advertising and so on. We want to give you what you deserve.
What other companies have been trying to keep away from you.

Please help us make it happen.

SmartAds is an innovative new smartphone app that will allow you to get paid every month for having sleek, good looking, minimalistic ads displaying on your phones lockscreen... effectively allowing you to make money from your own personal billboard. To begin with we expect that to be up to $25 per month that will be paid straight to you - we hope that in the early stages we will also have options to have the wireless provider paid directly so it's subtracted from your bill...or added to your pre-pay balance! Tablets would double this.

Ads will be targeted to you based on your interests and will often offer deals that will be attractive to you (ie a traveler might be excited to see half-price flights being offered to a favorite destination today or this week only). You will be able to interact with the advertisement immediately to take advantage of one you don't want to miss and they will be easily shareable to friends and family so they don't miss out either.
There won't be any noticeable battery drain or data usage, and no personal user details will be shared with advertisers.

We want the app to be as unintrusive as possible, so closing the ad to view your normal lockscreen will be a simple close button positioned where you'd normally be expecting to unlock your screen anyway, therefore taking less than a second away from normal phone operation.
What we need is funds to get the app finished and implement the marketing strategy to major advertising agencies/media buyers for their clients to start using this new advertising medium.
As a founding user you'll get a SmartAds lifetime higher percentage of an advertisers spend paid back to you than all other subsequent users.

A recent Wall Street Journal article stated that ""Families across America have cut back on food, clothes and entertainment to make room for ever-higher phone bills. Now, carriers are betting that they can push that bill even higher""
This is a way for people to reduce that monthly expense without having to change anything more than a single screen tap about how you use your phone.

We'll be implementing a referral program where you'll be able to receive even more every month by bringing your friend onboard. There will be no limit to how many people you bring on and therefore the amount you recieve.
Mobile advertising is a growth industry right now with revenues expected to hit $7billion this year, $19bn by 2016 and we think SmartAds is the best way to deliver those ads.

Impacted minimally. 
Paid a significant percentage of their phone bill each month. 
Access to great deals based on interests and location. 
Great looking ads only approved. 
Competitions to win vacations for viewing random Smartads ads each day. 
Unlimited referral Program to get paid even more every month for introducing friends. 
""Why wouldn't I do that""

Highly targeted advertising. 
Full screen images. 
Full attention. 
Opted in users. 
Great analytics.

This is a way for people to reduce that monthly expense without having to change anything more than a single screen tap about how you use your phone.

We'll be implementing a referral program where you'll be able to receive even more every month by bringing your friend onboard. There will be no limit to how many people you bring on and therefore the amount you recieve.
Mobile advertising is a growth industry right now with revenues expected to hit $7billion this year, $19bn by 2016 and we think SmartAds is the best way to deliver those ads.

Impacted minimally. Paid a significant percentage of their phone bill each month. Access to great deals based on interests and location. Great looking ads only approved. Competitions to win vacations for viewing random Smartads ads each day. Unlimited referral Program to get paid even more every month for introducing friends. ""Why wouldn't I do that""
Highly targeted advertising. Full screen images. Full attention. Opted in users. Great analytics.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Timeline &
column3:
Funding

Its is a long journey from idea to final product and it takes a lot of hard work and a serious investment. Costs for development, prototyping, moulds and the necessary production tools are high. If we do not reach our projected goal of $29K we will not be able to get the LIFEPOWER A² into your hands.
column6:
Challenges

One potential challenge is that the final development stages as well as setting up the production line could take much longer than expected. We've intentionally set a generous timeline for these stages of the process based on where we currently stand. We hope we'll finish sooner, but we want to allow plenty of time in case it's needed.
Through all of this, we'll communicate often and clearly with our backers on where we are in the process. We'll also be here to answer any questions you have about the product and about how things are going.

column1:
Partnerships

Interested in becoming a reseller for LifePower products?
You can contact us directly on info@lifepower.be

column4: >What about compatibility with international power plugs?
>There are two models available. One for the US based outlet:

column1:
[US] 120V AC 60Hz

and one for the rest of the world:

[EU] 220V AC 50Hz.
In combination with the included universal travel adaptor-plug, you will be able to use it with any type of plug, anywhere in the world!

No idea what this means? Don’t worry, we will automatically ship you the standard outlet for your region.

If however you do have specific requirements, you can select the model you desire upon checkout.
Are there any restrictions for carrying the A² on an airplane?

No. You can take the A² with you without any problem as either checked luggage or carry-on baggage.
Below 100 Wh there are no restrictions for built-in li-ion batteries. The LifePower A² features a capacity of 94,7Wh.
We’ve also included the exact referred IATA and FAA regulations in the User Guide to avoid any possible hold up by airline officials.

Each A2 includes a dedicated charger and if you wish to charge with solar power you can hook up the SUN2 solarpack!
A micro USB charge input is also available for compatibility with a wide range of mobile charging devices.
How long does it take to recharge the A2?

A full charge requires 3 hours with the supplied charger, however an 80% state of charge can be achieved in only 2 hours.
This also counts for the SUN2 solarpack, in optimal weather conditions.
Take notice that charging the A2 with a microUSB charger might take up to 20h.

The device is compliant to CE (LVD and EMC) and FCC regulations regarding safety. If you would plug in a device that demands too much current or in case of a short circuit, the overload safety will switch on automatically to protect you and the device.
It is not advised to expose our products to water, dust or direct sunlight. Besides -ofcourse- t

column4: >Yes, the LifePower A2 can charge any type of laptop.

column1:
However, it only supports a power rating up to 120W (this can be found on the backside/label of your adapter)
Some high performance/gaming devices draw more power and can thus only be charged in ‘power saving’ mode or when shut down.

Can I power my product X [Amplifier/Lamp/Charger/TV/...] ?

This will depend on a few factors, such as power consumption.

Most devices that draw less then 120W or 120VA will work correctly. (This can be found on the specifications label)
Please do note that some devices will need a pure sine wave and that the A2's output waveform is a modified sine wave (PWM) designed to emulate a pure sinewave.
We frequently give advise on efficient energy usage and daily applications, so make sure you follow us on our Social Links!

","Our campaign for the LIFEPOWR A3 is now LIVE!a Future Proofed, updated version of the A2 that integrated the new USB-C Power Delivery standard.  There are a lot of different portable battery packs out there, but they are all limited to charging only USB powered devices (such as cell phones and tablets). So we decided to come up with a solution that can power up Anything.  www.lifepower.be We made a US & Global model so you can use it with any plug, all over the world!

There might not even be one, like in a park:Imagine that you are dreaming about your next holiday......interrupted by a low battery.Thanks to your Lifepower A² there is no need to look for an outlet, just take it with you, anywhere you go.
One push on the button will power your thirsty device and it will show you its remaining capacity.
Store EnergyYou can simply recharge the A² in only 3 hours from your AC outlet or from solar power using our SUN2 Solar Pack! Become completely energy independent.
The LifePower A² was designed to be as powerful as possible, both in wattage and capacity, but still compact and lightweight so that it remains easy to carry around with you.
You could see it as a silent, solid-state and portable generator. The perfect blend between generator and powerbank.

column7: />
column19:
>As we grow with our devices, daily tasks have become much easier. We use them for almost everything we do.

However, our devices rely on batteries and more often than not, these batteries are unable to hold a charge long enough to get you through the day.
column23:
>LiteWire is a simple yet ingenious solution to this problem. 

LiteWire not only charges your devices up to 2x faster than standard charging cables, but it also protects it from any accidental data transfer or data theft. What's even better is that is that it easily fits in your pocket and it's tough enough to take on a 5000 lb minivan!

Now you’ll have access to a reliable charging cable whenever you need it!

LiteWire is universal and recognizes no boundaries. It doesn’t matter who you are or where you're from. It doesn't matter whether you use an iPhone, Blackberry, Windows, or Android - as long as you’re a mobile device user, LiteWire is for you.


Because LiteWire features both microUSB and Lightning connectors, it can charge 90% of the devices on the market.

column3:
/>

Whether you are an iOS, Android, Blackberry, or Windows user, LiteWire is your ultimate dual charging cable. It can charge approximately 90% of the devices available in the market.That means you'll never need to carry two separate cables for your devices anymore.

column1: LiteWire is a more convenient alternative to bulky charging cables. With the size of a car key, you can easily attach it to your key-chain and never again worry forgetting your charging cable at home.
Which charging cable would you rather bring with you when you're on the go?
A long bulky cable that can barely fit in your pocket or a compact dual charging cable that can easily attach to your keys? We think the answer is pretty obvious.
LiteWire's protective shell and reinforced flat cable will guarantee you a long-lasting and profitable partnership. No more connectors falling off or cables peeling from collective usage.
To test how extremely durable LiteWire is, we ran it over by a 5,690 lb minivan multiple times and it was still functional. It's as tough as a tank!
When your mobile device is plugged into a computer's USB port, your standard charging cable syncs and charges at the same time, which results in very slow charging rates.

Unlike standard charging cables featuring both data and syncing capabilities, LiteWire's charge-only feature makes sure you don't waste your precious time charging your phone forever. This means that all the power available will be used to boost the charging speed up to 2x faster - for those times you are away from the wall.

column2:
>

Charging speed is measured using the unit of Ampere-hour(Ah). To demonstrate the difference in charging speeds between LiteWire and a standard charging cable, we used a USB meter and tested various devices as well as various power sources.

>

Based on the test results above, 6 out of 8 times LiteWire charged mobile devices at least 2x faster than regular charging cables when plugged into non-wall plug power sources.

column1: NOTE: The fast charge function only applies to non-wall plug power sources. Wall plug chargers do not sync your device, therefore it already charges your phone as fast as possible. In addition, newer iPhones can charge up to 2.1A from a USB port using the regular cable when it's plugged into newer Mac computers.

We know how important it is for you to feel safe when charging your devices when you're out and about. When you're using public charging ports, hackers can easily steal your photos, videos, banking information, contacts, and a lot more.

That's why we blocked the data feature of LiteWire, making it impossible for unknown devices to gain unauthorized access to your phone and tablet, steal your data, or install malware on your mobile device.
You can think of LiteWire as the SyncStop/USB Condom of compact charging cables. It does the exact same thing.
In other words, LiteWire can save you from juice jacking.
11Alive-TV | Juice Jacking: Dangers of charging stations
Huffington Post | How to protect your phone from juice jacking
WKCY | Protect your info from ""Juice Jacking""
LiteWire XL is double the length of your regular charging cable! It's 6ft long and it can accommodate hard to reach power sources such as this:
When we were designing LiteWire, we made sure that every mobile device user in the world could use it.

Thanks to our specialized dual charging connectors, LiteWire is slim enough to fit into most phone cases so you don't have to ditch your phone cover.

The ends of the connectors are much slimmer than the body itself, making it easier to accommodate tighter spaces.

","As we grow with our devices, daily tasks have become much easier. We use them for almost everything we do.However, our devices rely on batteries and more often than not, these batteries are unable to hold a charge long enough to get you through the day.LiteWire is a simple yet ingenious solution to this problem. LiteWire not only charges your devices up to 2x faster than standard charging cables, but it also protects it from any accidental data transfer or data theft. What's even better is that is that it easily fits in your pocket and it's tough enough to take on a 5000 lb minivan!Now you’ll have access to a reliable charging cable whenever you need it!LiteWire is universal and recognizes no boundaries. It doesn’t matter who you are or where you're from. It doesn't matter whether you use an iPhone, Blackberry, Windows, or Android - as long as you’re a mobile device user, LiteWire is for you.Because LiteWire features both microUSB and Lightning connectors, it can charge 90% of the devices on the market.

Whether you are an iOS, Android, Blackberry, or Windows user, LiteWire is your ultimate dual charging cable. It can charge approximately 90% of the devices available in the market.That means you'll never need to carry two separate cables for your devices anymore.

LiteWire is a more convenient alternative to bulky charging cables. With the size of a car key, you can easily attach it to your key-chain and never again worry forgetting your charging cable at home.
Which charging cable would you rather bring with you when you're on the go?
A long bulky cable that can barely fit in your pocket or a compact dual charging cable that can easily attach to your keys? We think the answer is pretty obvious.
LiteWire's protective shell and reinforced flat cable will guarantee you a long-lasting and profitable partnership. No more connectors falling off or cables peeling from collective usage.
To test how extremely durable LiteWire is, we ran it over by a 5,690 lb minivan multiple times and it was still functional. It's as tough as a tank!
When your mobile device is plugged into a computer's USB port, your standard charging cable syncs and charges at the same time, which results in very slow charging rates.

Unlike standard charging cables featuring both data and syncing capabilities, LiteWire's charge-only feature makes sure you don't waste your precious time charging your phone forever. This means that all the power available will be used to boost the charging speed up to 2x faster - for those times you are away from the wall.

Charging speed is measured using the unit of Ampere-hour(Ah). To demonstrate the difference in charging speeds between LiteWire and a standard charging cable, we used a USB meter and tested various devices as well as various power sources.
Based on the test results above, 6 out of 8 times LiteWire charged mobile devices at least 2x faster than regular charging cables when plugged into non-wall plug power sources.

NOTE: The fast charge function only applies to non-wall plug power sources. Wall plug chargers do not sync your device, therefore it already charges your phone as fast as possible. In addition, newer iPhones can charge up to 2.1A from a USB port using the regular cable when it's plugged into newer Mac computers.

We know how important it is for you to feel safe when charging your devices when you're out and about. When you're using public charging ports, hackers can easily steal your photos, videos, banking information, contacts, and a lot more.

That's why we blocked the data feature of LiteWire, making it impossible for unknown devices to gain unauthorized access to your phone and tablet, steal your data, or install malware on your mobile device.
You can think of LiteWire as the SyncStop/USB Condom of compact charging cables. It does the exact same thing.
In other words, LiteWire can save you from juice jacking.

Huffington Post | How to protect your phone from juice jacking
WKCY | Protect your info from ""Juice Jacking""
LiteWire XL is double the length of your regular charging cable! It's 6ft long and it can accommodate hard to reach power sources such as this:
When we were designing LiteWire, we made sure that every mobile device user in the world could use it.

Thanks to our specialized dual charging connectors, LiteWire is slim enough to fit into most phone cases so you don't have to ditch your phone cover.The ends of the connectors are much slimmer than the body itself, making it easier to accommodate tighter spaces.

In the year 2013, we are surrounded by technology which provides near constant connectivity to the internet. We have phones in our pockets that are faster than the computers we owned 10 years ago. We have glasses and watches providing all kinds of information to us every minute. What kind of things do you do with your technology and accomplish on a daily basis? What advantages does it give you? Have you ever considered what it would be like to use this technology if you couldn't see? You would quickly find out that despite the fact that most tech has progressed by leaps and bounds, people with vision impairments are being left behind.

What would happen if we could give access to a computer to the vision impaired users of the world?

There are 360 million vision impaired people who live in the world today. The fact is, the vast majority of these people are being forgotten in the technological revolution we are living in, without any access to computers or other devices most people take for granted. If you join me and pledge to this campaign, we will give the advantages of technology to vision impaired users once and for all. Just imagine what vision impaired users could do if they could send emails to friends or their family members. Or if they could visit their favorite social network and connect with like minded people or people that struggle with the same things they do. They could write the next great play, movie, or novel. Who knows where the next great web application might come from or some ground breaking innovation. Without access to a computer for the vision impaired users of the world, we will never know.

The way that a vision impaired user accesses a computer is through software called a screen reader. The screen reader reads out loud the text on the screen so that a vision impaired user can write documents, send email, instant mesage and browse the web. There is proprietary screen reading software available, but it is extremely expensive with the average cost being $1000 for one copy. 90% of the vision impaired users live in developing countries and 80% of vision impared people in the United States are unemployed, so that means the majority of vision impaired people don't have access to this proprietary software.

The alternative to this is the Orca screen reader, which is Free and open source software (See a demo here:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9jyWIkaoIG8 ).
I want to further develop the Orca screen reader software so this would give access to all vision impaired people thoughout the world. I want to improve Orca's functionality with programs like LibreOffice and audio recording software. I also want to advance web performance with Firefox and Chrome. Another feature I plan on improving is the performance of Orca itself. The funding will go towards making the Orca screen reader the best screen reader available. I want to make sure that Orca can bring access to every tool offered to bring all of the advantages of technology to everyone in the world. 

We are going to have some awesome perks for this campaign. If you pledge at the $25,000 level, you will help 5 vision impaired students in Nepal receive a notebook with the Orca screen reader and give them a chance to succeed. If you pledge at $5,000, You will provide 1 student with a notebook and we will also take 5 USB drives with the Orca screen reader already installed on it and they will be able to use it from any computer. Whatever work the student does on the drive will be saved so when they use the drive on another computer all of their work will still be there. This way they can make any computer accessible as they carry their accessibility in their pocket. At the $1000 level you will be providing 10 USB drives for students in Nepal. With a pledge of $100 you will get an awesome t-shirt showing your support. A $50 pledge will help 1 student in the United States get a USB drive with the Orca screen reader pre-installed. $25 will get you a great sticker showing your support of this project. A pledge of $10 will get you an honorable mention on the website.

If i don't reach my goal, I will still be able to make orca better, but to really get it to the point I want to it would mean that I have to meet my goal.

 Around the world, many vision impaired users can't go onto higher education or sometimes can't even graduate high school due to not having the right technology to make them successful, but Orca can make this difference.

Not only will Orca bring access to computers but it will also give the opportunity for entrepreneurship and has potential for creating jobs for the vision impaired. They could start their own services with tech support for Orca. Orca will also give the opportunity for visually impaired people to persue data entry jobs or any other job that requires common computer tasks. The goal of this campaign is to bring access to a computer but to also provide employment opportunities for people with vision impairments throughout the world.

As a blind computer user, I know first hand what vision impaired users are missing when it comes to accessibility and computers. I wasn't born blind, but I was involved in a car accident at the age of 14 which led to the loss of my sight. Given that I live in the United States and have the advantages that come with living here, I understand what a difference technology can make in someone’s life. Without access to technology, I may not have been able to graduate from high school or university. I wouldn’t be able to do 80% of the things I do on a day to day basis if it weren’t for accessible technology. I want to give this advantage to the vision-impaired citizens of the world. You can make this a reality. Please, join me and pledge to this campaign.


","In the year 2013, we are surrounded by technology which provides near constant connectivity to the internet. We have phones in our pockets that are faster than the computers we owned 10 years ago. We have glasses and watches providing all kinds of information to us every minute. What kind of things do you do with your technology and accomplish on a daily basis? What advantages does it give you? Have you ever considered what it would be like to use this technology if you couldn't see? You would quickly find out that despite the fact that most tech has progressed by leaps and bounds, people with vision impairments are being left behind. What would happen if we could give access to a computer to the vision impaired users of the world?

There are 360 million vision impaired people who live in the world today. The fact is, the vast majority of these people are being forgotten in the technological revolution we are living in, without any access to computers or other devices most people take for granted.   If you join me and pledge to this campaign,  we will give the advantages of technology  to vision impaired users once and for all. Just imagine what vision impaired users could do if they could send emails to friends or their family members. Or if they could visit their favorite social network and connect with like minded people or people that struggle with the same things they do. They could write the next great play, movie, or novel. Who knows where the next great web application might come from or some ground breaking innovation. Without access to a computer for the vision impaired users of the world, we will never know. The way that a vision impaired user accesses a computer is through software called a screen reader. The screen reader reads out loud the text on the screen so that a vision impaired user can write documents, send email, instant mesage and browse the web. There is proprietary screen reading software available, but it is extremely expensive with the average cost being $1000 for one copy. 90% of the vision impaired users live in developing countries and 80% of vision impared people in the United States are unemployed, so that means the majority of vision impaired people don't have access to this proprietary software. The alternative to this is the Orca screen reader, which is  Free and open source software (See a demo here:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9jyWIkaoIG8 ).I want to further develop the Orca screen reader software so this would give access to all vision impaired people thoughout the world. I want to improve Orca's functionality with programs like LibreOffice and audio recording software. I also want to advance web performance with Firefox and Chrome. Another feature I plan on improving is the performance of Orca itself. The funding will go towards making the Orca screen reader the best screen reader available. I want to make sure that Orca can bring access to every tool offered to bring all of the advantages of technology to everyone in the world.  We are going to have some awesome perks for this campaign. If you pledge at the $25,000 level, you will help 5 vision impaired students in Nepal receive a notebook with the Orca screen reader and give them a chance to succeed. If you pledge at $5,000, You will provide 1 student with a notebook and we will also take 5 USB drives with the Orca screen reader already installed on it and they will be able to use it from any computer. Whatever work the student does on the drive will be saved so when they use the drive on another computer all of their work will still be there. This way they can make any computer accessible as they carry their accessibility in their pocket. At the $1000 level you will be providing 10 USB drives for students in Nepal. With a pledge of $100 you will get an awesome t-shirt showing your support. A $50 pledge will help 1 student in the United States get a USB drive with the Orca screen reader pre-installed. $25 will get you a great sticker showing your support of this project. A pledge of $10 will get you an honorable mention on the website.

If i don't reach my goal, I will still be able to make orca better, but to really get it to the point I want to it would mean that I have to meet my goal. Around the world, many vision impaired users can't go onto higher education or sometimes can't even graduate high school due to not having the right technology to make them successful, but Orca can make this difference.

Not only will Orca bring access to computers but it will also give the opportunity for entrepreneurship and has potential for creating jobs for the vision impaired. They could start their own services with tech support for Orca.  Orca will also give the opportunity for visually impaired people to persue data entry jobs or any other job that requires common computer tasks. The goal of this campaign is to bring access to a computer but to also provide employment opportunities for people with vision impairments throughout the world. As a blind computer user, I know first hand what vision impaired users are missing when it comes to accessibility and computers. I wasn't born blind, but I was involved in a car accident at the age of 14 which led to the loss of my sight. Given that I live in the United States and have the advantages that come with living here, I understand what a difference technology can make in someone’s life. Without access to technology, I may not have been able to graduate from high school or university. I wouldn’t be able to do 80% of the things I do on a day to day basis if it weren’t for accessible technology. I want to give this advantage to the vision-impaired citizens of the world. You can make this a reality. Please, join me and pledge to this campaign.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: If you can't contribute for some reason, that doesn't mean you can't help!

• Spread the word on social media. We want people to know about our app. Sharing our campaign is easy - just select from the share buttons above or embed our video and campaign link into as many blogs, news feeds and web pages as possible.
• Just tell your friends about our campaign! They would love it!
• Give us your feedback or ask your question, we will listen to your suggestions :)
FOR PRESS: Media Kit / Press Release

","There are a lot of different tasks managers, to-do lists and other apps for productivity. But all of them forget one thing, one main thing for every single action — Motivation. So as a very enthusiastic group of students, we know that we do need motivation for our everyday life tasks. So, we created Fillip App, an app with intuative UI that gives you motivation for your tasks by relevant motivational phrases. All this creates a very unique way to raise your productivity.If we get your financial support, we will create a special reward system which will make you even more productive with your future goals. In addition, we will design customized themes and make a detailed sound design in order to make your productivity grow way faster.Trying to get final product done, we could not eliminate a financial side of the process. We do need your support for hiring designers and coders in order to present a product of great quality to our future users. We will implement awesome features like geolocation, so you could link your task to the place you want. In addition to that, we will make an app version for Android and Apple Watch. Did we mention a Slack Bot? Moreover, we will need to cover some taxes & fees.
If you can't contribute for some reason, that doesn't mean you can't help!

Spread the word on social media. We want people to know about our app. Sharing our campaign is easy - just select from the share buttons above or embed our video and campaign link into as many blogs, news feeds and web pages as possible.
Just tell your friends about our campaign! They would love it!
Give us your feedback or ask your question, we will listen to your suggestions :)
FOR PRESS: Media Kit / Press Release",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

You have the opportunity to give the PERFECT gift for the holidays NOW that will help me raise the money for another great product next year!
What will you get now?  The TekTuk!
Convenient bedside storage and charging for all of your idevices and accessories
That mangled mess of cables, earphones, remotes, your tablet computer and cell phone in the ""moat"" around your bed will be a thing of the past
Cell phone pocket - This pocket will accommodate any cell phone on the market up to 3 1/4"" wide and 1"" thick.
Tablet computer pocket - You can fit any tablet, netbook, or mini laptop up to 11"" wide and 1"" thick in this pocket.
Accessory pocket - Easily store your power and charging cords, earplugs, iPods, mice, remotes, etc. in this spacious 7"" wide, 4 1/2"" tall zippered pocket.
Magazine and document pocket - While you are en route to your next bed
column2: store your magazine or boarding pass in the elastic document pocket.

column1: Cord Management loop - Run your charging cables through the elastic loops located on either side of the tablet pocket so that they are always conveniently accessible.
What will the money go toward?  The TekTuk mini!

The TekTuk mini will be made for mini tablets, will be made of leather and will be manufactured in the US.  The money raised by the sale of the TekTuk will go toward getting 3-5 leather prototypes made by different US manufacturers so that we can determine which artisan will make the perfect final product.  After we determine which company will mass produce the TekTuk mini, we will then be able to launch an Indiegogo campaign to raise the money for mass production.

By giving your loved one the perfect holiday gift of the TekTuk this season, you will be helping to get the TekTuk mini one step closer toward reality.  Those who pledge at the $5 tier and higher will be sent an early invitation to get the TekTuk mini at a HUGE early bird discount when the Indiegogo campaign is launched during the first half of 2015.
The TekTuk is in stock now at three different warehouses in the US for quick holiday delivery.  All TekTuk will be shipped by December 15th, so that it can be under the tree on Christmas morning!

column2:
Challenges

Since the TekTuk is already in stock and ready to ship, there is no risk to you.  You will have the perfect gift in plenty of time for the holidays!

column1:

column2: >
column3:
> 

Using a magnetic-induction technology, Wyrex matches all Qi-compatible devices. The Wyrex pad consists of numerous coils - four fast charging for phones (10W), one coil for smartwatches, and one coil for earphones.
column4:
>

 

You can put four devices on the pad at one time including an Apple Watch, AirPods, and two phones (iOS or Android).
column5:
>

 

Yes, you read it right: with Wyrex there is no distinction between Operating Systems, so you can use it for various models.
column6:
>

 

By offering 4 fast charging 10W coils Wyrex saves your time. Charge devices faster by one-third compared to standard wireless chargers. A multi-coil pad provides more space for charging, so you can always be sure your device is connected properly and ready to use.
column7:
>

 

The kickstand mode turns into a form of the pre-opened page of the book, which creates the most convenient angle for usage. See all your notifications, have video calls, or watch a video hands-free, while Wyrex is charging your devices. We turn the anxiety routine of charging into a comfortable, fast and productive process.
column8:
>

 

Wyrex pad incorporates complicated multi-coil charging system and simplicity of size and form. It takes minimum space in any position. Additionally, Wyrex pad is foldable. You can easily transform it into the kickstand mode to make the working process more convenient.
column9:
>

 

Wyrex is the embodiment of the functionalism and superior design. With Wyrex we didn’t want to be satisfied with just being used. Our goal was to create the solution that handles all smart devices’ needs with the modern sense of style. Wyrex is a necessity and an accessory at once. The unique, minimalistic design looks great both on a busy desk or on your bedside table.

column1: Hello everyone, my name is Nicholas King and I am 15 years of age and I attend ElDorado high school I will be a sophomore this upcoming semester. I have been participating in track and field for the past 3 years and have accumulated a large number of first place medals. My events are Long Jump, 400m, 4x100, and 4x400. For the new school year I will be participating as a varsity in the following events, Triple jump and 200m, I continue to tell myself that I will get better and faster if I am competing against faster and better athletes.

Small or large Contributions are very much welcome which will pay for my airfare, my hotel and food expenses, airfare tickets continue to climb as each day goes by, my coach have reserve rooms at the hotel for $63.00 a night and that price will remained the same. I thank you for the opportunity to bring home the gold and to make all American in all my events.
The Funds are for my Airfare, Hotel and food expenses for the 5 days in Greensboro, NC, big or small will be a great help.

To stand on the podium and become an all American for my track team, Technical Precision Athletics, would be a great accomplishment for now and my future. I will ensure that on each video that I put on you tube I will mention you as a contributor to the campaign at the beginning of each video

I have been participating in track and field for 3 years and have accumulated a large number of first place medals. My events are Long Jump personnel best is 21”9’, in the 400m I have set a time of 52.7 sec, the 4x100 my split time is 11.5 and in the 4x400 my split is 51.39.
The photo with the medals I accomplished this year as a freshman for El Dorado high school track and field, 14 Gold, 2 Sliver and 1 Bronze.
As I had mention on the last campaign, I have made an error by making the deadline for only 2 days
column2: please don't let this discourage you. I have also subtracted the $170 that was raised on the previous campaign leaving us with a new goal of $641

>ENGLISH:

FIRST OF ALL: i had to launch this project again, so i want to thanks James Max White for donating 25 usd on my previous campaign! ♥♥♥

So, hey! What's up? I'm Ivy Cat from Uruguay, i'm 22 years old and i play League of Legends since 2012. I was one of the Beta Testers for the LAS Server here on South America and atm i'm part of the community here (i'm part of the official site for LoL UY). You can find me here: http://www.lolking.net/summoner/las/224373

So what's this all for? Well, i wanted to have a Twitch channel and do streams since a while ago but i cant because of my actual pc... You know, Intel Dual Core, 2 gb RAM, GeForce 9800 GT (this last one works pretty well though) and i'm planning to move on and get a new one! :D But the one that i want it's quite expensive for my actual salary and it's HERE WHEN I NEED YOU GUYS! :D

There aren't many girls on my country that play LoL and do streams and i want to be one of them, be an example and also help the community: by having this channel, everyone in the world can know us... And maybe help us to have a better server :D *jokes*

Also i'm going to use this computer for work: on 2015 i'm planning to work with AutoCad and general design and dedicate most of the years to come on this, so i really need to have the necessary elements to develop this project, not only for gaming, because this is going to be my principal job and from where all the money i need to survive will come, so i really appreciate your help.


So here comes what i need:

AMD FX-8320: 221 usd

Asrock 970 Extreme3 R2.0: 140 usd

2TB HDD: 123 usd

Cooler Master K350 (RC-K350-KWN2-EN): 84 usd

Kingston HyperX 4GB KHX1600C9D3B1/4G x3: 192 usd


The rest of the elements such as graphic card and power supply i already have it from my older pc so, for now, i won't need them :)


That's all! Thank you so much for reading, i really appreciate your time, GLHF.


____________________________________


ESPAÑOL:

PRIMERO LO PRIMERO: tuve que lanzar esta campaña nuevamente, así que quiero agradecer a James Max White por donar 25 usd en mi proyecto anterior! ♥♥♥

Hola a todos! Qué tal? Soy Ivy Cat, de Uruguay, tengo 22 años y juego League of Legends desde el año 2012. Fui parte de los Beta Testers del servidor LAS aquí en Sudamérica y en estos momentos soy parte de la comunidad de aquí (formo parte del sitio oficial de LoL UY). Puedes encontrarme aquí: http://www.lolking.net/summoner/las/224373

Así que, para qué es todo esto? Bueno, desde hace un tiempo que quiero tener un canal de Twitch y hacer transmisiones pero no puedo debido a mi actual pc... Ya saben, Intel Dual Core, 2 gb RAM, GeForce 9800 GT (a pesar de todo, esto funciona muy bien) y planeo avanzar y conseguir una nueva! :D Pero la que quiero es un poco cara para mi por mi actual salario así que es AQUÍ CUANDO LOS NECESITO! :D

No hay muchas mujeres en mi país que juegen al LoL y hagan transmisiones y quiero ser una de ellas, ser un ejemplo y a su vez ayudar a la comunidad: teniendo este canal, todo el mundo nos puede conocer... Y tal vez ayudarnos a tener un mejor servidor :D *chiste*

A su vez, también usaré esta computadora para trabajar: en el 2015 planeo trabajar con AutoCad y diseño en general y dedicar la mayoría de los años siguientes en esto, así que realmente necesito tener los elementos necesarios para diseñar, no solo para jugar, porque esto será mi trabajo principal y de  donde vendrá todo el dinero que necesito para sobrevivir, así que aprecio su ayuda.


Así que aquí viene lo que necesito:

AMD FX-8320: 221 usd

Asrock 970 Extreme3 R2.0: 140 usd

2TB HDD: 123 usd

Cooler Master K350 (RC-K350-KWN2-EN): 84 usd

Kingston HyperX 4GB KHX1600C9D3B1/4G x3: 192 usd


El resto de los elementos, como tarjeta de video o fuente de poder, ya los tengo de mi vieja pc así que, por el momento, no necesitaré comprar nuevos :)


Esto es todo! Muchas gracias por leer, de verdad aprecio su tiempo, GLHF.

Y tal vez ayudarnos a tener un mejor servidor :D *chiste*A su vez, también usaré esta computadora para trabajar: en el 2015 planeo trabajar con AutoCad y diseño en general y dedicar la mayoría de los años siguientes en esto, así que realmente necesito tener los elementos necesarios para diseñar, no solo para jugar, porque esto será mi trabajo principal y de  donde vendrá todo el dinero que necesito para sobrevivir, así que aprecio su ayuda.Así que aquí viene lo que necesito:AMD FX-8320: 221 usdAsrock 970 Extreme3 R2.0: 140 usd2TB HDD: 123 usdCooler Master K350 (RC-K350-KWN2-EN): 84 usdKingston HyperX 4GB KHX1600C9D3B1/4G x3: 192 usdEl resto de los elementos, como tarjeta de video o fuente de poder, ya los tengo de mi vieja pc así que, por el momento, no necesitaré comprar nuevos :)Esto es todo! Muchas gracias por leer, de verdad aprecio su tiempo, GLHF.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1: Cult of mac- ""The Guardian Leather is a functional leather iPhone case, specifically for 6 and 6s. It looks good, it — dare I say one more time — smells good, it feels good in your hand, and for a wallet case it’s quite protective of the iPhone. Plus the side flap for wrapping cords is a win.""
I Am Alpha Men- ""This Leather Case is the ULTIMATE""
""So there ya go. It's a phone case, wallet, and media player all in one highly modern, yet classic, protective leather case... the stylish answer to carrying all of that *stuff*""
MindHungry- ""As for folio cases, there is not many that combine quality and value, but the Guardian nails that.""

Our Vision

Our vision is to create a 100% leather case, which is functional, easy to handle, and non-irritating to use. Our case will ensure your phone is fully protected while maintaining an exclusive design and feel.
column4:
>Premium Quality Leather

We have combined high quality, handmade leather work with advanced micro-suction technology, to create the ultimate leather phone case!

Most leather cases have a cheap plastic framework which ruins the appearance and the concept of the leather case. Other leather cases are poorly designed and don't allow you to place your phone into the case with ease. And while some cases may look good, they fail to fully protect your phone as they claim.
column8:
>Micro-Suction Technology

The micro-suction pad consists of millions of microscopic suction cups that attach the phone with a vacuum
column9:
they hold the phone really tight and yet allow you to take it out easily without leaving any marks or sticky stuff on the back of your phone. You can repeat this action over and over again without wearing out the material.

Attach and remove in seconds:

column1:
Protective Leather Corners

We worked really hard to design specialist leather corners to protect your phone, as we discovered that in many instances the cases were using a cheap looking plastic frame, or otherwise leaving the phone unprotected on the corners.

The corners are strong and durable, made with a high-quality cutting and sewing process to a very high standard of finish.

These corners make it easy to place your phone in the exact position when taking it in or out of the case.

It Is a Wallet!

As you already carry your phone around with you at all times, why not eliminate the need for carrying around your wallet as well? Well, the Guardian case does just that with a built in credit card slot!
The Guardian case is versatile and flexible, allowing you to use it as a fully featured media player and watch your media on the go.
If you like to listen to your music when you are on the go- the Guardian Case has the best solution for you. Easily wrap the headphone cords around the case without the hassle.

Meticulously Designed

The Guardian case has been meticulously designed to fit perfectly your phone. The exact camera cut out, volume buttons, corner protectors are just part of the features that speak volume of the design.

To bring this project to full production, we need a minimum of a 1,000 orders to manufacture at a reasonable price, covering the costs involved in a full-scale production. We offer you the opportunity to pre-order the Guardian Case, enjoying a 40% discount off retail price, which will be approximately 75$, as you are buying this directly from us
column2: and because we appreciate your help !

column1: With your help we will be able to continue and develop the Guardian Case for other devices, and add more features to our products as there is so much more potential in this product! We will only be able to do it with your support!
We have additional ideas and solutions that we are currently working on, for making life easier, particularly in regards of the use of Smartphones in vehicles.

column4: >Win a free case in two simple steps:

column1: 1.Log in to IndieGoGo if you have not already, or create an
2. Look below the main video to copy and share

Our design for the Guardian Case is finalised, our manufacturers are waiting for us to submit our order. For this to happen, we need your support to raise the necessary finances to meet our minimum order quantity.

As with any product going into production involves certain are risks, but we have worked hard to minimize those risks. For example, production delays which can be a result of various things: holidays, shipping delays, the need to order a new stock of leather.
to minimize these risks, we offer now only the colors we have in stock. We will
widen the selection in our stretched goals. If we see that we are reaching our
first goal we will start working on the orders without waiting for the campaign
to end. We know that many campaigns fail to deliver on time, so we worked hard
to minimize this risk. We already invested in the cutting tools that we need
for production of the iPhone 6/6s case, and manufactured a portion of the amount so we know that
everything is working good and ready to go! We made great effort to ensure that
the early birds for the iphone 6/6s will be delivered on time. We are capable of manufacturing up
to 1000 cases per month. If we exceed this amount in our campaign, we already
have a secondary manufacture line that can double the quantity, in that case we
might have delays with delivering the late backers products. The delay time depends
on the extra amount of cases we will need to manufacture, and we will do our best effort
Developing the Guardian Case for the Galaxy S6, S6 edge, S7 and the
Guardian Case II can take a few month. We currently only offer the Guardian
Case for iPhone 6/6s in our perks. We will keep you updated when other models

We went through a long journey of planning, designing, manufacturing, testing and examining various types of prototypes until we were able to come up with the final design and the best leather for the Guardian Case. And all this to ensure that our product gives the highest level of protection for the phone, easy to use and style. For us quality is the most important! We worked with different luxurious leather manufacturers to find the one that had the best quality. We were not willing to compromise on less than perfect!
The Idea Behind Our Logo-
Many of the greatest inventions came from
learning from the nature. In designing the Guardian Case we were inspired by
watching a lizard climbing on glass windows. The mechanism of the little lizard
is so sophisticated, allowing her to climb on any surface, walking on the ceiling
without wearing out, or falling down. The Lizard in our logo symbolizes the
micro-suction technology that we use in our product. The shield symbolizes
Some of you may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
· Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

It's a Charging Dock, a Clock Stand, and your Notification Centre in one


Our Indiegogo Campaign is over!
It's been an amazing ride. Thanks to everyone who contributed  :)

column1: If you missed out you can still order the Moduul Smartwatch Dock for Pebble Time or Apple Watch here: www.aerios.com.au/shop
• Available in 3 anodised colours - silver, black and gold
• Hand finished walnut timber, for a dark rich pedestal for your watch
• Small footprint so it doesn't take up valuable table space
• The “sweet spot” that holsters your watch at the optimal ergonomic angle for usability and visibility
• Simple one handed docking and undocking of you watch
• Seamlessly integrates each watch’s accompanying charge cable/connector (not included)
• The Moduul Docks included in this campaign are compatible with the Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel and both sizes of Apple Watch
• A one off Exclusive Gold Plated Moduul for the Apple Watch or Pebble Time
Introducing the new Moduul - the best smartwatch dock for Pebble Time and Apple Watch
Our ""sweet spot"" angle for easy viewing on desk and bedside table
Sticky base for easy one handed docking and un-docking
Big base docks have no place on your desk or bedside table.
A wide range of colours to suit your personal style
Compatible with the charger that came with your Apple Watch or Pebble Time

When we launched our first Moduul via Indiegogo a year ago we vowed to try and rid the world of cheap plastic tech accessories, one product at a time. So far we've created Smart Watch Docks and the Aurora Wireless Charger both of which are made from premium high quality materials.

We first created the Moduul range in 2014 to get our smart watches off the table and into full view, while still maintaining full usability and a small footprint. Since that time we've made Moduul's for the LG G Watch and the G Watch R.
Made from anodised aluminium and crafted timber the Moduul encompasses the same design ethos since its inception. Beauty, simplicity, and functionality.
We have been prototyping and refining the Moduul since its first inception in August last year.
Perfected bend and aluminium finish in the latest Apple Watch Prototype
Early design prototypes - Dock opened to accommodate closed watch bands
Apple Watch Moduul Wire frame images for prototypes

Let's be straight, we've done crowdfunding before - and it was a success. We're not here to ask for help paying for tooling, or buying materials - we have that under control. Indiegogo is a great platform for group buying! So we've launched on Indiegogo to allow you to get our latest Moduul in your hands for the most affordable price.
We've tried to make getting a Moduul as simple as possible.
You choose the perk to get either a Moduul Pebble Time Dock or Moduul Apple Watch Dock. If you want two, just double the perk price.

Example: For an Early Bird: Moduul Apple watch, if you want one, pay $35, plus the shipping for your country. If you want two of the same Moduul dock (different colours are fine), pay just $70 plus shipping for your country.
• $5 Tier: Get backer only updates on the status of production
• $30 Tier: For you Super Early Birds. $20 off RRP for your Pebble Time or Apple Watch Moduul
• $35 Tier: For the Early birds. $15 off RRP for your Pebble Time or Apple Watch Moduul
• $42 Tier: Get $8 off RRP for your Pebble Time or Apple Watch Moduul
• $8,000 Tier: One of a kind gold plated Moduul. You work directly with the Moduul creator and have your choice of timber, for a truly custom look in your home or office.
Indiegogo makes backing the Moduul Dock for Pebble Time or Apple Watch simple, secure, and available to everyone.
• Log into your Indiegogo account, or create a new account.
• Click the Pink “Contribute Now” button next to our video, or click on the Perk you'd like to back.
• Enter your pledge amount and select a reward perk (this is the type of Moduul you want to receive - we'll ask for your colour later).
• Add $15 for shipping to anywhere in the world
• Submit your payment information and that’s it!
• It's important to note that your credit card payments won't be received by us until 15 days after our campaign ends.
We've shipped our products all around the world - thank you to everyone that has bought one of our products in the past!
Outside Australia: We've managed to reduce our shipping costs and only need $15 for shipping anywhere in the world - please make sure to add this to your pledge amount.
Australians can either pickup from our offices, or pay $5 for delivery to anywhere in Australia.

For this campaign we're excluded from sending to Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Although this is a low cost item, you may be responsible for import duties, fees and taxes in your country.
Do you own a store or are a distributor of accessories or design pieces and looking for new exciting products? We want to chat with you!
Contact us at hello@aerios.com.au and lets get talking.
Please check each reward tier for the timeframe we've specified as the estimated delivery.
We've set these delivery dates to get our hands on the Apple Watch and Pebble Time and make sure the fit is precise, for easy one handed docking and un-docking.
We do however expect all backers to have their Moduul dispatched before the end of July. We'll keep you posted with updates if there's anything that may change this estimated delivery timeframe.
We've loved making these products and we hope you enjoy using them. If for any reason you don't please don't hesitate to contact us by emailing support@aerios.com.au

If you have any questions, contact us on hello@aerios.com.au. Our support team have received great feedback on our products in the past (we've even got videos and photos of customer using their Moduuls), we love hearing about those as well.
All trademarks and product names (Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel and Apple Watch) are the property of their respective owners and may be registered in certain parts of the world.
There's always risk and challenges with any project. At Aerios we've successfully created and manufactured the Moduul Smart Watch Docks for the LG G Watch and the LG G Watch R.
We have solid relationships with all our manufacturing and fulfilment partners - they know we require the highest quality workmanship, and they deliver accordingly.
Because we haven't been able to get our hands on the Apple Watch or Pebble Time just yet, the designs above may be subject to some minor changes.

All prototyping will be done in Australia to expedite the fitting process, and we have our team ready and waiting for the final plans. If demand is so great that our current team can't handle the load, we have another studio ready to help.
We've set the delivery dates to June and July to get our hands on the Apple Watch and Pebble Time and make sure the fit is precise, for easy one handed docking and undocking and ultimate usability.
Should we hit any snags along the way, we'll let you know and be open and honest about the rectification and whether there will be a change in the timeline.
