Mass production is starting this month. Last chance to be one of the first to receive Jiffy.

A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL THE BACKERS OF THE PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN! THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST AND SUPPORT. IT MEANS A LOT TO US! 

Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency. Jiffy uses the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" This is the fastest technology out at the moment for charging devices.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger and using the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" will assure your device a quick charge that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology ""Quick Charge 2.0"".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE


Perks

UFour is the perfect 4-in-1 charging cable for digital nomads. Its ingenious trident-like design features a compact wireless charging pad compatible with all Apple watch models and three charging connectors for almost all mobile devices. It is the only one cable you need to carry when you want to charge your Apple watch and other iOS and Android devices on the go. It is minimalist, convenient, tangle-free and can charge four devices at fast speed simultaneously. It is of extremely high quality that will outlive most of your mobile devices.

UFour is the all-in-one portable charging solution that comes with multiple plugs, including a micro-USB, a USB-C and a lightning plus a wireless charging pad for Apple watch for extra connectivity. With UFour, you don’t need many different cables to charge each of your devices. It's efficient, easy to use, and helps keeping your USB slots free for other purposes.

UFour is ideal for families with lots of electronics in the house
column2:
it helps you manage all your devices at one place with high efficiency. The cable is capable of charging three different digital devices plus one apple watch simultaneously. 

The three ports of UFour can be connected to all kinds of gadgets including smartphones, tablets, wearables, external batteries, headphones, speakers - it is compatible with most devices available in the market. 

UFour comes with a simple design that taking less of your space. Instead of bringing all the charging cables for different devices, you can just bring one. It is an excellent tool to keep everything organized - effortless to keep in your pocket or bag. Its minimal and lightweight design makes it your perfect travel companion.

Simply hold the charging pad/mat near the back of the watch and magnets snap into place automatically. The magnets will automatically stick to your watch and start to charge. Allows you to charge your smart watch without unfastening the band. 

 

The built-in magnetic charging module features high quality pure copper coil that powers your Apple Watch at 3.5W, which rivals the original Apple Watch charger without generating too much heat. 

Made with premium ABS material, UFour is superior in electricity insulation and heat dissipation. Even after long time use, it never gets too hot and is super safe for your devices. 

UFour features a smart charging system of the wireless charging mat, which regulates the current flow automatically for all Apple Watch series 1/2/3/4. 

UFour charges your devices faster than regular cables, carrying larger current - up to 3.5A in total - for three cables, and 2A max for one single cable. Plus, you can use the cable with lightning connector for data transfer between your Apple devices and laptop. 

Note: When all three cables and the wireless charging pad are used together, the charging speed may be slower across your devices. 

UFour is made of high-quality wire core (with tinned copper wires) for supreme anti-oxidation, it ensures stable transmission and safe charging condition for everyday use. 

The external cable of UFour is wrapped with strong nylon braided wire, it is truly unbreakable. It also never tangles like normal wires do. The three separate cables on one end are all 1 feet (25cm) long, and the other end of the cable is 3 foot (95cm) long, bringing the total length to 4 feet (120cm). The extension in length makes it effortless to charge multiple devices simultaneously. 

UFour doesn’t break easily with its reinforcement on the cable joints and connector. It had undergone durability and bending laboratory tests to ensure a longer lifespan with ultra high reliability. 

Testing Video Clip

Sketch​

Our Factory​

UFour Production

Since the 1920’s a combat support arm of the British Army has excelled with its engineers, logistic experts and system operators. This pedigree of soldier is exceptional at installing, maintaining and operating essential telecommunications infrastructures and information systems around the world. The Royal Corps of Signals is now home to Britain’s defence and force in Cyberspace.

In 2011 the most pioneering 1% of Royal Signals personnel, (all educated at the Defence School of Communications and Information Systems (DSCIS)), formed what is now known as the Extropy Trust. A forward thinking group which have financed important research into trends between our leaders’ future visions and the early development of new era of technologies which meet the collective demands of these future visions.

Their research and development findings gave rise to a new Charter which states that society’s biggest leap forward in the information age will only occur, once our ability to communicate digitally is transformed: ‘from an affordable privilege to a free and inherent right’. It’s believed that this transformation alone will have a more profound effect on our world than anything else in the 21st Century. In addition to this Charter, the Extropy Trust produced firm evidence that the idea of free communications is now commercially viable, technically possible and politically achievable.

• The commercial viability comes from a small alliance that was established between a regional networks and a digital advertising agencies in 2011. The business and engineering teams investigated a newly developed ‘ads for access’ free internet service. Preliminary meetings around trials of the  technology resulted in soft corporate offers, suggested a readiness from both parties to enter into a commercial agreement.

• The technology was also proven possible when a functional prototype, developed by the Trust in 2012, recently received a pre-money value of £3.8m. It is now a strong contender for several nationwide awards including: Cisco British Innovation, Cyber Smart, Next Generation Digital Challenge and Digital Communications.

• And finally, political successes were achieved when the challenge of transforming digital communications from a privilege, into a natural persons inherent right, caused controversial debate at the World Conference on International Telecommunications. A Dubai based United Nations debate that attracted over 170 world leaders. Many member states (including Britain and the United States) rejected the telecommunication unions international treaty due to its coninuance of cost barriers that sustain inequialty in respect to our 'free and open web'. Two of the EU’s Data Protection Directives also went under review for their unlawfulness in consideration of such a new technology.

In 2013 Wave Telecom Limited was incorporated as Principle Trustee of the Extropy Trust. Its fist agenda is to forge partnerships in this emerging market by way of a Cyber Enhanced Network-Telecommunications Integration Alliance (CENTIA). Wave Telecom will also safeguard the Trusts technology as it journies into our highly competitive and complex tech market.

Wave Telecom Limited recently placed one million shares into circulation, based on its estimated valuation of £2m. A £200,000 seed funding round will run until October 2013 and £20,000 of those shares are accessible to you TODAY via Indegogo.
* IF YOU EXPERIENCE ANY DIFFICULTY INVESTING IN WAVE ON THIS WEBSITE PLEASE CONTACT OUR TEAM DIRECTLY IN ORDER TO PURCHASE YOUR SHARES. Call: 020313 77118  or  Email: info@wavetele.com
Some can’t contribute cash, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help. We can pay for services in shares if you'd be so inclined. We need help with
Sharing this on your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or Google+ page is also of huge help to us. Or simply join our mailing list

I worked in the British Army between 2002 and 2007. I specialised in Digital Communications as a System Technician, working with Satellites, Radio, Networking, Electronic Warfare and eventually landed a key role in Cyber Security.

Passionate for cyberspace and innovation, I became a tech entrepreneur in 2007 - I have since specialised in business automation, digital advertising, international communications projects, SaaS and Artificial Intelligence.
Wave is the most pinnicle technology of all of these skills and experiences.
Connect with me anytime:   LinkedIn    Google+   Facebook

column2: >CLICK HERE TO ORDER!
column3:
> 

With DoBox you can now connect to more external devices like never before. You don’t need a laptop for serious work any more, DoBox turns your iPad or iPhone into a MacBook Pro. DoBox gives you the connectivity you were missing from your Apple device.

1. Turn it on with the touch sensitive button on the top

2. Connect to the DoBox's own Wi-Fi with your Apple device

3. Use the DoBox app to control all features and functions
column4:
>Wireless Connectivity

The DoBox has multiple ports to connect an internet cable, flashdrives, hard drives, keyboards, printers, TVs, projectors, monitors or speakers, and use them wirelessly through DoBox's own Wi-Fi. Save yourself from dongle hell!
column5:
>Wireless Storage

You can backup your photos, videos and documents wirelessly and securely offline. DoBox has its own internal storage plus a micro SD card reader. Never lose your files again!
column6:
>Portable Charger

DoBox is fully portable and durable, so you can easily take it anywhere with you. It comes with a built-in 8000 mAh Lithium Ion Battery to charge your phone or tablet from USB, plus the new MacBooks from USB-C. No need for a separate battery pack.
column7:
>Wi-Fi Router and Hotspot

Create a secure Wi-Fi connection from cable internet access or public hotspots. You can use DoBox as a wireless router, as well. Never worry again about someone stealing your password!
column8:
>Multimedia Player

Use DoBox as a portable media center through HDMI. Play your favorite videos, presentations or pictures from its internal storage using your iPhone or iPad as a remote controller. Control everything from the comfort of your chair!
column9:
>USB-C Hub

You can use the DoBox as an USB-C hub when it is turned off. Just connect an USB-C (3.1) cable, and you can natively use the USB ports with the new MacBook Pro.
column10:
>File Sharing

Now you can share, copy and manage all your music, photos, videos and documents without restrictions among your devices and among your friends even without an internet connection. Free your files from the iOS prison!
column11:
>Free DoBox App

You can easily manage all functions with our free iOS app. You can see DoBox's status, set the Hotspot, the touch sensitive button color, receive notifications and online updates. Store and manage your files and connect to your laptop remotely.

We love Apple, but we also feel limited in its possibilities. In the recent years, Apple has been intentionally reducing the number of ports on its products, while making us buy over-priced adapters. We have an iPhone, an iPad, and the new MacBook, but we felt frustrated, because we faced the following problems:

column1: • We couldn't easily connect our old speakers, keyboards, projectors, etc.
• Everything needed a separate adapter, but we could plug in only one cable
• When connecting a cable, we lost the advantage of mobility
• We didn't feel secure sharing private files on a public Wi-Fi
• We couldn't attach a flashdrive or an external harddrive to our devices
• We couldn't share, edit and backup files with others offline
• We wanted to charge our devices on the go without an ugly case

column2:
>Apple’s “Solution”

The idea for DoBox was born about 2 years ago in the mind of Mate Molnar, a hardcore Apple fan and inventor. Like many others, he was also frustrated and set out to make a solution, because he couldn’t find one. He recruited a team for his dreams, and together they built the first working prototype.

In April 2016, the team behind the project started a Kickstarter campaign which received global media attention. It was a huge success, 532 people pledged more than $100.000 to make the DoBox a reality.

Since then, we already finished the hardware development with the help of two highly experienced companies. The software is developed in-house and is currently in beta. The DoBox is already in the testing phase, and we will be ready to ship the Indemand orders from April, 2017.


If you wanted to buy all these accessories, and other cables, adapters and hubs, you would have to pay at least $700. But you don't have to pay this high price, because the DoBox can do everything in one. If you are fast, the Indemand price starts as low as $199.

We will send software updates online to your DoBox continuously to fix possible problems and bugs. If you have any problems with your DoBox, simply contact us, and our customer service will help. You receive one year guarantee for the hardware.

That's not all, we also thought about the developers. What do you want to use the DoBox for? Be creative, you can do it with DoBox! You can develop and install your own Swift 3 apps for DoBox. It comes with a hackable, open source software and SDK. This way, you can easily use its ports and functions in your app.

Copyright notice: DoBox is a brand of Fruitdock Ltd. All trademarked terms are the property of their respective owners. Fruitdock Ltd. makes no claim to affiliation with any trademark holders including Apple and others.

Special Thanks to:
PCB Design http://pcbdesign.hu
Hunify Laboratories http://hunifylabs.com
LaFem http://lafem.hu
PGB Studio http://pgbstudio.com
Pixoloid Studios http://pixoloid.net

Risks and challenges:
We have to apply for different certifications (CE, FCC, etc.). We may face possible delays, but we will do everything to deliver on time. We create custom kernel and software, but we use such solutions that will allow for online updates. This way we can fix possible bugs, and continue to work on the updates. Each DoBox will be tested before dispatch, and we also give one year guarantee.

FAQ:

Will the mouse work in all apps?
Initially, the mouse will function inside our app, but we offer an open source software development kit for app developers, so they can implement the DoBox's functions into their own apps. The system-wide cursor is not enabled on iOS by Apple.

Does the mouse work only in a remote app?
Basically there are three ways to use the mouse with the DoBox: 
1. Within the DoBox app,
2. In a remote app as shown in the video,
3. In third-party apps, if they implement the DoBox SDK.

Can I use bluetooth mouse or magic trackpad with DoBox?
Yes, the DoBox has built-in Bluetooth, so you can use your standard Bluetooth devices.

Does it need a jailbreak?
No, absolutely not. All functions are based on official programming libraries.

Will it work with non-apple product?
Certain functions work with other devices, like charging or file sharing. If there is enough demand, we will develop the DoBox app for Android and other platforms too.
column3:

ZTV Dongle is an exciting new technology that instantly puts your phone, tablet or laptop on your TV screen. Works with Android phones and tablets.
Just plug in ZTV Dongle into your TV and your mobile phone, tablet or laptop like magic can be displayed on your TV !
No cables required as it works over WIFI.

Just connect the ZTV Dongle to your HD TV. A few clicks and you can connect on your smartphone, laptop or tablet and start viewing your music, video, photographs, Facebook and much more on your phone tablet or laptop on your big-screen TV. So easy.
ZTV Dongle Works With your Smartphone, Laptop, or Tablet.

Whatever you are comfortable using when at home the ZTV Dongle will allow you to go from small screen to big screen TV and the click of a button. So when you get home you don't have to look at a small screen anymore. Go big screen with ZTV Dongle.
Great for sharing with friends and family, or for a cosy night in watching a film from your phone or laptop.
Every night can be a movie on demand night. Just use your phone to stream your favorite Netflix movies on your TV in full widescreen HD.
Press play and watch videos and movies in full HD with full sound almost seamlessly, no delays, no pauses, just instant streaming from your phone / laptop to your TV for uninterrupted viewing.

Share holiday photos or last weeks party on the big screen for all your friends or family to see without having to crowding around trying to all look at photos on the small screen on your phone. Great for viewing at home, or sharing with friends.
Play your music through you TV's surround sound speaker system at the touch of a button.
And gaming takes on a whole new dimension when you play it from your smartphone on a big screen TV.
Check out Internet news, youtube video, facebook, and a whole lot more.
Use it as a PC for your laptop and work on your Office documents from the comfort of your living room.
Works with Windows 7 and 8 laptops and PC's too.

One of the key things about ZTV Dongle is its fast. Unlike other phone to tv products on the market that are still in the testing phase and do have streaming problems, the ZTV Dongle has been tried, tested and delivers.

The WIFI connection and ZTV Dongle internal processor ensure almost real time relay from your phone, tablet or laptop to your TV screen. So no delay, no jerking images, no freezes - just pure fast streaming from your phone to the TV. Ideal for watching movies.

It's small enought to put in your pocket so you can take it anywhere. Use it at home, at a friends, at work, at school or even on holiday with the hotel TV. Watching in the living room and now want to watch in the bedroom. Just unplug the ZTV dongle and plug it into your bedroom TV.
It works with any tablet and you can see your tablet on your TV.

ZTV Dongle also works with a Windows 7 and 8 laptop so you can see your whole laptop on your TV. Great for watching movies or doing work in the living room or sharing with friends. Again no wire or cables required.
ZTV Dongle Works with Your Laptop to Your Projector
ZTV Dongle is great for business presentations too. Just plug ZTV Dongle into a projector and using free software from Google Play you can see your whole laptop or PC on the projector screen.
Or if you don't have a projector at work you can run your presentations on a large screen TV.
It runs over WIFI. No wires or cables required.
Turns your phone or tablet into a mega entertainment center for your TV.
Wirelessly stream picture, video and music in your smartphone, tablet or laptop to big screen.
Wirelessly display content includes photo, video, music, app, game, website, etc. on big screen.
Support in up to 1080p Full HD video resolution and surround sound.
Small size for easy placement and portability.
Fast with no delays so great for watching films and video or gaming.
Quick and easy to set up in less than 5 minutes.

column2: >So reserve yourself a ZTV Dongle today
> Turn Your TV into a Mega
>TV has never been so much fun w
column3: >ith our soon to be released Z Android 4.2 TV Dongle  8GB 1.5Ghz Dual Processor + Free Air Mouse.

column1: We are also working on the next generation of the Android 4.2 Dongle. With dual processors it is super fast and with Android 4.2 it is very stable and smooth.
Just plug one of these into your TV and you will have a Mega Tablet on your TV.
You don't need a phone or tablet to use the Android 4.2 TV. It runs completely seperate stand alone on your TV.
Just plug the dongle in your TV and you have a mega TV Tablet in your living room or where ever you have a TV !
You have all the features and functions you have on your tablet or phone,but permanently on your TV, so you can surf the web, online shop, do emails, watch movies all from the comfort of your sofa !

That's why we also give you a FREE wireless mouse so you can easily click your way around.
The remote has gyroscopic technology so you can also use it as an air mouse for playing games all from the comfort of your sofa.

We will have many of the popular apps preloaded, YouTube, Facebook, GooglePlay, Netflixs, BBC Iplayer, etc.

Because it is so small you can put it in your pocket when you are finished. So you can take it where ever you go: to friends, on holiday, for business.
With a dual processor, Android 4.2 and at 1.5 GHZ this is fast. Applications open quick, surfing webpages and loading is fast and video is smooth and clear.

laptop into big screen TV fun.
ZTV Dongle is an exciting new technology that instantly puts your phone, tablet or laptop on your TV screen. Works with Android phones and tablets.
Just plug in ZTV Dongle into your TV and your mobile phone, tablet or laptop like magic can be displayed on your TV !
No cables required as it works over WIFI.

Just connect the ZTV Dongle to your HD TV. A few clicks and you can connect on your smartphone, laptop or tablet and start viewing your music, video, photographs, Facebook and much more on your phone tablet or laptop on your big-screen TV. So easy.
ZTV Dongle Works With your Smartphone, Laptop, or Tablet.

Whatever you are comfortable using when at home the ZTV Dongle will allow you to go from small screen to big screen TV and the click of a button. So when you get home you don't have to look at a small screen anymore. Go big screen with ZTV Dongle.
Great for sharing with friends and family, or for a cosy night in watching a film from your phone or laptop.
Every night can be a movie on demand night. Just use your phone to stream your favorite Netflix movies on your TV in full widescreen HD.
Press play and watch videos and movies in full HD with full sound almost seamlessly, no delays, no pauses, just instant streaming from your phone / laptop to your TV for uninterrupted viewing.

Share holiday photos or last weeks party on the big screen for all your friends or family to see without having to crowding around trying to all look at photos on the small screen on your phone. Great for viewing at home, or sharing with friends.
Play your music through you TV's surround sound speaker system at the touch of a button.
And gaming takes on a whole new dimension when you play it from your smartphone on a big screen TV.
Check out Internet news, youtube video, facebook, and a whole lot more.
Use it as a PC for your laptop and work on your Office documents from the comfort of your living room.
Works with Windows 7 and 8 laptops and PC's too.

One of the key things about ZTV Dongle is its fast. Unlike other phone to tv products on the market that are still in the testing phase and do have streaming problems, the ZTV Dongle has been tried, tested and delivers.

The WIFI connection and ZTV Dongle internal processor ensure almost real time relay from your phone, tablet or laptop to your TV screen. So no delay, no jerking images, no freezes - just pure fast streaming from your phone to the TV. Ideal for watching movies.

It's small enought to put in your pocket so you can take it anywhere. Use it at home, at a friends, at work, at school or even on holiday with the hotel TV. Watching in the living room and now want to watch in the bedroom. Just unplug the ZTV dongle and plug it into your bedroom TV.
Works With your Tablet To TV
It works with any tablet and you can see your tablet on your TV.
Works With Your Laptop to TV

ZTV Dongle also works with a Windows 7 and 8 laptop so you can see your whole laptop on your TV. Great for watching movies or doing work in the living room or sharing with friends. Again no wire or cables required.
ITS GREAT FOR BUSINESS PRESENTATIONS TOO !
ZTV Dongle Works with Your Laptop to Your Projector
ZTV Dongle is great for business presentations too. Just plug ZTV Dongle into a projector and using free software from Google Play you can see your whole laptop or PC on the projector screen.
Or if you don't have a projector at work you can run your presentations on a large screen TV.

Quick and easy to set up in less than 5 minutes.

MAGNA MOMENTS Most original gifts ever!

Technological winds in the culture's sails!

Hey Guys! Sit down, please! Yes, it’s that kind of idea. Ebooks, audiobooks, music and movies on greeting cards!!!

First physical carrier for ebooks! Now you can offer a greeting card to your friends, relatives and partners with an Ebook included!

How come?  

Simple. The Ebook (audiobook,music,movie) will be attached using a QR Code. Scan the Code with your smartphone or tablet and the book is all set to be read. (plus you you’ll be able to download the ebook in ebup and pdf formats)

Simple, isn’t it? And yes, we’ve applied for a patent, to combine the greeting cards industry with ebooks, audiobooks industry. And with your help we’ll create a new sub-industry: Ebooks on greeting cards. Starting with only 7$ for a greeting card with an Ebook included!!!

A synergy between classic and modern! Technological winds on the culture sails! We deeply hope that this project will stimulate the reading of books. This is one of the main ideas of the project. A great gift for your friends! A special one for special ones. And the greeting cards..! You should see them! An amazingly talented and funny team of graphic designers created something special for you! ( see part of them below this article).

 We aren’t done with surprises yet. You will be able to customize your greeting card on our website magnamoments.club by choosing the ebook, message, design. The most important: you’ll be able to create your video greeting by recording yourself and uploading your video on our website and your video greeting will be attached to your greeting card by a second QR Code.

 And the final surprise of our project is the eChokoBooks. It’s a product that should help to stimulate reading among kids. eBooks on chocolates&
column3:
cookies. The idea is that we cannot totally avoid the consumption of sweets by children. So let’s use it to get a noble goal: “Want a cookie? Read the book from cookies package”. The ebooks,audiobooks,movies will be attached on chocolates and cookies by an QR Code as well.

Who we are and where the ideas came from?

We are an international enthusiastic team of Americans, Moldovans, Russians and Romanians. We love innovations and art as well. Graphic designers and engineers, managers and writers. Altogether we’re impressed by the project we did and will be doing our best to create a great product for you.

The idea. Hey, I’m Mariu Marin the founder of this talented start up and the author of the idea. During my travels through America I was really impressed how many greeting cards Americans send to their relatives and friends. It’s a really nice tradition. At the same time many voices were complaining about the decrease of level of book reading in the USA. And since I’m a problem solver☺ I thought why not to combine these 2 industries to create a new one as an incentive to art of reading. Simple☺ My previous successful projects make me confident that with my highly talented and motivated team we’ll build a really awesome product.

Our Goals and What We Want from You

Like we’ve mentioned the stimulation of reading is one of our biggest goals. The promo of talented or must be known writers is another one. We’re deeply impressed by American patriotism and the promo of true heroes of America is the next honorable goal for us: Greeting cards for Vets with histories about them, about astronauts and other heroes!

 

 We’re planning to invite and involve talented people to work with us, finding and writing stories, gifted painters etc. We are thinking about school contests of best stories about American heroes, etc.

And of course greeting cards for Christmas, Thanksgiving, Birthdays, Love, Hanukkah, Cinco de Mayo, etc.

A great book selection ready for you: Finest American and English poetry, Best books of all of time, Best fairytales, SF, ART and Cooking books. For every taste and age. As you can see we have great plans and they may come to live with your help if you agree that it is a good project.

We’re ready to start, but we need just a little of your help and we also prepared special perks and offers for you.

For ebooks on greeting cards we need 20000$ for printing, some software updates If we reach more than 50 000$ we will start the project eChokobooks as well. So my friends, the art and culture are in our hands. Let’s raise them!:) Thank you! Mariu Marin and all Magna Moments Team.  

Our Greeting Cards design

column1: Nope Sound Blocker and Nope Webcam Cover feature a subtle design which compliments the beautiful aesthetic of top devices.

Nope Sound Blocker

The micro electronic circuitry in Nope Sound Blocker forces your device to sense an installed mic. This turns off the device's on board microphones which blocks out sound.
To come up with the sleek design of Nope sound blocker we used one of the smallest circuit elements available.

Nope Webcam Cover is just 2 parts and 3M tape.  The mechanism is a slider that runs along the top and bottom rails. We used a combination of high-grade aluminum for the outer rim and a polymer sheet for the slider.
• Thin design makes it ideal for phones (won't snag in pockets)
Why not just use a piece of tape to cover the lens?
• Tape is easily forgotten, lost, or repurposed, leaving the camera exposed
• Holds 2 Nope Sound Blockers. One on each side
Your apps you could be giving companies permission to track your location, read all your texts, access your photos, microphone and camera.
","Nope Sound Blocker and Nope Webcam Cover feature a subtle design which compliments the beautiful aesthetic of top devices.
Nope Sound BlockerThe micro electronic circuitry in Nope Sound Blocker forces your device to sense an installed mic. This turns off the device's on board microphones which blocks out sound.
To come up with the sleek design of Nope sound blocker we used one of the smallest circuit elements available.

Nope Webcam Cover is just 2 parts and 3M tape.  The mechanism is a slider that runs along the top and bottom rails. We used a combination of high-grade aluminum for the outer rim and a polymer sheet for the slider.
Thin design makes it ideal for phones (won't snag in pockets)
Why not just use a piece of tape to cover the lens?
Tape loses its stickiness over time
Tape is easily forgotten, lost, or repurposed, leaving the camera exposed
Tape may leave a sticky residue
Keychain holder for Nope Sound Blocker
Holds 2 Nope Sound Blockers. One on each side
Your apps you could be giving companies permission to track your location, read all your texts, access your photos, microphone and camera.",13.0,0,"4 Campaigns

Charging your devices and those of your passengers with your vehicle’s existing charging solutions is a big headache. Not only is charging speed and precision generally sub-par but you’ll only be able to charge one device at a time meaning, in a full vehicle, most people get left out and their devices’ batteries are condemned to slowly die. Introducing, the X5+ from RapidX, your savior for in-vehicle charging letting you charge 5 different devices at once, quickly and conveniently.

With one Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0, one USB Type-C port, and three USB-A ports, the X5+ will turn your ride into an entertainment hub by accommodating any USB device. Finally, everyone can keep their devices topped up whether you’re on a quick drive to drop the kids off at school or a cross-State road trip with friends.

But what specific devices can you charge with the X5+? The X5+ has you covered when it comes to tons of device types such as: iPhones, iPads, Android Devices, USB gaming devices, USB powered GPS devices and many other USB powered devices. If you have a question about whether the X5+ accommodates a specific kind of device simply send us a message!

RapidX products have been featured in:

 


 

Durable Rubberized Frame

Lots of handheld tech these days is easy to break, not the X5+. The X5+ features an ultra-durable rubberized finish that allows it to take any beating your hectic modern lifestyle will throw at it.

 

Sleek and Space Efficient

The X5+ space efficient layout accommodates 5 USB plugs while keeping the X5+ as small and sleek as you would hope for a modern tech device.

 

An Amazing Array Of Colors

The X5+ has an incredible 5 colors to choose from to best suit your vehicle and your personal taste. Who said fashion and function could live in harmony in one device?

 

Seamless Hub Detachability

The X5+'s back hub is connected to the frontal charging unit via a wire making it extendable and easily passed back and clipped anywhere in the rear of your car. This creates 2 charging zones for both front-seat and backseat passengers to enjoy. 

You can also completely detach the back hub when you don't have any passengers to please and store it in your glove box or bag  to declutter your car. This allows you to use just the X5+'s frontal charging unit with no cords attached. The versatility the detachable hub provides really sets the X5+ apart from the competition and is sure to keep everyone happy, no matter how many or how few people are in your car.

Proof of Concept

What stage is the X5+ project at? We are happy to report that not only do we have fully functional production-quality prototypes but we are also in the process of manufacturing the first batch! Check out this video an X5+ prototype charging a range of devices:
And here are a number of images of the internal components of an X5+ product straight of the assembly line:

And for those who really want to see what's going on behind the scenes - some miscellaneous photos from our factory:

 

Risks and Challenges

Here at RapidX we have a long track record of launching successful products, and have thousands of happy customers worldwide. We have also already begun production of the X5+ that will be shipped to all our generous backers. For these reasons we are so confident in our ability to deliver the X5+ in line with our estimated timeline that we are offering guaranteed shipping to all backers.

Although we are confident in our supply chain management and production capability. There is always a small chance of uncontrollable factors, such as component delays or unexpected shortages to occur if the number of backers to our campaign greatly exceeds our expectations.

We will be sure to keep you well informed every step of the way and do our best to quickly solve any problems that emerge. And most of all, we here at RapidX are excited to get the X5+ into your hands!

 

FAQs

What can I do with that cable that attaches the hubs together when there is no one in car? Doesn’t it get cumbersome?

We are happy to say that the X5+ comes with a completely detachable hub which allows you to remove the X5+’s back hub completely (cord and all) and store it in your glove box, bag or purse. This allows you to still use the frontal charging hub but also helps to declutter your car!

 

How do I pick a color?

Simply pick a perk and then you will be prompted to pick your X5+ perk color(s) from a drop down menu. We are excited to see what colors you pick!

 

I’ve backed crowdfunding campaigns before and didn’t receive my perk. How do I know I’ll receive my X5+?

We at RapidX have a strong track record of delivering technology products to tens of thousands of customers previous customers and we stand behind our ability to deliver. Not only have we already almost finished manufacturing our first batch but we have more X5+s being made soon. We are sure with our seasoned logistics line alongside the factors above that we will ship your products. This is why we are offering guaranteed shipping on all perks.

 

Why is the X5+ different from other chargers?

For a full breakdown of the features of the X5+ versus competitors there is a great comparison table in our campaign story section for you to check out. For the sake of a summary though, the X5+ has tons of unique features like its 3 charging port options, its completely detachable hub and its value for the number of features it has.

 

Does this only charge USB type devices?

The X5+ has the following charging portion options: One Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 port, one USB Type-C port, and 3 USB-A ports that supply up to 2.4amp each. Unfortunately the X5+ doesn’t accommodate devices that don’t use one of these charging cords. However, these 3 charging options accommodate a ton of devices so hopefully your devices are covered!

 

Why are there two different shipping dates?

RapidX has already started to manufacture one batch of products which will be the batch we deliver to early bird backers. Then, based on the response to our campaign another batch will be manufactured to be shipped to our backers from later in the campaign. If you don’t know for sure which shipping date applies to you the estimated shipping dates for each perk can be found in the perk section above.

 

I would like to pick a perk with more/less units than the one I selected. What do I do?

For all such inquiries please contact team@rapidx.io and we will come up with a solution for you to get the number of RapidX units you were hoping to get.

 

If I have more questions, how do I get in touch?


If you are a backer you can contact with a direct message, a public comment or by contacting us via email directly at team@rapidx.io . If you haven’t backed us yet, please reach via email: team@rapidx.io

There is always a small chance of uncontrollable factors, such as component delays or unexpected shortages to occur if the number of backers to our campaign greatly exceeds our expectations.We will be sure to keep you well informed every step of the way and do our best to quickly solve any problems that emerge. And most of all, we here at RapidX are excited to get the X5+ into your hands! FAQsWhat can I do with that cable that attaches the hubs together when there is no one in car? Doesn’t it get cumbersome?We are happy to say that the X5+ comes with a completely detachable hub which allows you to remove the X5+’s back hub completely (cord and all) and store it in your glove box, bag or purse. This allows you to still use the frontal charging hub but also helps to declutter your car! How do I pick a color?Simply pick a perk and then you will be prompted to pick your X5+ perk color(s) from a drop down menu. We are excited to see what colors you pick! I’ve backed crowdfunding campaigns before and didn’t receive my perk. How do I know I’ll receive my X5+?We at RapidX have a strong track record of delivering technology products to tens of thousands of customers previous customers and we stand behind our ability to deliver. Not only have we already almost finished manufacturing our first batch but we have more X5+s being made soon. We are sure with our seasoned logistics line alongside the factors above that we will ship your products. This is why we are offering guaranteed shipping on all perks. Why is the X5+ different from other chargers?For a full breakdown of the features of the X5+ versus competitors there is a great comparison table in our campaign story section for you to check out. For the sake of a summary though, the X5+ has tons of unique features like its 3 charging port options, its completely detachable hub and its value for the number of features it has. Does this only charge USB type devices?The X5+ has the following charging portion options: One Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 port, one USB Type-C port, and 3 USB-A ports that supply up to 2.4amp each. Unfortunately the X5+ doesn’t accommodate devices that don’t use one of these charging cords. However, these 3 charging options accommodate a ton of devices so hopefully your devices are covered! Why are there two different shipping dates?RapidX has already started to manufacture one batch of products which will be the batch we deliver to early bird backers. Then, based on the response to our campaign another batch will be manufactured to be shipped to our backers from later in the campaign. If you don’t know for sure which shipping date applies to you the estimated shipping dates for each perk can be found in the perk section above. I would like to pick a perk with more/less units than the one I selected. What do I do?For all such inquiries please contact team@rapidx.io and we will come up with a solution for you to get the number of RapidX units you were hoping to get. If I have more questions, how do I get in touch?If you are a backer you can contact with a direct message, a public comment or by contacting us via email directly at team@rapidx.io . If you haven’t backed us yet, please reach via email: team@rapidx.io",22.0,1,"1 Campaign

Who am I?

I'm a Silicon Valley Mobile high-tech veteran who wants to make cellphone service free for everyone and reduce the financial burden on normal working people worldwide with ads and coupons that are relevant, money that is accessible, and mini-loans that they can manage.


What have I done before?

I've
column5: >worked with such Silicon Valley venture-backed companies as Spectrum Mobile, Mobile Posse, Cellfire, Bling Software, uVuMobile, SmartVideo, 2ergo, Proteus, Virgin Mobile, Seven Networks and Wcities.

column12:

What is our product?
column16: >My team is currently building a patent-pending mobile service for Apple IOS and Google Android devices that will allow you anywhere in the world to pay for your cellphone data plan on your pre-paid cellphone so that you can make What's app, Google Voice, Telegram, WeChat, Skype, Tango, Facebook, Twitter chat messages for free, all the time.

column5: >All you have to do is answer a few research questions in our Mobile wallet app each day, and you earn data/airtime or text credit towards your pre-pay cellphone balance automatically.  The vouchers can be used by yourself or you can share the with family and friends across your social networks.

>Because most of the world cellphone mobile users have pre-pay cellphone service, this service has a tremendous social development impact and can singlehandedly lift users out of poverty so that they no longer have to pay for prohibitive, high-cost cellphone minutes in their country.
column9:
>The ad and coupon targeting capabilities in our data analytics modeling allow a user to receive personalized and relevant offers instead of spam in their app, saving them even more money off things that they already buy.  We will roll out features like free money transfers, payments, virtual bank accounts and micro-laons once the first few features are launched by July in the mobile app.


What do you get?

Once we launch our Beta service, we will give you one year's worth of FREE cellphone service (at a equivalent value of $40/month on supporting cellphone mobile carriers) if you contribute $250 (a more than $500 value).  If you contribute more, you get more free months!
column10:

What if I already have a cell-phone contract?

column1: • Gift a year of free cellphone service to your family, friends and colleagues!

And that’s it!

","Who am I?I'm a Silicon Valley Mobile high-tech veteran who wants to make cellphone service free for everyone and reduce the financial burden on normal working people worldwide with ads and coupons that are relevant, money that is accessible, and mini-loans that they can manage.What have I done before?I've worked with such Silicon Valley venture-backed companies as Spectrum Mobile, Mobile Posse, Cellfire, Bling Software, uVuMobile, SmartVideo, 2ergo, Proteus, Virgin Mobile, Seven Networks and Wcities.

My previous roles include the CEO and co-founder of Spectrum Mobile, focused on developing markets, VP of Business Development at Omnicom's mobile division, Tanla's VP of Business Development-Americas and managed Product Development at the Associated Press' AP Mobile team.  I began his career at Cellular One (now AT&T). I frequently speak at mobile and digital media conferences and have successfully raised capital for numerous private and public companies. I have a Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science and Management from New York University.  What is our product?My team is currently building a patent-pending mobile service for Apple IOS and Google Android devices that will allow you anywhere in the world to pay for your cellphone data plan on your pre-paid cellphone so that you can make What's app, Google Voice, Telegram, WeChat, Skype, Tango, Facebook, Twitter chat messages for free, all the time.

All you have to do is answer a few research questions in our Mobile wallet app each day, and you earn data/airtime or text credit towards your pre-pay cellphone balance automatically.  The vouchers can be used by yourself or you can share the with family and friends across your social networks.

What is our goal?Because most of the world cellphone mobile users have pre-pay cellphone service, this service has a tremendous social development impact and can singlehandedly lift users out of poverty so that they no longer have to pay for prohibitive, high-cost cellphone minutes in their country.The ad and coupon targeting capabilities in our data analytics modeling allow a user to receive personalized and relevant offers instead of spam in their app, saving them even more money off things that they already buy.  We will roll out features like free money transfers, payments, virtual bank accounts and micro-laons once the first few features are launched by July in the mobile app.What do you get?Once we launch our Beta service, we will give you one year's worth of FREE cellphone service (at a equivalent value of $40/month on supporting cellphone mobile carriers) if you contribute $250 (a more than $500 value).  If you contribute more, you get more free months!What if I already have a cell-phone contract?
Gift a year of free cellphone service to your family, friends and colleagues!
Tell your friends and colleagues about get the word out!

column4:
>Updates

We have had some difficulty getting the prefabricated components and boards for this project from the previous circuit manufacturer — our small order quantity, in addition to being delayed, were not to spec, which caused a safety concern, and we had to reject those components. Subsequently, we had to rely on a more reliable component service which was a little more expensive.

column1: To ensure we didn't have any similar problems, we had produced small quantities of samples from several manufacturers and have found one which meets our requirements.
Some of you have already received the first few units that we had made from these small quantities, and we are glad that the unit is working out well.

We will be receiving the next batch of boards, components and housings from four different manufacturers and suppliers over the next 12 days or so and hopefully look forward to resuming delivery of the WiFlux then.
The journey on this product has certainly been challenging, and we couldn't thank you more for your patience.

In order to keep up with the pace of modern power consumption, many resort to carrying additional power packs in an effort to remain connected in this wireless world. Portable charging in this manner seems like the stone age, especially when wireless charging and ultra thin lithium polymer batteries are already a reality.
WiFlux takes the concept of charging wirelessly a step further by creating a portable power bank that incorporates inductive charging and squeezing it into a card sized product.

Charging up a mobile device would be as easy as sticking the WiFlux Card onto the back of your phone. Its low profile and unobtrusive design would mean no more bulky power packs, no more cables, and no more mess.
By eliminating the need for cables and reducing the overall physical footprint of the portable charger, we seek to liberate the mobile device by making it truly wireless.

column2: >Reducing the inductive charging base to the size of a credit card
>Integrating the inductive coil with the thinnest battery possible and charging circuitry into a package that is 5mm thick, or even thinner

column1: The intended RRP of this product is USD 39.90 per set which comprises the WiFlux charging card and the charging receiver.
For now, two versions of the WiFlux charging system will be available.

column2: >For the Samsung Galaxy (S2, S3 and S4)

column1: If we significantly exceed the funding goals of this campaign, we would be glad to extend the product further to include more devices. Focussing on a smaller number of mobile devices now, means getting the initial WiFlux card just right.

Proof of Concept

We have carried out proof of concept tests with the iPhone 4S, iPhone 5 and the Samsung Galaxy S2 to date. Devices successfully drew the 100mA minimum charge required from the WiFlux wireless charging card, and we are working out the necessary circuitry to fully utilise the 500mA coming from the receiver end.
The following videos demonstrate the initial tests carried out with the Mark 1 Mod 1 prototype of the WiFlux card on the iPhone 4S and Samsung Galaxy S2.

column2: >The WiFlux Card comes with built in 850mAh lithium polymer battery
>Minimum output of 100mA at 5V on secondary coil (receiver)

column1: The plan is to ship the WiFlux Card in a standard package that comprises the following:

column2: >The charging receiver, which connects to the mobile device / battery
>A mini USB charging cable We have integrated the USB charging circuitry into the WiFlux card design

column1: The first preproduction beta model of the WiFlux Cards are expected to leave the production lines on January 31st, 2014.
The first production model WiFlux Card should be available by February 28th, 2014.
Shipping is already included in the price of the perks.
We would love to see a more powerful built in battery, or super capacitors if it helped, in the WiFlux design. We would also love to accommodate more phone models in the WiFlux range.

If we exceed the funding goal, all this is possible. But we would need your support. Whether it is an idea for the WiFlux card, a great offer on costs of fabrication and parts, or even a ""like"" or ""+1"" on our campaign page, from the bottom of our hearts, thank you.

UpdatesWe have had some difficulty getting the prefabricated components and boards for this project from the previous circuit manufacturer — our small order quantity, in addition to being delayed, were not to spec, which caused a safety concern, and we had to reject those components. Subsequently, we had to rely on a more reliable component service which was a little more expensive.
To ensure we didn't have any similar problems, we had produced small quantities of samples from several manufacturers and have found one which meets our requirements.
Some of you have already received the first few units that we had made from these small quantities, and we are glad that the unit is working out well.

We will be receiving the next batch of boards, components and housings from four different manufacturers and suppliers over the next 12 days or so and hopefully look forward to resuming delivery of the WiFlux then.
The journey on this product has certainly been challenging, and we couldn't thank you more for your patience.

In order to keep up with the pace of modern power consumption, many resort to carrying additional power packs in an effort to remain connected in this wireless world. Portable charging in this manner seems like the stone age, especially when wireless charging and ultra thin lithium polymer batteries are already a reality.
WiFlux takes the concept of charging wirelessly a step further by creating a portable power bank that incorporates inductive charging and squeezing it into a card sized product.

Charging up a mobile device would be as easy as sticking the WiFlux Card onto the back of your phone. Its low profile and unobtrusive design would mean no more bulky power packs, no more cables, and no more mess.
By eliminating the need for cables and reducing the overall physical footprint of the portable charger, we seek to liberate the mobile device by making it truly wireless.
Reducing the inductive charging base to the size of a credit card
Integrating the inductive coil with the thinnest battery possible and charging circuitry into a package that is 5mm thick, or even thinner
The intended RRP of this product is USD 39.90 per set which comprises the WiFlux charging card and the charging receiver.
For now, two versions of the WiFlux charging system will be available.
For the Samsung Galaxy (S2, S3 and S4)

If we significantly exceed the funding goals of this campaign, we would be glad to extend the product further to include more devices. Focussing on a smaller number of mobile devices now, means getting the initial WiFlux card just right.

Proof of ConceptWe have carried out proof of concept tests with the iPhone 4S, iPhone 5 and the Samsung Galaxy S2 to date. Devices successfully drew the 100mA minimum charge required from the WiFlux wireless charging card, and we are working out the necessary circuitry to fully utilise the 500mA coming from the receiver end.
The following videos demonstrate the initial tests carried out with the Mark 1 Mod 1 prototype of the WiFlux card on the iPhone 4S and Samsung Galaxy S2.
The WiFlux Card comes with built in 850mAh lithium polymer battery
Charges via USB max 500mA at 5V input
Minimum output of 100mA at 5V on secondary coil (receiver)
The plan is to ship the WiFlux Card in a standard package that comprises the following:
The charging receiver, which connects to the mobile device / battery
A mini USB charging cable We have integrated the USB charging circuitry into the WiFlux card design
The first preproduction beta model of the WiFlux Cards are expected to leave the production lines on January 31st, 2014.
The first production model WiFlux Card should be available by February 28th, 2014.
Shipping is already included in the price of the perks.
We would love to see a more powerful built in battery, or super capacitors if it helped, in the WiFlux design. We would also love to accommodate more phone models in the WiFlux range.

If we exceed the funding goal, all this is possible. But we would need your support. Whether it is an idea for the WiFlux card, a great offer on costs of fabrication and parts, or even a ""like"" or ""+1"" on our campaign page, from the bottom of our hearts, thank you.

Why should you empower through Healthcare?

Sybay Health is undoubtedly creating innovative and cheeky preventative healthcare solutions, but it’s addressing a very serious problem. Sub-Saharan Africa accounts for 11 percent of the world’s population, yet bears 24% of the global disease burden. It has the world’s shortest life expectancy, largely caused by communicable and parasitic diseases stamped out in the developed world
column2: two thirds of the global burden of HIV/Aids
column4: rising rates of chronic diseases such as diabetes, hypertension, obesity and cancer.

column1: Put simply, Sub-Saharan Africa needs better preventative care and access to healthcare! We are now at full implementation stage and need your help to make this a reality.

Sybay Health is social enterprise that was founded on a single premise, which is making healthcare access for all a possibility in Sub-Saharan Africa through affordable healthcare supplies and preventative care EHR and SMS platforms. We are creating a vehicle for inspiring Africans to be active in their healthcare and a way to provide affordable quality medical supplies to every village and beyond!

We do care and strongly believe the future of healthcare access in Africa is tied to technology platforms and availability of affordable healthcare supplies. We do give 20% of our profits to the Foundation to support free clinics and distribute medical supplies to the under privileged. We support 100% FREE EHR and Patient Support platforms.
We’re creating a service that everyone needs to help those in need.
Check out our website to learn more: www.sybayhealth.com
So How are We Going to Make this Work?
Our sights are set and we're ready to take off! We are now in a position to fully resolve these healthcare challenges with your support.

First challenge:  how do we make supplies available to remote villages and beyond at an affordable price? We have learnt there are a lot of valuable lessons to be leveraged from how Coca-Cola has made it possible to have soft drink in almost every village. We created distribution model that hinges on public bus transport infrastructure coupled with the ability to secure each shipment physically and through SMS tracking when delivered to each destination. This will make us be able to make diabetes care supplies for example available at how the price, current market rate.

Second Challenge: how to make sustainable and responsible healthcare access for all? We have created a free EHR system for the physician offices that is able to work turn online/offline. The system is able to send/receive SMS messages from the patients and the mobile kiosks where patient can send in their vitals. For example: if how have diabetes for example, we will be able to provide affordable supplies and can directly communicate with the doctor by sending in blood sugar levels each day through SMS. If no doctor is assigned, the system is able to provide feedback automatically based on personal information.
So we are asking you to be part of making this a reality?

How will your money be spent? First, after spent a year perfecting the concept, developing the logistics and building viable sustainable and responsible giving business model, were ready to roll. Second, you'll be investing in a fantastic company committed to sustainable and responsible healthcare access for all, empower you!  Third, you'll be investing in your own health &
Your generous donations will be put to good work. The funds will be going towards –
• Securing start-up supplies and complete distribution channel development
• many more costs incurred during the implementation.

Most of the ground work has been done already and we believe with the distribution of medical supplies, we will be able to fund full development of IT platforms with estimated cost of $250,000 for first phase. With your support we will be able to make software applications for free to maintain our commitment to sustainable and responsible giving. Detailed Cashflow projections available upon request: email- info@sybayhealth.com

Thank you so much for visiting our site and taking the time to read what we're about! We appreciate your support of our dreams coming true.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you are not in a position to contribute financially, I understand.  Things are tough out there these days.
What you can do if you want to support this effort is to get the word out and make some noise about this fundraising campaign!
Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word, use Twitter, use Facebook and other social media, or just tell people who you know that would be interested.
You can follow us on Twitter @SybayHealth and you can like our Facebook page

Together we can make a difference!

So I have this concept

Having a passion for yachts and working within the yacht industry for the past few years prompted me to develop a Yacht Interactive concept. My creative skills also played a huge role in the development, and I am very happy to have the opportunity to present this project to you, my potential contributors.
Hopefully Yacht Interactive digital signage will intrigue you and my campaign will receive the needed attention and support.

“Yacht Interactive” is the project name of my concept - an interactive digital signage specially designed for yachts. The signage will be driven by content manager software supporting multiple file types, which will also allow easy control and deployment of that content. The content itself will be comprised of files including photos, videos, live web cams, weather, vessel tracking and web content.
Being a flexible platform, implementation of custom and additional modules will be seamlessly possible.

This is in brief the technical side of the project and if you need more information in that aspect please do not hesitate to contact me. I will be glad to provide the answer to any questions you may have.
Now, to explain how I envision the purpose of this digital signage - it is very simple, really.
Digital signages have been put into requisition for awhile, but what sets this one apart is the targeting industry.
A few groups can and will benefit if my concept develops into a real product.
Here is how the signage could be used.

• Yacht Builders: For a Ship Builder Yacht Interactive could be a modern, innovative way of marketing exposure, presenting up current and previous builds to potential buyers and clients. The mobility of the product will allow easy transportation and installation of the signage from a shipyard to a boat show booth, or any other desired location.

<li>Yacht Owners: For a Luxury Boat Owner a digital signage could make the experience of following the build progress less anxious and the time on board even more enjoyable. Featured functions will make it possible to keep an eye on how funds are utilized throughout all stages – from steel cut of the Hull to outfitting
column2: create lifetime memories from all places visited
column3: impress guests with a virtual tour of the boat in the comfort of the owner’s home or office
column4: communicate efficiently with crew and receive real time updates from them when necessary.

column1: • Yacht Crew: Crew could use “Yacht Interactive” during a boat show - to present digitally impenetrable sections of the boat or features of her audio-video, navigation systems and etc. Possibility of yacht management system implementation will ease the process of keeping track of inventory, technical maintenance schedule and daily reports. Last but not least, a digital signage will feature a “one click” connection for communication with the yacht owner, charter guests or Management Company.

• Yacht Brokers: One of the most difficult jobs in the Yachting Industry – of those, involved with marketing a boat for sale or charter, could very well benefit from Yacht Interactive not only by effectively facilitating later searching and cataloguing images, but such stunning digital presentation, comprised of high quality pictures, video reels and live high definition virtual tours will undoubtedly lead to a successful stroke of business.

• Yacht Management companies: The presence of Yacht Interactive Display in the lobby of any Management Company will absolutely attract observation of curious visitors. Such modern approach will allow ability to manage efficiently entire fleet with the tools provided by this digital signage. Last, but not least Yacht Interactive will facilitate one of the important connections between a Management company and its clients - close relationship with owners and crew.

<li>Charter Guests deserve to receive the maximum pleasure out of a charter. For convenience, Yacht Interactive will furnish visuals of the yacht layout, so guests can quickly find their way around while on board
column2: review charter daily activities, as well as the food menu and submit special meal requests
column3: communicate efficiently with the crew and other guests
column4: leave testimonials about their experience upon departure
column5: and finally – to inquire about availability of the yacht in order to book their future charter.

column1: • General Public: Presence of Yacht Interactive signage will be suitable for International Boat Shows in the utmost degree. The signage’s features will promote digital exposition of interior and exterior guests’ areas without accessibility to visitors of the Boat Show. Not only Yacht Interactive will satisfy their curiosity as to information about builder information and technical specifications, but will allow viewers to experience an onboard “live tour” by browsing through the boat’s 3D interactive model with images and videos.
What I need and you will get

My design has been well received by number of professionals in yachting and I am currently in negations with one of the leaders in digital signage industry, who is eager to make a working prototype based on my concept. Existing technology makes this possible, and at this point the realization of my project is just a matter of gathering the sufficient funds. At present I am a single unit with my idea and concept, with strong believes that this will become a successful product. I hope to receive your contribution in any form you can afford and promise to give you the deserved recognition for your support.

","So I have this concept

Having a passion for yachts and working within the yacht industry for the past few years prompted me to develop a Yacht Interactive concept. My creative skills also played a huge role in the development, and I am very happy to have the opportunity to present this project to you, my potential contributors.
Hopefully Yacht Interactive digital signage will intrigue you and my campaign will receive the needed attention and support.

“Yacht Interactive” is the project name of my concept - an interactive digital signage specially designed for yachts. The signage will be driven by content manager software supporting multiple file types, which will also allow easy control and deployment of that content. The content itself will be comprised of files including photos, videos, live web cams, weather, vessel tracking and web content.
Being a flexible platform, implementation of custom and additional modules will be seamlessly possible.

This is in brief the technical side of the project and if you need more information in that aspect please do not hesitate to contact me. I will be glad to provide the answer to any questions you may have.
Now, to explain how I envision the purpose of this digital signage - it is very simple, really.
Digital signages have been put into requisition for awhile, but what sets this one apart is the targeting industry.
A few groups can and will benefit if my concept develops into a real product.
Here is how the signage could be used.

Yacht Builders: For a Ship Builder Yacht Interactive could be a modern, innovative way of marketing exposure, presenting up current and previous builds to potential buyers and clients. The mobility of the product will allow easy transportation and installation of the signage from a shipyard to a boat show booth, or any other desired location.

Yacht Owners: For a Luxury Boat Owner a digital signage could make the experience of following the build progress less anxious and the time on board even more enjoyable. Featured functions will make it possible to keep an eye on how funds are utilized throughout all stages – from steel cut of the Hull to outfitting
column2: create lifetime memories from all places visited
column3: impress guests with a virtual tour of the boat in the comfort of the owner’s home or office
column4: communicate efficiently with crew and receive real time updates from them when necessary.

column1: Yacht Crew: Crew could use “Yacht Interactive” during a boat show - to present digitally impenetrable sections of the boat or features of her audio-video, navigation systems and etc. Possibility of yacht management system implementation will ease the process of keeping track of inventory, technical maintenance schedule and daily reports. Last but not least, a digital signage will feature a “one click” connection for communication with the yacht owner, charter guests or Management Company.

Yacht Brokers: One of the most difficult jobs in the Yachting Industry – of those, involved with marketing a boat for sale or charter, could very well benefit from Yacht Interactive not only by effectively facilitating later searching and cataloguing images, but such stunning digital presentation, comprised of high quality pictures, video reels and live high definition virtual tours will undoubtedly lead to a successful stroke of business.

Yacht Management companies: The presence of Yacht Interactive Display in the lobby of any Management Company will absolutely attract observation of curious visitors. Such modern approach will allow ability to manage efficiently entire fleet with the tools provided by this digital signage. Last, but not least Yacht Interactive will facilitate one of the important connections between a Management company and its clients - close relationship with owners and crew.

Charter Guests deserve to receive the maximum pleasure out of a charter. For convenience, Yacht Interactive will furnish visuals of the yacht layout, so guests can quickly find their way around while on board
column2: review charter daily activities, as well as the food menu and submit special meal requests
column3: communicate efficiently with the crew and other guests
column4: leave testimonials about their experience upon departure
column5: and finally – to inquire about availability of the yacht in order to book their future charter.
